Suwaal: Arkaane islaam kitne aur kya kya hain ?
Jawaab: Arkaane islam 5 hain. (1) Emaan Laana,(2) 5 waqt  Namaaz  padhna, (3) Zakaat dena 4) Ramzaan ke Roze Rakhna, (5) Hajj karna

Suwaal: Arkaane emaan kitne aur kya kya hain ?
Jawaab: Arkaane emaan 6 hain. (1) Allah ta’ala par emaan laana, (2) Uske Ambiya par emaan laana, (3) Uske Farishton  par emaan laana, (4)Uski Kitaabon par emaan laana (5) Aakhirat par emaan laana, (6) Taqdeer par emaan laana yani ye emaan laana ke achchaae aur buraae sab Allah ta’ala ki taraf se hai. Is ke ilaawa Jannat, Jahannam, Meezaan aur Marne ke baad zinda kiye jaane par bhi emaan laana zaroori hai. ALLAH TA’AALA

Suwaal: Hum ko aur saari makhlooqaat ko kisne paida farmaaya?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala ne paida farmaaya

Suwaal: Hum ko Rizq dene waala kaun hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala hai

Suwaal: Baarish barsaane waala kaun hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’aala

Suwaal: Khet main Anaaj ugaane waala kaun hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala Hai

Suwaal: is duniya ko paida karne waala kaun hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala hai

Suwaal: Kya kisi ko paida karne main Allah ta’ala ka koi Shareek aur Madadgaar hai ?
Jawaab: Hargiz nahi ! Kisi cheez ko paida karne main Allah ta’ala ka koi shareek aur madadgaar nahi.

Suwaal: Agar koi Allah ta’ala ko na maane to ?
Jawaab: Agar koi Allah ta’ala ko na maane to wo Kaafir hai.

Suwaal: Allah ta’ala ke saath kisi dusre ko khuda maanna kaisa hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala ke saath kisi dusre ko khuda maanna Shirk hai.

Suwaal: Dusre Khuda ke hone ko mumkin maanna kaisa hai ?
Jawaab: Dusre Khuda ke hone ko mumkin manna kufr hai.

Suwaal: Kya Allah ta’ala Jhoot bol sakta hai ?
Jawaab: Hargis nahi! Allah ta’ala Jhoot nahi bol sakta.

Suwaal: Agar koi Allah ta’ala ka wada jhoota hone ka aqeedah rakhe to us par kya hukum hai?
Jawaab: Agar koi Allah ta’ala ka wada jhoota hone ka aqeedah rakhe to wo Kaafir hai.

Suwaal: Allah ta’ala ki zaat ke barey main humain kaisa aqeedah rakhna chaahiye ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala ki zaat ke barey main humain ye aqeedah rakhna chaahiye ke (1)Allah ta’ala ka koi shareek nahi, wo akela hai.(2) uske jaisa koi dusra nahi.(3) Allah ta’ala ne apni qudrat se saari cheezon ko paida farmaaya hai.(4) Allah ta’ala ko kisi ne paida nahi kiya. (5)Allah ta’ala hamesha se hai aur hamesha rahega. (6)Duniya aur duniya ki saari cheezein Allah ta’ala ke qabza e qudrat main hai. (7) Saari makhlooq usee ki muhtaaj hai, wo kisi ka muhtaaj nahi. (8) Wahi makhlooq ko Rizq deta hai. (9) Na wo sota hai, na Khaata hai, na peeta hai. (10) Allah ta’ala ka ilm Zaati aur la-mahdood hai. (11) Wo ghaib ki baat Jaanta hai, uske bataye bigair koi ghaib ki baat jaan nahi sakta al-batta wo apne khaas Bandon par ghaib ki baatein Zaahir farmaata hai. (12) Quraan Allah ta’ala ka kalaam hai. (13) Allah ta’ala hi iba maanind  ke laaiq hai, uske siwa koi iba maanind  ke laaiq nahi. (14) Allah ta’ala Jism aur jismaaniyyat se paak hai yani na wo jism hai aur na us main wo baatein payi jaati hai jo jism se ta’alluq rakhti hai lihaaza wo zamaan wa makaan, shakal wo soorat, tarf wo jihat jaisi un saari sifaat se paak hai jo jism main payi jaati hain. (15) Jhoot, zulm, jahaalat, bhulna aur be'hayaayi wagairah tamaam burayan Allah ta’ala keliye muhaal(namumkin) hai. (16) Allah ta’ala apne bandon par bahut mainherbaan hai.

Suwaal: ALLAH ta’ala KI SIFAAT:
Jawaab: Sab se pehle ek aaqil wa baaligh musalmaan par waajib hai Ke wo is baat ka ilm Haasil kare Ke kaunsi baatein Allah ke haqq main waajib hai aur kaunsi baatein us ke haqq main muhaal hai. Waalidain aur sarparaston par waajib hai Ke bachchon Ke samajdaar hone ke baad aur baaligh hone se pehle ye sifaat bachchon ko sikhaayein. Allah ta’ala ke haqq main jo baatein waajib hai wo ye hai (1)Wujood, (2) qidam (yani Hamesha se hona), (3) Baqaa (yani hamesha rahna), (4) Hawaadis ke mukhaalif hona, (5) apne wujood main kisi ka muhtaaj na hona, (6) Wahdaaniyyat (yani zaat wo sifaat main us ka koi shareek na hona).(7) qudrat (8)iraadah, (9)ilm,(10)Zindagi, (11) Sun’na, (12) Dekhna,( 13) Kalaam karna, (14) Saahibe qudrat hona,(15) Saahibe iraada hona,(16)Aalim hona, (17) Zinda hona, (18) Sunne waala hona, (19)Dekhne waala hona,(20) Kalaam karne waala hona. Jo baatein Allah ta’ala ke haqq main waajib hai us ke ziddein uske haqq main muhaal hai Jaise adam, paida hona, marna, jahaalat, aajiz hona wagaira.

Suwaal: Allah ta’ala ko uppar waala kahna kaisa isi tarah ba'az log kah dete hai ke uppar waala Jaane aisa kahna kaisa hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala ko upar waala kehna ya is tarah kehna ke uppar waala jaane Mana hai.

Suwaal: Allah ta’ala ko Allah miyaan kehna kaisa ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala ko Allah miyaan kehna mana hai.

Suwaal: Kya Allah ta’ala ke ilm ke siwa kisi makhlooq ka ilm zaati hai Agar koi aisa aqeeda rakhe to kya hukm hai ?
Jawaab: Sirf Allah ta’ala ka ilm zaati hai, Allah ta’ala ke ilm ke siwa kisi makhlooq ka ilm zaati nahi, kisi makhlooq ke ilm ko zaati samajna shirk hai. FaRIShTEy

Suwaal: Farishte kaun hai ?
Jawaab: Farishte Allah Ta'ala ke Mahbood Bande hain jinko Allah Ta'ala ne noor se paida farmaaya.

Suwaal: Farishte kitne hain ?
Jawaab: Farishton ki tadad beshumaar hai. Lekin un main se Das (10) farishte aise hain jin ko janna zaroori hai.

Suwaal: un Das farishton  ke naam bayaan kijiye jin ko janna zaroori hai ?
Jawaab: Das Farishton ke naam aur kaam ye hain Yaad rahe ki in umoor ke ilawa aur bhi bahot se umoot par mamoor hai. In main chaar farishton ko muqarrabeen Kehte hain wo Hazrate Jibril, Mikaail Israfeel, Azrael عَلَیْہِمُ السَّلَامُ hain aur Jibreel عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ tamaam farishton ke sardar hain. insaan

Suwaal: Duniya ka Sab se pehla insaan kaun hai ?
Jawaab: Hazrate Aadam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ hain.

Suwaal: Hazrate Aadam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ ki biwi ka naam kya hai ?
Jawaab: Hazrate Aadam عَلَیْہِ  السَّلَامُ ki biwi ka naam Hazrate Hawwa رضي الله عَنْهَا hai.

Suwaal: Allah Ta'ala ne insaan ko kaise banaya ?
Jawaab: Allah Ta'ala ne insaan ko Ashraful makhluqat banaya.

Suwaal: Allah  ne Hazrate Adam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ ko kaise paida farmaaya ?
Jawaab: Sab se pehle Allah ta’ala ne Hazrate Aadam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ ka mitti se ek putla banaya phir us main rooh dali, is tarah Hazrate Aadam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ paida hue.

Suwaal: Hazrate Hawwa رَضِيَ اللهُ عَنْهَا ko Allah ne kaise paida farmaaya ?
Jawaab: Allah Ta'ala ne Hazrate Aadam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ ki bayi fasli se Hazrate Hawwa رَضِيَ اللهُ عَنْہَا ko paida farmaaya.

Suwaal: Allah ne Hum insaanon ko kis liye paida kiya ?
Jawaab: Islam qabool karke Allah Ta'ala ki iba maanind  karne keliye Allah Ta'ala ne Hum insaanon ko paida kiya.

Suwaal: Baqiya insaanon ko Allah Ta'ala ne kis tarah paida farmaaya ?
Jawaab: Hazrate Adam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ aur Hazrate Hawwa رَضِيَ اللهُ عَنْهَا se Allah Ta'ala ne baqiya insaanon ko paida farmaaya. DIN-E-ISLAM

Suwaal: Hamara deen konsa hai ?
Jawaab: Hamara deen islam hai.

Suwaal: Deen e islam ko Allah Ta'ala ne kis liye utara ?
Jawaab: Deen e islam ko Allah Ta'ala ne Bandon ki bhalayi keliye utara.

Suwaal: Islam kya sikhata hai ?
Jawaab: Islam din aur duniya ki Sacchi aur achchi baatein sikhata hai.

Suwaal: Agar koi islam qabool na kare to ?
Jawaab: Agar koi islam qabool na kare to Aakhirat main ruswayi hogi aur hamesha hamesha Jahannam ki aag main jalna hoga.

Suwaal: Kya iba maanind  musalmaan ki hi qabool hoti hai ?
Jawaab: Ji haan, iba maanind  Musalmaan ki hi qubool hoti hai.

Suwaal: Kalima e shaha maanind   main kya hai ?
Jawaab: Kalima e Shaha maanind   main do cheezon ki gawaahi di jaati hai ek Allah Ta'ala ki wahdaniyyat ki gawaahi, dusre HazrateMuhammadMustafa ﷺ  ki risalat ki gawaahi.

Suwaal: Kalima e Shaha maanind   ka Dil se yakeen aur Zubaan se iqrar karne ko kya Kehte hain ?
Jawaab: Emaan laana Kehte hain. AMBIYA WO MURSALEEN.

Suwaal: Kya Jinnaat wo Farishton main bhi Nabi  hai?
Jawaab: ji nahi, nabi insaan hote hain, un main bhi sirf mard, koi aurat nabi nahi ban sakti.

Suwaal: Kya ambiya hum jaise insaan hain?
Jawaab: Ambiya insaan to hain, lekin Hum jaise aam insaan nahi balke Allah ke mahboob bande hain. Allah Ta'ala unhe gaib ka ilm deta hai, wo farishton ki guftugu sun sakte hain, Allah ta’ala ne unhe wo azeem rutba ata farmaaya jise hum soch bhi nahi sakte.

Suwaal: Sab se pehle Nabi kaun  hain?
Jawaab: Aadam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ hain.

Suwaal: Akhiri Nabi kaun hain?
Jawaab: Akhiri Nabi humare pyare aaqa Muhammad Mustafa ﷺ‎ hain, Aap ﷺ ke baad koi Naya Nabi na aasaka na aasakega.

Suwaal: Ambiya se gunaah ho sakta hai?
Jawaab: Ambiya masoom hain un se gunaah nahi ho sakta, wo tamaam qism ke gunaahon se paak hote hain, iyelan e Nabuwwat se pehle bhi aur baad main bhi.

Suwaal: Duniya main kitne ambiya e kiraam tashreef laye ?
Jawaab: Ambiya e kiraam ki tadaad mu’ayyan karna dushwaar hai kyuke us bare main mukhtalif riwaayatein hain haan ek sahee riwaayat main hai ke duniya main ek lakh 24 hazar (1,24,000) ambiya e kiraam tashreef layein. Note: Ambiya e kiraam ki tadaad jab bhi bayaan karna ho to kam o besh lagaye

Suwaal: Quran e paak main kitne ambiya ka zikr hai ? Aur wo kaun kaun hai ?
Jawaab: Quran'e paak main pacchis(25) ambiya ka zikr hai aur unke naam ye hai- (1)Hazrate Aadam عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ, (2) Hazrate Idrisعَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(3) Hazrate Nuh عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(4)Hazrate Hood عَلَیْہِ السَّلَام,(5)Hazrate Swaalih عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ, (6)Hazrate Ibraheem عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ, (7) Hazrate Loot عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(8) Hazrate Ismail عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ, (9) Hazrate Ishaq عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ, (10) Hazrate Yaqoob عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(11) Hazrate Yusuf عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(12)Hazrate Ayyoob عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ, (13)Hazrate Shuaibعَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(14) Hazrate Haroonعَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(15)Hazrate Moosa عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(16) Hazrate Layees عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(17) Hazrate Zulkifal عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ, (18) Hazrate Dawood عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(19) Hazrate Sulaiman عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(20) Hazrate Ilyas عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(21) Hazrate Yunus عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(22) Hazrate Zakariya عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(23) Hazrate Yahya عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,(24) Hazrate Esa عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ aur (25) Hamare Nabi Hazrate Muhammad ﷺ hain. In hi naamo ko aqidatul awaam main ash’aar main jama kiya hai.

Suwaal: wo paanch nabi jin ka rutba sare nabiyon se buland hai aur jinhe ulul azm kahte hain, wo kaun hain?
Jawaab: 1) Hamare Nabi Hazrate Muhammad ﷺ 2) Hazrate Ibraheemعَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ 3)Hazrate Moosa عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ,4)Hazrate Esa عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ 5)Hazrate Nooh عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ HAMARE NABI صَلَّى ٱللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ وَاٰلِهِ وَسَلَّمَ‎

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ka naam e Mubarak kya hai ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ka naam e Mubarak Muhammad ﷺ ‎ hai.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ke Waalid aur waalida ka naam e Mubarak kya hai ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ‎ke Waalid ka naam e Mubarak Abdullah رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ hai aur waalida ka naam e Mubarak Aaminah رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہَا hai.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ kaha paida hue ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ Makka e Mukarrama main paida hue.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ki wila maanind  Kab hui ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ki wila maanind  21 April 571, Bara Rabi’ul awwal shareef, Peer ke din subaha saadiq ke waqt hui.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ke Waalid e Majid ki wafaat Kab hui ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ apne waalida ke batan e Mubarak main do maah ke hue to aap ke Waalid e Majid Hazrate Abdullah رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ki wafaat hui.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ki Waalida e Majida ki wafaat Kab hui ?
Jawaab: jab hamare Nabi ﷺ ki umar shareef 6 saal ki hui to aap ﷺ  ‎ki waalida Hazrate Aaminah رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہَا ki wafaat hui.

Suwaal: Hazrate Amina رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہَا ki wafaat ke baad Hamare Nabi صَلَّى ٱللّٰهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّمَ ki parwarish kis ne farmayi ?
Jawaab: Hazrate Aaminah رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہَا ki wafaat ke baad Hamare Nabi ﷺ ki parwarish Aap ﷺ ke Dada Hazrate Abdul Mutallib ne farmayi.

Suwaal: Dada Hazrate Abdul Mutallib ne Hamare Nabiﷺ ki Parwarish kitne saal farmayi ?
Jawaab: Dada Hazrate Abdul Mutallib ne Hamare Nabiﷺ ki Parwarish 2 saal farmayi, jab Aap ﷺ  8 saal ke huwe Dada Hazrate Abdul Mutallib ki wafaat hui.

Suwaal: Dada ke baad Hamare Nabi ﷺ‎ki parwarish kis ne farmayi?
Jawaab: Dada ke baad hamare Nabi ﷺ ki parwarish Aapﷺ ke chacha jaan Hazrate Abu Talib ne farmayi.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ko Doodh kis kis ne pilaya ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ko sabse pehle Aap ﷺ ki waalida Hazrate Aaminah رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہَا ne doodh pilaya, us ke baad Abu lahab ki baandi Suwaibatul aslamiyya aur Hazrate Haleemah saadiya ne doodh pilaya. Note: hamare Nabi ﷺ ke dada jan Hazrate abdul muttalib aur dadi jaan Hazrate Fatima bint amr aur nana jan Hazrate wahab aur nani jan barra bint abdul uzza hain.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ka nasab nama bayaan kijiye
Jawaab: Waalid e majid ki jaanib se aaqa ka nasab naama yun hai. Abdulla bin abdul muttalib bin hashim bin abdi manaaf bin qusai bin kilaab bin murrah bin ka’ab bin luwai bin galib bin fahr bin maalik bin nazar bin kinaana bin khuzaima bin mudrikah bin ilyaas bin muzar bin nizaar bin mu’addi bin adnaan aur waalida majida ki jaanib se aap ka nasab naama yun hai ke aaminah bint wahab bin abdil manaaf bin zuhra bin kilaab aur ye Hazrate kilaab wilid e majid ki jaanib aap ﷺ ke nasab nama main moujood Hazrate  kilaab hain.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ‎ka pesha kya tha ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ‎ka pesha Tijaarat tha.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ kitne saal ki umr main ilaan e Nubuwwat Farmaaya ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ chalis (40) saal ki umar main ilaan e Nubuwwat Farmaaya.

Suwaal: Kitne saal ki umr main hamare Nabi ﷺ ka pehla nikah hua?
Jawaab: Pacchees (25) saal ki umr main hamare Nabi ﷺ ka pehla nikah hua.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ‎ki pehli zauja e muhtaramah ka naam kya hai ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ki pehli zauza e muhtaramah ka naam Hazrate Khadeejatul Khubra رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہَا hai.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ne Makka Mukarrama se Madina munawwarah ki taraf hijrat Kab farmayi ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ne Makka Mukarrama se Madina munawwara ki taraf  apni Tirpan (53) saal ki umr main hijrat farmayi.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ne Zahiri Zindagi kitne saal guzaari ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ‎ne Zahiri Zindagi Tirsat (63) saal guzari.

Suwaal: Kya hamare Nabi ﷺ ‎ke baad koi Nabi ayega ?
Jawaab: Hargiz nahi ! Hamare Nabi ﷺ ke baad koi Nabi nahi ayega.

Suwaal: Allah Ta'ala ne sab se pehle kis cheez ko paida farmaaya ?
Jawaab: Allah ta’ala ne sab se pehle Hamare Nabi ﷺ ke Noor ko Paida farmaaya hai.

Suwaal: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ki Shaan muktasaraan bayaan kijiye .
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ko Allah Ta'ala ne sari makhlooq se afzal wo Aala aur Apna Mahboob banaya, sari cheezon ka Maalik o mukhtaar aur sare Aalam keliye Rahmat banaya. Allah Ta'ala ne Hamare Nabi ﷺ ko ilm e gaib ata farmaaya isi liye Hamare Nabi ﷺ ne qayamat tak kya kya hone waala hai sab bataya. yahan tak ke hamare Nabi ﷺ Haar shakhs ke bare main ye jante hain ke wo Jannati hai ya Douzakhi balke ibtida se lekar qayamat tak aane waale Har shakhs ka naam Hamare Nabi ﷺ jante hain. Hamare Nabi ﷺ ke ilm e gaib ka inkar karna gumrahi aur bad mazhabi hai. Hamare Nabi ﷺ ki Shaan main zarrasi Gustakhi karne waala Kaafir hai, Gustakh e rasool ko Salaam karna haraam hai. Aise logon ke piche Namaaz nahi hoti. Is tarah ke logon se kisi tarah ka mamla karna durust nahi na hi in se nikah karna durust hai. Note: Ambiya e kiraam عَلَیْہِمُ السَّلَامُ ki adna gustakhi bhi kufr hai inki Shaan main jo alfaaz estimaal kiye jaaye adab main dube huwe ho koi aisa lafz jis main kam tazimi ki bu bhi ho kabhi zubaan  par na laye. AASMAANI KITAABEiN

Suwaal: aasmaani kitaabon  se kya muraad hai?
Jawaab: aasmaani kitaabon se muraad Allah ta'aala ka naazil kiya hua kalaam hai

Suwaal: Allah ki taraf se kitni aasmaani kitaabein naazil huin?
Jawaab: Allah ki taraf se 4 badi kitaabein aur 100 chhoti aasmaani kitaabein naazil huin.Choti kitaabon ko Saheefe kehte hain.

Suwaal: aasmaani kitaabein aur Saheefe kyun naazil hue?
Jawaab: Bandon ki hidayat keliye naazil hue.

Suwaal: Badi aasmaani kitaabein kaun kaun si hain aur kin kin  nabiyon par naazil huin?
Jawaab: Badi aasmaani kitaabein aur unke ambiya ke naam darje zail  hai

Suwaal: Saheefe kin kin nabiyon par naazil hue?
Jawaab: un nabiyon ke naam darj zail hai

Suwaal: In tamaam kitaabon par emaan laana kaisa hai?
Jawaab: In tamaam kitaabon par Emaan laana hum par waajib hai.

Suwaal: Kya in tamaam aasmaani kitaabon par amal jaaiz  hai?
Jawaab: Ji nahin, is liye ke Quran ke siwa tamaam kitaabon ka hukm mansookh ho chuka hai.

Suwaal: Kya Quran ke siwa baaki aasmaani kitaabein maujood hain?
Jawaab: Aksa chaar (4) kitaabein maujood nahin aur jo maujood hain un kitaabon main shareeron ne apni khwahish ke mutaabiq ghata badha diya hai,lihaaza woh apni asli haalat par maujood nahin.Isiliye ab unhein padhna haraam hai.

Suwaal: Quran shareef main kya hai?
Jawaab: Quran shareef main Allah ta'aala ke ahkamaat, naseehat ki baatein, ambiya ke qisse aur Allah ta'aala ke nek bandon ki ta’areef wa tauseef hai. Qiyamat ka din

Suwaal: Qiyamat kisey  kehte hain?
Jawaab: Jis din saari duniya fanaa hojaayegi.Duniya main koi cheez baaqi na rahegi usey Qiyamat kehte hain.

Suwaal: Qiyamat kab aayegi?
Jawaab: Jab Hazrate Israfeel عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ  pehli baar soor phunkenge us waqt Qiyamat aayegi.

Suwaal: Qiyamat ki nishaaniyan bataiye?
Jawaab: Qiyamat ki nishaaniyan bahut hain Un mainin se aham nishaaniyan yeh hain. 1)emaam Mahdiرَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ka tashreef laana,(2)Dajjaal ka nikalna, (3)Esa عَلَیْہِ السَّلَامُ  ka aasmaan se utarna, (4)Yaajooj Maajooj ka nikalna, (5)Daabatul Ardh  ka nikalna, (6)Maghrib se sooraj ka nikalna, (7) Yemaan se ek badi aag ka zaahir  hona,(8) Ka’abah muazammah ka gir panda,(9)Qurane paak ka uth jaana, (10)Ek khaas hawaa ka chalna jisse musalmaanon ka intaqaal kar jaana. BID’AT

Suwaal: Bid’at kisse kehte hain?
Jawaab: Bid at aisi cheez ko kehte hain jo huzoor ﷺ ke zahiri zamaane mainin na ho khwaah  woh deeni  ho ya dunyawi.

Suwaal: Bid’at ki kitni qismein hain aur woh kya kya hain?
Jawaab: Bid’at ki 3 qismein hain (1) Bid’at hasanah (achchi bid’at) ,(2) Bid’at sayyiah (buri bid’at) aur (3) Bid’at mubahah ( jo jaayaz ho). 1) Bid’at hasanah ki 2 qismein hain. a) bid’at e waajibah yaani jiska karna waajib ho jaise Quran kareem aur hadees shareef ki taaleem  ki hifaazat keliye madaaris ka qaaim karna. b) Bid’at mandoobah  yaani jiske karne mainin sawaab ho jaise naat khani aur mahfil e milaad. 2) Bid’at sayyiah ki 2 qismein hain. a) Bid’at muharramah yaani jiska karna gunaah hai. b) Bid’ate makroohah yaani jiska karna sharee’at main na pasandeedah ho. Note : Hadees e mubaarakah main jis bid'at ko bura kaha hai wo bid'at e sayyiah yaani haraam  aur makrooh bid'atein hain. Allah ke wali

Suwaal: Allah ka wali kaun hota hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ka wali wo hai jo Allah Ta'ala ki zaat wa sifaat ko jaan kar uski iba maanind  par hameshagi  baratta hai aur shahwate nafsaniyah se parhez karta hai.

Suwaal: Kya koi jahil Allah ka wali ho sakta hai ?
Jawaab: Ji nahi ! Allah ka wali sirf sharee’at ka Janne waala hi ho sakta hai Agar kisi ke paas sharee’at ka ilm na ho aur wo wali hone ka dawa kare toh wo jhoota hai.

Suwaal: Karaamat kise kehte hai ?
Jawaab: A maanind  ke khilaaf jo baatein Allah ke waliyon se zahir hoti hai use karaamat kehte hain. Jaise Hawa main udna, paani par chalna aur murdon ko Zinda karna wagairah.

Suwaal: Agar koi hawa main ude, paani par chale, murdon ko Zindah kare ya iske ilawa koi aur khilaf e a maanind  baatein usse zahir hon to kya sirf in baaton ko dekh kar use Allah ka wali kaha jaayega?
Jawaab: Ji nahi! Allah ka wali wo hota hai jo Allah Ta'ala ke hukm par amal kare aur us ki mana karda cheezon se bache. Sirf Hawa main udne, paani par chalne ya is tarah ke khilaf e a maanind  baaton ke zahir hone se koi Allah ka wali nahi hota balke wali hone keliye Allah ke ahkamaat par amal karna zaroori hai.

Suwaal: Kis haalat main Auliya e kiraam karaamat dikhate hain ?
Jawaab: Auliya e kiraam jab chahe karaamat dikhate hain.

Suwaal: Kya har haal main karaamat dikhana Auliya par waajib hai?
Jawaab: Ji nahi ! Lekin Auliya e kiraam jab chahe tab karaamat zahir kar sakte hain.

Suwaal: Qutubul Aqtaab kise kehte hai ?
Jawaab: Auliya e kiraam ke jo sardar hote hain unhe Aqtaab kehte hain aur Aqtaab ke Jo sardar hote hain unhe Qutubul Aqtaab kehte hain. Chaar "Qutubul Aqtaab" bahut mashoor hain, unhe "Aqtaabe Arba’ah" kehte hain. 1) Hazrate Gous e A’azam Shaikh Abdul Qadir Jeelani Dastagir   قَدَّسَ اللہُ سِرَّہُ الْعَزِیْزْ 2) Hazrate Sultan ul Arifeen Shaikh Ahmad Kabir Rifa’e قَدَّسَ اللہُ سِرَّہُ الْعَزِیْزْ 3) Hazrate Shaikh Ahmad Badawi قَدَّسَ اللہُ سِرَّہُ الْعَزِیْزْ 4) Hazrate Shaikh Ibraheem Dasoqi قَدَّسَ اللہُ سِرَّہُ الْعَزِیْزْ

Suwaal: Kya Allah ke naik bandon se madad mangna jaaiz hai ?
Jawaab: Ji haan ! Auliya e kiraam se madad mangna jaaiz hai, Sahaaba e kiraam ke zamane se lekar aaj Tak musalmaanon main Allah ke naik bandon se madad mangne ka riwaj raha hai.

Suwaal: Kya Allah ke naik bandon se madad mangna shirk hai ?
Jawaab: Allah ke naik bandon se madad mangna hargiz shirk nahi, is liye ke ek musalmaan yahi aqida rakhta hai ke Allah ke naik bande, Allah ki di huwi taqat wa quwwat se hamari madad karte hain.

Suwaal: Kya Auliya e kiraam wafaat ke bad bhi hamari madad kar sakte hain?
Jawaab: Ji haan ! Auliya e kiraam wafaat ke bad bhi hamari madad kar sakte hain. Emaam Shafie رَضِیَ اللہُ تَعَالیٰ عَنْہُ

Suwaal: Hamare maslak ka naam kya hai ?
Jawaab: Hamare Maslak ka naam Maslak e Shafi'ee hai.

Suwaal: Hamare Maslak ke imam ka naam kya hai ?
Jawaab: Hamare Maslak ke imam ka naam Muhammad bin idrees Shafi'ee hai jinhe hum imam Shafi'e kahte hain.

Suwaal: Imam Shafi'ee ka nasab nama bayaan karen?
Jawaab: Abu Abdillahi Muhammad bin idreesa bin Abbas bin usman bin Shafi’a bin Saaeb bin ubaid bin abdu yazeed bin Hashim bin Mutalib bin Abdu munaaf. Hamare Nabi ﷺ aur imam Shafi’ee رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ka nasab nama Abd manaaf par ja milta hai. Imam Shafi’ee رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ke Jadde Suwwam Hazrate Shafi’a aur Jadde Chaarum Hazrate Saaeb رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُمَا ne Jange Badr ke din islam qabool kiya. Jadde Suwwam Hazrate Shafi’a رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ki taraf Nisbat karte hue Hamare imam "Shafi’ee" kehlate hain.

Suwaal: Hamare imam kis khandaan se hain ?
Jawaab: Hamare imam khandaan e Banu Muttalib se hai yani "Mutalibi" hai.

Suwaal: Imam Shafi’ee رضی اللہ عنہ ke baare main hamare nabi ﷺ ne kya irshad farmaaya ?
Jawaab: Hamare Nabi ﷺ ne irshad farmaaya ke  عَالِمُ قُرَیْشٍ یَمْلَأُ طِبَاقَ الْأَرْضِ عِلْمًا yani Quresh ka ek alim apne ilm se rooh e zameen  ko bhar dega.

Suwaal: Imam Shafi’ee رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ka mukhtasar ta’aroof bayaan karen?
Jawaab: Hamare imam, Imam Shafi’ee رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ki wila maanind  maujooda Palestine ke ek ilaqe Gaza main 150 Hijri main hue. 2 saal ki umr main ap ko Makka laya gaya wahi 7 saal ki umr main ap ne Quraan Hifz kiya aur 10 saal ki umr main Hadees e paak ki kitaab "Muatta emaam e Maalik" hifz karli, us ke baad Makke ke sabse bade Mufti, Muslim bin Khalid Zanji ki khidmat main rah kar Fiqh main mahaarat Haasil ki, phir mazid ilm ki Talab ne ap ko Imam Maalik ki darsgah e Hadees wo Fiqh tak pohunchaya. Imam Maalik رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ ek sacche ashiqe Rasool aur apne waqt main ulama ke sardar the, apki Suhbat ne imam Shafi’ee ki zaat main chaar chaand laga diye. 15 saal ki choti si umr hi main apne Mujtahidul mutlaq ke azeem mansab par faa'ez hochuke the aur aap ko imam Maalik aur Hazrate Muslim bin Khalid janzi  رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْهُمَا ne fatwa ki ijaazat de di. Ek muddat tak imam Maalik se ilm Haasil karne ke baad Aap Bagdad tashreef legaye aur wahan ilm e Hadees ki Khidmat ki wajh se"نَاصِرُ السُّنَّۃِ"kehlaye. Bagdad main 2 saal rehne ke baad Makka laute phir dubaara Bagdad chale gaye wahan ek saal qiyaam ke baad Misr tashreef legaye, wahi 204 Hijri main Rajab ul Murajjab ki aakhiri tareekh ko Juma ke din 54 saal ki umr main Ap ka visaal hua. Aap رَضِیَ اللہُ عَنْہُ Mujtahid, Muhaddis, Mujaddid aur Arbi zubaan ke bahut bade adeeb the رضی اللہ عنہ و ارضاہ عنا

Suwaal: NAMAAZ AUR TAHAARAT KA BAYAAN
Jawaab: Emaan aur tas’heeh e aqaid ke baad namaaz tamaam faraiz main nihaayat aham w a’azam hai.Quraan majeed w ahadees e nabi akram ﷺ iski ahmiyat se maalamaal hain,jaabaja iski takeed aayi hai aur us ke chhodne waale par wa’eed farmayi hai. Allah ta’ala irshaad farmata hai: وَ أَقِمِ الصَّلٰوةَ لِذِكْرِیْ   ۝۱۴ aur meri yaad keliye namaaz qaayim rakh. aur irshad farmaaya: إِنَّ الصَّلٰوةَ تَنْهٰی عَنِ الْفَحْشَآءِ وَ الْمُنْكَرِ beshak namaaz behayaae aur buri baaton se rookti hai ek din hamare aaqa o moula Hazrate muhammad mustafa ﷺ ne sahaaba e kiraam se irshad farmaaya"achcha !ye batawo!agar kisi ke darwaze ke saamne nadi behti ho aur wo rozaana us main 5 martaba nahaata ho to kya us ke jism par mail baaqi rahega? Sahaaba e kiraam ne arz kiya: ya rasool Allah ! Kuchh bhi baaqi nahi rahega. Ap ﷺ ne farmaaya"bas 5 waqta namaazon ki yahi misaal hai un namaazon ke sabab Allah ta’ala gunaahon ko maaf farma deta hai" Namaaz ka mutlaqan tark to sakht holnaak cheez hai use qaza kar ke padhne waalon ko Allah ta’ala farmata hai: فَوَیْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّیْنَ ۝۴الَّذِیْنَ هُمْ عَنْ صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُوْنَ ۝۵ tarjuma :kharabi hai un namaaziyon keliye jo apni namaaz se bekhabar hai, waqt guzar kar padhte hai. huzoor ﷺ ne irshad farmaaya: jis ne namaaz chhodi us ka koi deen nahi, namaaz deen ka sutoon hai. kisi hadees main aya hai ke namaaz jannat ki kunji haani, kisi main aya hai ke namaaz muaminon ki mi’araaj hai, huzoor e akram ﷺ ne farmaaya ke sab se pehle qiyaamat ke din bande se namaaz ka hisaab liya jaayega,agar ye durust hui to baaqi aamaal bhi theek rahege aur ye bigdi to sabhi bigdi

Suwaal: Alllah ki iba maanind on main sab se afzal iba maanind  kaun si hai?
Jawaab: Allah ki iba maanind on main sab se afzal iba maanind  namaaz hai.

Suwaal: namaaz kis par farz hai?
Jawaab: har mukallaf twahir musalmaan par namaaz farz hai.

Suwaal: :ladka aur ladki baaligh kab ho jate hain?
Jawaab: qamri 9 saal mukammal hone ke baad mani ke kharij hone se ladka aur ladki baaligh ho jate hain isee tarah ek ladki, haiz ka khon nikalne se bhi baaligh ho jaati hai haan agar mani ya haiz na nikle to ladka aour ladki qamri 15 saal ko pahunchne se baaligh ho jate hain.

Suwaal: tahir kis ko kahte hain?
Jawaab: tahir use kahte hain jo haiz aur nifaas ki haalat main na ho.

Suwaal: kya haiz wa nifaas ki haalat main aurat namaaz padh sakti hai?
Jawaab: ji nahi! haiz wa nifaas ki haalat main namaaz padhna haraam hai.

Suwaal: kya janaabat waale par namaaz farz hai?
Jawaab: ji haan, janaabat waale par namaaz farz hai,lekin wo ghusl karne ke baad hi namaaz padh sakta hai.

Suwaal: namaaz chhodne waale ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: namaaz chhodne waala faasiq aur gunaahgar hai,islaam main use qatl karne ka hukm hai aur marne ke baad use jahannam main phenka jaayega.

Suwaal: namaaz saheeh hone keliye kya zaroori hai?
Jawaab: namaaz saheeh hone keliye tamaam sharaait aur faraaiz ke saath adaa karna zaroori hai

Suwaal: Namaaz ki shartein kitni hain?aur wo kya kya hain?
Jawaab: Namaaz ki shartein 5 hain aur wo ye hain: (1) hadas (naapaaki) se paak hona. (2) najaasat se paak hona, (3) satr e aurat (makhsoos aaza ka chhupana) (4) istiqbal e qibla yani qibla rukh hona. (5) waqt hone ke bare main pura pura yaqeen hona.

Suwaal: hadas ka kya matlab hai?aur uski kitni qismein hain?
Jawaab: hadas naapaaki ko kahte hain,aur uski do(2) qismein hain, 1)hadas e asgar yani chhoti naapaaki, 2)hadas e akbar yani badi naapaaki.

Suwaal: chhoti aur badi naapaaki se paak hone keliye kya karna padhta hai?
Jawaab: chhoti naapaaki se paak hone keliye wuzu aur badi naapaaki se paak hone keliye ghusl karna padta hai. WUZU KA BAYAAN

Suwaal: wuzu ke sharaait kitne aur wo kya kya hain?
Jawaab: wuzu ki sharaait 5 hai aur wo ye hain, 1) )paani ka taahir aur mutahhir hona. 2) )wuzu ke a’aza par paani bah jana. 3) )wuzu ke a’aza par kisi aisi cheez ka na hona jo paani ko jild tak pahunchne se rooke. 4))wuzu ke a’aza par paani ke rang,bu aur maze ko badalne waali cheezon ka na hona. 5))daimul hadas keliye namaaz ke waqt ka daakhil hona.

Suwaal: taahir aur mutaahir kis paani ko kahte hain?
Jawaab: taahir aur mutahir us paani ko kahte hain jo khud paak ho aur dusri cheezon ko paak karne ki salaahiyat rakhta ho jaise barish, nadi ,dariya,talaab,kuwa,chashmain ka paani.

Suwaal: kaun kaun se paani se wuzu nahi ho sakta?
Jawaab: 3 qismon ke paani se wuzu nahi ho sakta. (1) napaak paani 2) )paak cheez se jiyada tagayyur shuda paani (3)mustaamal paani yani ek bar wuzu,ghusl ya najaasat ko paak karne main istimaal kiya hua paani.

Suwaal: paani kab musta’amal kahlata hai ?
Jawaab: be wuzu jab wuzu karega to us wuzu ke farz main istimaal kiya gaya paani mustaamal kahlata hai,us shakhs ke ghusl ke farz main jis par ghusl farz tha istimaal kiya gaya paani mustamal kahlata hai isi tarah izala e najas main istimaal kiya gaya paani mustamal kahlata hai jab ke mahal paak ho gaya ho , paani kerang,bu aur daiqe main najaasat kesabab koi tabdeeli paida nahi huyi ho aur na hi paani ka wazan badha ho.

Suwaal: paani kab mutagayyir kahlata hai ?
Jawaab: paani agar mitti aur samundari namak kesiwa kisi aisi paak ghulne waali cheez ke sabab jis se paani ko bachana mumkin ho ziyaada tagayyur ho jaaye to maaye mutagayyir kahlata hai. Kam tagayyur ho jaaye ya na ghulne waali cheez se tagayyur ho jaaye ya aisi cheez se jis se paani ko bachaana mumkin na ho tagayyur ho jaaye ya mitti ke sabab tagayyur ho jaaye ya samundari namak kesabab tagayyur ho jaaye to wo paani maaye mutagayyir (tagayyur shuda paani) nahi kahlata.

Suwaal: paani kab napaak hota hai?
Jawaab: 2 qulla se kam paani,najaasat ke girte hi napaak ho jaata hai chahe uska rang.,bu ya maza badle ya na badle.aur do qulla ya usse ziyaada paani sirf najaasat ke girne se napaak nahi hota balke aise paani ke napaak hone keliye paani ka rang,bu ya maza badalna zaroori hai.

Suwaal: 2 qulle ki miqdaar kitni hai?
Jawaab: 2 qulle ki miqdaar taqreeban 192 kilo gram hai,192 kilo gram ya us se jiyada paani ko maaye kaseer yani jiyada paani kahte hain aur 192 kilo gram se kam paani ko maaye qaleel yani kam paani kahte hain.

Suwaal: wuzu ki teesri shart tafseel se batayiye.
Jawaab: wuzu main jin a’aza ko dhona farz hai un par koi aisi cheez na lagi ho jis ki wajh se paani jild tak na pahunch sake jaise mom, charbi,paint wagairah.agar us tarah ki koi cheez jild par ho aur bigair use chhudaye wuzu kiye jaaye to wuzu nahi hoga,isi tarah agar ungli main aisi tang anghuthi ho jis ki wajh se paani jild tak na pahunch sakta ho to us anguthi ko harkat de kar jild tak paani pahunchana waajib hai,yahi haal tang choodiyon aur ghadi wagairah ka bhi hai

Suwaal: aksar likhte waqt haathon par siyahi lag jaati hai kya is surat main wuzu ho jaata hai?
Jawaab: siyahi agar aisi ho jismain parat  ho to uske neeche paani nahi pahunchta lihaza use chhudaye bigair wuzu nahi hoga jaise ball pen ki siyahi,isi tarah ink pen ki siyahi aur agar paani pahunchta ho to wuzu ho jaayega.

Suwaal: kya mainhndi lagane se pehle wuzu karna zaroori ha?
Jawaab: ji nahi! zaroori nahi hai balke mainhndi lagane se pehle wuzu karna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: wuzu main kitne faraiz hai aur wo kya kya hain ?
Jawaab: wazu main 6 faraiz hain. 1)  chehra dhote waqt wuzu karne ki niyyat karna. 2) chehra Dhona 3) donon haathon ko kohniyon ke saath dhona 4) sar ke baaz hisse ka masah karna. 5) donon pairon  ko takhnon ke saath dhona 6) wazu ke a’aza ko tarteeb ke saath dhona yane pehle chehra dhona fir haath uske bad sar ka masah karna aur aakhir main pairon ko dhona.

Suwaal: wazu main chehra dhone ki hadd kaha se kaha tak hai?
Jawaab: lambayi main chehre ki hadd umooman sar ke baal ugne ki jagah se le kar thodi ki haddi ki aakhiri hadd aur choudayi main ek kaan ki lou se dusre kaan ki lou tak.

Suwaal: wuzu main kya kya sunnatein hai? bataiye.
Jawaab: Wuzu ki sunnatein ye hai (1)baith kar wuzu karna (2)rukh qible ki taraf karna. (3) wuzu se pehle  أَعُوْذُ بِاللہِ مِنَ الشَّیْطَانِ الرَّجِیْمِ padhna. (4) wuzu shuru karte waqt 3 martaba بِسْمِ اﷲِالرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ padhna.is ka tareeqah ye hai ke har ek martab panje dhone se pehle ek martaba bismillah shareef padhein. (5) donon panjon ko dhote waqt wuzu ki sunnaton ko adaa karne ki niyyat karna. (6) teen martaba donon panje dhona(har ek martaba panje dhote waqt niyyat Karein.) (7)panje dhone ke baad miswak karna. (8)teen martaba kulli karna aur naak main paani dalna (9)kulli aur naak main paani chadhane keliye teen chullu paani ka istimaal karna aur har ek chullu se kulli bhi karna aur naak main paani bhi chadhana. (10)kulli karne ke baad muh ke paani ko thookna aur baaen haath (left hand) ki chingli (chhoti ungli) ko naak main daal kar naak ke mail ko chhudarna aur phir naak ke paani ko swaf karna. (11)teen teen martaba haathon aur pairon ki ungliyon ka khilal karna. (12)teen martaba ghani dadhi ka khilal karna. (13)teen martaba pure sar ka masah karna. (14)teen martaba donon kaanon ka masah karna. (15)teen martaba donon kaanon ke suraakhon ka naye paani se masah karna. (16)teen martaba hatheliyon ko tar kar ke dono kaanon par rakhna. (17)joodon aur ediyon aur aankhon ke kinaron ko ihtiyaat se dhona. (18)wuzu ki har uzw ko teen teen martaba dhona. (19)wuzu main jin a’aza ka dhona farz hai unko farz ki had se ziyaada dhona. (20)haathon aur pairon ko dhote waqt pehle daaein uzw phir baaein uzw ko dhona. (21)wuzu karte waqt baat na karna. (22)bigair kisi uzr ke kisi se madad na lena. (23)har uzw ko dhote waqt teen teen martaba kalima shaha maanind   padhna. (24)anghoothi wagairah ko wuzu karte waqt harkat dena. (25)wuzu karne ke baad aaza ko na ponchhna. (26)a’aza ko pe dar pe dhona. (27)wuzu ke baad bacha hua paani baith kar peena. (28)wuzu ke baad  اَللّٰہُمَّ اجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ التَّوَابِیْن waali dua teen martaba padhna. (29)dua ke baad nabi e kareem ﷺ  aur ap ki aal aur ashaab par teen martaba durood wa salaam bhejna.dua karne aur durood wa salaam padhne ke dauran apne donon haathon aur aankhon ko aasmaan ki taraf uthaana aur rukh qibla ki taraf karna. (30) teen martaba surah e qadr yani إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَاہُ فِی لَیْلَۃِ الْقَدْرِ ka padhna.ye surat padhte waqt sirf chehra aur sine ko qibla rukh karna,yaha nigaah aasmaan ki taraf uthaana sunnat nahi hai.

Suwaal: WUZU KA TAREEQAH:
Jawaab: paak jagah qibla rukh hokar baithein,phir panje dhoye.aur panje dhote waqt ye niyyat Karein ke نَوَیْتُ أَدَاءَ سُنَنِ الْوُضُوْءِ    wuzu ki sunnaton ko  adaa karne ki niyyat maine ki.saath hi ye padhein. أَعُوذُبِاللّٰہِ مِنَ الشَّیْطَانِ الرَّجِیْمْ  بِسْمِ اللّٰہِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمْ    أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّاإِلٰہَ إِلَّا اللّٰہُ وَحْدَہُ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہُ  وَأَشْہَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُہٗ وَرَسُوْلُہُ  اَلْحَمْدُلِلّٰہِ الَّذِیْ جَعَلَ الْمَاءَ طَہُورًا (us ka tareeqah hai ke pehle zubaan se niyyat ke alfaaz ko kahein phir auzubillah shareef aur bismillah shareef padhein aur bismillah shareef padhne ke douraan dil main bhi niyyat Karein aur niyyat karte hue panjon ko dhoyein.)uske baad miswaak karein,phir kulli karein aur naak main paani chadhayein.kulli krte waqt gargarah karein aur naak main paani chadhane main mubaalaga karein.phir chehra dhoyein,chehra dhote waqt ye niyyat karein ke نَوَیْتُ أَدَاءَ فَرَضِ الْوُضُوْءِ  yani wuzu ke farz ko adaa karne ki mai ne niyyat ki.chehra dhote waqt farz ki had se ziyaada dhoyein,daadhi ka khilal Karein(naye paani se).phir donon haathon ko farz ki had se ziyaada dhoye.aur haathon ki ungliyon ka khilaal karein.phir pure sar ka masah karein.aur kaanon ka masah karen,kaanon ke suraakh ka naye paani se masah karen,phir tar haathon ko kaanon par rakhein.aakhir main donon pairon ko farz ki had se ziyaada dhoyein. Har uzw ko dhote waqt   أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّا إِلٰہَ  إِلَّا اللہُ وَحْدَہٗ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ  وَأَشْہَدُ أَنَّ  مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُہٗ وَرَسُوْلُہٗ۔ padhein.a’azaa ko dhote waqt malmal kar dhoein.wazu karte waqt baat na karein.wazu main har amal ko teen teen martaba karein.wazu se faarigh hone ke baad teen martaba أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّا إِلٰہَ  إِلَّا اللہُ وَحْدَہٗ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ  وَأَشْہَدُ أَنَّ  مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُہٗ وَرَسُوْلُہُ  اَللّٰہُمَّ اجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ التَّوَابِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَہِّرِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنْ عِبَادِکَ الصَّالِحِیْنَ  سُبْحَانَکَ اللّٰہُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِکَ أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّا إِلٰہَ  إِلاَّ أَنْتَ أَسْتَغْفِرُکَ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَیْکَ وَصَلَّی اللہُ عَلَی سَیِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَّعَلَی اٰلِہٖ وَصَحْبِہٖ وَسَلَّمَ padhein.aur ye dua padhte waqt qibla rukh ho, haath aur aankhon ko aasmaan ki taraf uthayein.fir qibla rukh hote hue surah e qadr إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَاہُ فِی لَیْلَۃِ الْقَدْرِko teen martaba padhein.fir tahyat ul wazu ki 2 rakat padhein.mustahab hai ke har uzw dhote waqt alag alag duaein jo za’eef hadees main aayi hain unhe padhein (jo fakheer ki kitaab shafaiee azkar wa duaein main di gayi hain.)

Suwaal: bewuzu shakhs par kya kya haraam hai?
Jawaab: bewuzu shakhs par (1)namaaz padhna,(2)sajda karna, (3)jumu’ah ka khutba dena, (4)Tawaaf karna, (5)quraan sharif ko chhuna, (6)quraan sharif ko uthaana haraam hai. Note: be wuzu naabaaligh samajh dar bachchon ko taaleem ki zaroorat keliye quraan shareef uthaane se mana nahi kiya jaayega yani taaleem ki garaz ke siwa kisi aur garaz keliye quraan utha raha hai to waalidain aur sarparston par lazim hai ke us se bachchon ko mana Karein.

Suwaal: wuzu kab toot jaata hai?
Jawaab: chaar cheezon se wuzu toot jaata hai (1) agli ya pichhli sharmgaah se mani ke siwaa  kisi aur cheez ka nikalna, (2)agli ya pichhli sharmgaah ko hatheli ya ungli ke baatini (andruni) hisse se chhoona, (3)behoshi,neend,nasha,ya kisi aur wajh se aqal ka zaail hona (4)na mahram mardon aur auraton ke badan ki chamdi (skin) bila haail aapas main chhu jana

Suwaal: kitni umr ki ladki ko chhoone se wuzu toot jaata hai?
Jawaab: taqriban 7 saal ya us se badi umr ki ladki ko chhoone se wuzu toot jaata hai,teen ya chaar saal ki ladki ko chhoone se wuzu nahi tootta lihaaza koi mard saat saal ya us se badi umr ki kisi naabaaligh ladki ko chhooye ya koi aurat saat saal ya us se badi umr ke kisi nabaaligh ladke ko chooye to wuzu toot jaata hai.

Suwaal: wo kounse rishtadaar hai jin ko cchoone se wuzu toot jaata hai ?
Jawaab: chaachi, mumaani,phoophizaad behan, khalazaad behan, chaachazaad behan, mamunzaad behan, phoopha, khalu, phoophizaad bhai,chachazaad bai,khlazaad bhai, aur mamunzaad bhai ye sabnamahram hai is liye ek ladka agar us ki apni chaachi,mumani, phoophizaad behan,chaachazaad behan, khalazaad behan chachazaad behan aur mamuzaad behan ko cchooye to wuzu toot jaata hai.isee  tarah ek ladki agar us ke apne phoopha, khalu, phoophizaad bhai, chachazaad bhai, khalazaad bhai aur mamuzaad bhai ko cchooye to wuzu toot jaata hai.

Suwaal: kya biwi ko chhune se wuzu toot jaata hai?
Jawaab: ji haan!biwi ko chhune se wuzu toot jaata hai.

Suwaal: kya satragah ke khul jaane se wuzu toot jaata hai?
Jawaab: ji nahi! sataragaah ke khul jaane se wuzu nahi tutta.

Suwaal: kya badan se khoon ke nikalne se wuzu toot jaata hai?
Jawaab: ji nahi!wuzu nahi tutta. MAKROOHAAT E WUZU:

Suwaal: wuzu ke makroohaat bayaan kijiye?
Jawaab: wuzu main bismillah shareef ke padhne,kulli karne,naak main paani chadaana,tayaamun,pe dar pe,malne,ghani dadhi aur rukhsaar ke khilal karne main se kisi ek ko chhoodna,bigair zaroorat  ke kisi se madad lena,teen se ziyaada martaba dhoona ya masah karna,teen se kam martaba dhona ya masah karna,andruni aankh dhona ya zaroorat se ziyaada paani ka istimaal karna makrooh hai. danton ki lambaai main aur zubaan ki choudhayi main miswaak karna,rozedaar ka kulli karne aur naak main paani chadaane main mubaalaga karna aur rozedaar ka zawaal ke baad miswaak karna,ziyaada garam paani ya ziyaada sard paani ka istimaal karna aur suraj ke kiran se garam hue paani ka istimaal karna makrooh hai.

Suwaal: Quraan ke chand masaail:
Jawaab: quraan ka paarah,quraan ka kinaarah,patte,jild wagairah bhi bigair wuzu ke chhuna jaaiz nahi.isi tarah quraan rakhne ke liye banaaye huye juzdaan, sandooq  ya thaili wagairah ko bhi bigair wuzu ke chhoona haraam hai jab ke usmain quraan ho. tilaawat keliye ya padhne padhaane keliye likhi hui aayatein aur suraten bhi bigair wuzu ke chhoona haraam hai.agar barkat keliye likhi hui ho to chhoona haraam nahi.jaise taaweez wagairah. Bewuzu naabaaligh samajhdaar bachcha jab quraan seekhne keliye mushaf le to use rooka nahi jaayega. Bewuzu shakhs, lakdi wa gaira se quraan ke safhaat ulat sakta hai. Dusre saaz wa saamaan ke darmiyaan quraan ho to un ke saath quraan ko bhi bigair wuzu ke uthaana jaaiz hai.jaisa ke musaafir ne apne bag main safar ke saaz o saamaan ke saath quraan bhi rakha ho to us keliye us bag ko wuzu ke bigair uthaana haraam nahi. tafseer ki kitaab main quraan ke huroof se ziyaada tafseer ke huroof ho to us ko bigair wuzu ke chhuna haraam nahi.han agar donon ke huroof baraabar ho to haraam hai. tafseer jalalain main quraan ke huroof se tafseer ke ek ya do huroof ziyaada hai aur tabaa’at ke waqt ziyaad huroof ke chhut jaane ka andesha hai.yani huroof e quraan se tafseer ke huroof kam ha baraabar hone ka andesha hai isiliye tafseer jalalain ko bigair wuzu ke na chhuna behtar hai. Quraan main paisa wagairah rakhna, quraan ko bigair zaroorat ke phaadna, quraan ki taraf pair phailaana,quraan ki aayat ko nigalna,use napaak jagah rakhna, takye ke neeche rakhna, nasamajh bachchon ko dena aur arbi ke siwa kisi aur zubaan main likhna haraam hai. us cheez ko chaba kar khaana ya us ko dhokar paani peena jaaiz hai jis main quraan likha hua ho.kisi majlis main quraan laya jaaye to use dekh kar khade hona sunnat hai.yunhi haafiz e quraan ko dekh kar khade hona. Note:aisa mobile phone jis main quraan ka aplication installed ho to use wuzu ke bigair choona ya uthaana jaaiz hai.aplication open ho tab bhi wuzu ke bigair mobile ke screen par numaaya hone waali aayaton ko chhuna, screen ko ungli lagaa kar safhe ko ulatna jaaiz hai.isliye ke mobile ya computer ke screen par koi aayat likhi hui nahi rahti shu’aawo ki wajh se screen par aks nazar aata hai aur aayaton ke aks ko chhune keliye wuzu waajib nahi albatta tilaawat keliye wuzu sunnat hai. Ghusl

Suwaal: kin baaton se ghusl waajib ho jaata hai?
Jawaab: chhe(6) baaton se ghusl waajib ho jaata hai. (1)mani ka nikalna(2)humbistari karna,(3)mout,(4)haiz, (5)nifaas (6)bachche ka janna.

Suwaal: ghusl ki kitni shartein hain?
Jawaab: wuzu ki jo paanch shartein hai wahi ghusl ki bhi shartein hai. (1)paani ka taahir wo mutahhir hona.2)tamaam badan par paani ka bah jaana,3)badan par kisi aisi cheez ka na hona jo paani ke rang,bu ya maze ko badle 4)badan par kisi aisi cheez ka na hona jo jild tak paani pahunchne se rooke.5)daaimul hadas keliye namaaz ke waqt ka daakhil hona.

Suwaal: ghusl ke Arkaan kitne hai?aur wo kya kya hai?
Jawaab: ghusl ke Arkaan do (2)hain. (1)niyyat karna (2) tamaam badan par paani bahaana.

Suwaal: ghusl main niyyat kya karen?
Jawaab: ihtilaam wagairah se mani nikalne aur humbistari karne se janaabat ka ghusl waajib ho jaata hai janaabat ke ghusl main "janaabat ke ghusl ki niyyat mai ne ki" ya ''janaabat ko door karne ki mai ne niyyat ki "is tarah niyyat kar sakte hain bachcha janne ki wajh se ghusl lete waqt niyyat karein wila maanind  ka ghusl karti hum ya wila maanind  ke ghusl ki niyyat main ne ki,haiz ki wajh se ghusl waajib ho to niyyat Karein ke haiz se paaki haasil karne ki niyyat main ne ki aur nifaas ke ghusl main niyyat karein ke nifaas se paki haasil karne ki niyyat main ne ki. In niyyaton ke ilaawa in tamaam ghusl keliye naapaaki ko door karne ki niyyat main ne ki ya naapaaki se paaki haasil karne ki niyyat main ne ki ya ghusl ke farz ko adaa karne ki niyyat main ne ki ya ghusl ko adaa karne ki niyyat main ne ki is tarah niyyat ki jaa sakti hai.

Suwaal: Ghusl main kaun kaun si sunnatein hai?
Jawaab: ghusl ki sunnatein ye hai (1) shuru main bismillah shareef ka padhna (2)qibla rukh hona (3)ghusl se pehle gandagi door karna (4)wuzu karna (5) kulli karna aur naak main paani chadhaana (6)kaana aankh jaisi jaghon ko ihtiyaat se dhona (7)pehle sar ka dhona phir badan ke dahine jaanib ka phir baaein jaanib ka(8) malmal kar pure badan ko dhona (9) baalon aur ungliyon ka kilaal karna (10)pe dar pe dhona (11)baat cheet na karna (12)ghusl ke baad donon haathon aur aankhon ko aasmaan ki taraf uthaa kar aur rukh qiblaa ki taraf kar ke is du’a ka padhna أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّا إِلٰہَ  إِلَّا اللہُ وَحْدَہٗ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ وَأَشْہَدُ أَنَّ  مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُہٗ وَرَسُوْلُہُ.اَللّٰہُمَّ اجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ التَّوَابِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَہِّرِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنْ عِبَادِکَ الصَّالِحِیْنَ.سُبْحَانَکَ اللّٰہُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِکَ أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّا إِلٰہَ  إِلاَّ أَنْتَ أَسْتَغْفِرُکَ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَیْکَ. وَصَلَّی اللہُ عَلَی سَیِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَی اٰلِہٖ وَصَحْبِہٖ وَسَلَّمَ (13) har amal ko teen teen martaba karna.

Suwaal: janaabat waale shakhs par kya cheez haraam hai?
Jawaab: janaabat waale shakhs par(1)namaaz padhna,(2)sajda karna,(3)jumu’ah ka khutba padhna.,(4)tawaaf karna,(5)quraan padhna,(6)quraan shareef ko chhoona,(7)quraan shareef ko uthaana, (8)masjid main rahna haraam hai. NOTE:janaabat waale ko quraan padhna haraam hai lekin zikre ilaahi haraam nahi, zikre ilaahi ki niyyat se quraan ki baaz aayat padhna masnoon bhi hai maslan khaate waqt بِسْمِ اللہِ  الرّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِیْمِ ka padhna,  museebat ke waqtإِنَّا لِلّٰهِ وَ إِنَّاإِلَیْهِ رٰجِعُوْنَ  padhna wagairah. janaabat waale keliye apni sharmgaah ke dhone se pehle sona,khaana,peena aur humbistari krna makrooh hai.janaabat waale shakhs keliye sunnat hai ke ghusl se pehle sone,khaane, peene ya,humbistari karne ka iraada kare to apni sharmgaah ko dhoye aur wuzu kare.

Suwaal: Haiz  o nifaas ka bayaan:
Jawaab: Auraton ko makhsoos ayyaam rahte hain jin ayyaam main unhein fitri tour par khoon nikalta hai har mahina jo fitri tour par khoon nikalta hai use haiz aur wila maanind  ke baad jo fitri tour par khoon niklta hai use nifaas kahte hain.

Suwaal: kis umr main haiz nikalta hai?
Jawaab: haiz niklne ki kam se kam umr 9 saal hai 9saal mukammal hone ke baad kabhi bhi haiz nikal sakta hai isi tarah 9 saal mukammal hone keliye jab 16 se kam din baaqi hon aur khoon dikhen to us khoon ka shumaar bhi haiz mainn hoga.

Suwaal: haiz kitne din nikalta hai?
Jawaab: haiz ki kam se kam muddat 24 ghante hai aur ziyaada se ziyaada pandrah din hai albatta aksar auraton ko haiz 6ya 7 din nikalta hai? Note : do haiz kedarmiyaan paaki ki muddat kam se kam 15 din hai ziyaada ki koi hadd nahi hai yaani agar ek haiz se paak hone ke baad kam se kam pandrah din guzar gaye aur khoon dikha to wo dusra haiz hai aur pandrah se kam din guzrein aur khoon dikha to us khoon ka shumaar haz main nahi hoga. Note : khoon ka majmoo’a kam se kam 24 ghante hon warna wo haiz nahi hai masalan pehle din ek ghanta khoon dikha aur dusre din paanch ghante aur teesre din das ghante dikha aur choute din aath(8) ghante dikha phir khoon band ho gaya to in Chaaron dinon ko haiz main shumaar kiya jaayega is liye ke khoon ka majmoo’a 24ghante hai aur agar pandra din tak rozaana sirf ek ghanta khoon nikle to wo haiz main shumaar nahi hoga is liye ke khoon ka majmoo’a sirf pandra ghante hi hai aur 24ghante se kam hoon ho to us ka shumaar haiz main nahi hoga.

Suwaal: nifaas ke khoon ki muddat kya hai?
Jawaab: nifaas ke khoon ki kam se kam muddat ek lahza hai aur ziyaada se ziyaada muddat 60 din hai aur aksar auraton ko wila maanind  ke 40 din tak hi khoon dikhta hai.

Suwaal: wila maanind  ke baad fauran khoon na nikle aur chand din baad nikle to kya wo haiz hai?
Jawaab: agar khoon wila maanind  ke pandravi din main ya us se pehle nikle to wo nifaas hai warna wo haiz hai jab ke khoon ka majmoo’a kam se kam 24 ghante ho warna istihaaza hai. Note : kisi namaaz ke waqt us waqt ki namaaz ko adaa karne se pehle hi kisi khatoon ko haiz ka khoon jaari ho gaya to us khatoon par wo namaaz farz hai jab ke us waqt ki namaaz ko mukhtasaran padhne ki miqdaar waqt guzarne ke baad haiz jaari hua ho warna farz nahi . isi tarah kisi namaaz ke waqt ke niklne keliye kam az kam اَللہُ أَکْبَرْ  kahne ki miqdaar waqt bacha tha haiz waali khatoon ka khoon band ho gaya to us par farz hai ke ghusl karne ke baad us waqt ki namaaz ko padhe jis waqt khoon band ho gaya hai agar ghusl karte karte waqt guzar gaya hai to us namaaz ki qaza padhe saath hi asar kewaqt  haiz ka khoon band ho jaaye to namaaze asar ke saath zuhr ki namaaz aur isha kewaqt haiz ka khoon band ho jaaye to isha ki namaaz ke saath maghrib ki namaaz ko bhi adaa karna hoga is liye ke asar aur zuhr isi tarah maghrib aur esha jodeedaar namaazein hai. Istihaazah :

Suwaal: istihaazah kya hai?
Jawaab: istihaazah, aurat se kharij hone waala beemaari ka khoon hai. Note: jo khoon 24 ghante se kam ya haiz ki aksar muddat se ziyaada ya wila maanind  ke baad jo khoon nikle wo nifaas ki aksar muddat se ziyaada ya paaki ki kam muddat poori hone se pehle dikhe wo istihaazah kahlaata hai isi tarah haamila aurat ko dardezah ke douraan bachche ke juda hone se pehle jo khoon nikalta hai wo agar haiz ke aqall muddat se kam ho to istihaazah hai.

Suwaal: istihaazah waali aurat par namaaz ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: itihaazah waali aurat par namaaz waajib hai albatta wo daimul hadas shakhs (jis ko musalsal peshaab keqatre nikalne ki beemaari ho)ki maanind namaaz ke waqt ke daakhil hone ke baad hi wuzu kar sakti hai saath hi waqt ke daakhil hone ke baad wuzu se pehle daimul hadas shakhs ki maanind apni andaam e nihaani ko dhoyein, us ke baad kapaas wagairah andaamain nihaani main rakhe taake khoon ruk jaaye ya ziyaadah na nikle us ke badd fauran wuzu kar ke namaaz padhe aur agar wuzu ke baad namaaz main deri ki to us wuzu se farz namaaz nahi padhi jaa sakti balke farz namaaz keliye azsarnou wuzu karna hoga. tayammum

Suwaal: tayammum kise kahte hain?
Jawaab: jab wuzu karne keliye paani na mile ya kisi beemaari ki wajh se paani istimaal karne se marz badh jaane ka ya kisi azw par nuqsaan pahunchne ka andesha ho to wuzu ke bajaaye mitti par haath maarkar baniyyat e tayamumm chehre aur haathon par pher lene ko tayammum kahte hain.

Suwaal: tayammum ki sharaait kitni hai aur wo kya kya hain?
Jawaab: tayammum ke sharaait 6 hain aur wo ye hain. 1)paani ko istimaal karne se aajiz hona. 2)tayammum se pehle najaasat ko door karna. 3)qibla maloom na ho to tayammum se pehle hi qibla maloom karne ki koshish karna. 4)namaaz ka waqt daakhil hone ke baad tayammum karna. 5)paak mitti se tayammum karna. 6)2 "zarb''se tayammum karna ek zarb chehre keliye aur ek donon haathon keliye.

Suwaal: tayammum ke arkaan kitne aur kya kya hain?
Jawaab: tayammum ke arkaan 5 hai. (1)tayammum keliye mitti uthaana (2)farz namaaz ko jaaiz karne ki niyyat karna(3)chehre ka masah karna,(4)donon haathon ko kohniyon ke saath masah karna,(5)tarteeb yani pehle chehre ka masah karna phir donon haathon ka masah karna.

Suwaal: Tayammum ki sunnatein bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: tayammum ki sunnatein ye hain. (1)shuru main bismillah shareef ka padhna,(2)qibla rukh hona. (3)miswaak karna.(4)donon haathon ko ek saath milaakar mitti par maarna,(5)pehle maar se pehle hi anguthi nikaalna (dusre maar se pehle anguthi nikaalna waajib hai)(6)har maar main ungliyon ko juda juda rakhna,(7)mitti par haath maarne ke baad haathon ki mitti ko jhaadkar kam karna, (8)chehre main upari hisse ko pehle masah karna aur haathon main seedhe haath ko pehle masah karna, (9)donon haathon ko tashbeek se khilaal karna, yani ek haath ki ungliyon ko dusre haath ki ungliyon ke darmiyaan daakhil karna tashbeek kehlaata hai.(10)haathon ko masah karte waqt bazuwon ko bhi masah karna,(11)ek haathely ko dusri haathely se masah krna,(12)wuzu main aazaye wuzu ko malne ke maanind tayammum main uzw par haathon ko pherna,(13)pe dar pe karna, (14)ek se jiyaadah martabah masah na karna,(15)tayammum ke baad jo mitti uzw par ho use namaaz se pehle zaail na karna, (16)wuzu ke maanind tayammum ke baad wo makhsoos dua padhna jo wuzu ke bayaan main guzar chuki hai,(17)tayammum ke baad do rak’at namaaz padhna. TAYAMMUM KARNE KA TAREEQAH:

Suwaal: tayammum karne ka tareeqah kya hai?
Jawaab: pehle niyyat kare ke"نَوَیْتُ اسْتِبَاحَۃَ صَلٰوۃٍ مَفْرُوْضَۃٍ"farz namaaz ko mubaah karne ki niyyat maine ki,niyyat karte huwe donon haathon ki ungliyan kushaada kar ke mitti par mare phir haathon ko jhaade phir pure chehre par phere,chehra masah karte waqt bhi tayammum ki niyyat yaad ho,phir donon haathon ko mitti par dobaara maare,phir haathon ki mitti ko jhaade aur baayaan haath daaein haath par phir daayan haath baayein haath par kuhni samaint phere ke kahi kuchh bhi hissa masah hone se rah nahi jaaye. Note:tayammum kar ke namaaz padhne waale ki iqtedaa main wuzu kar ke namaaz padhne waale ki namaaz ho jaati hai albatta sardi ki wajh se kisi ne tayammum kiya ho to wo emaamat nahi kar sakta aur uski iqtida main dusron ki namaaz bhi nahi hoti isliye ke sardi ki wajh se tayammum kar ke namaaz padhne waale par sardi khatam hone par wuzu karke namaaz ko dohraana waajib hai.

Suwaal: tayammum ka ye tareeqah wuzu keliye hai ya ghusl keliye?
Jawaab: tayammum ka yahi tareeqah wuzu aur ghusl donon keliye hai.

Suwaal: kin cheezon se tayammum toot jaata hai?
Jawaab: jin cheezon se wuzu toot jaata hai ya ghusl waajib ho jaata hai un se tayammum bhi toot jaata hai.iske ilawa paani par qudrat haasil karne par bhi tayammum toot jaata hai.

Suwaal: Najaasat ka bayaan:
Jawaab: Namaaz durust hone keliye namaaz ke arkaan aur sharaait  ko baja laana zaroori hai.Namaaz ke sharaait paanch(5) hain aur Najaasat se paak wa  saaf hona namaaz ke ek shart hai.

Suwaal: Najaasat ka kya matlab hai?
Jawaab: Najaasat ka ma’ana naapaaki ke hai.

Suwaal: Najaasat ki kuch misaalein tehreer farmayien?
Jawaab: Peshaab,Paakhaana, Khoon, Peep, wadi  aur Mazhi najaasat ki chand misaalein hain.

Suwaal: Agar badan ya kapde main naapaaki lag jaaye to kya karein?
Jawaab: Agar badan ya kapde main naapaaki lag jaaye to usey paani se itna dhoyein ke naapaaki ka asar baaqi na rahe.

Suwaal: najasat ki kitni qismein hain?
Jawaab: najasat ki teen qismein hain (1)mugallazah	(2)mutawassitwah,	(3)mukhaffafah.

Suwaal: najaasate mugAllah kya hai?
Jawaab: kutta,khinzeer,kutte aur khinzeer ke tamaam ajza wa fazalaat jaise un donon ka paseena, baal, peshaab, paakhaana, mani, wadi, mazi, doodh, khoon, aulaad aur lu’ab wagairah najaasate mugallazah hai.

Suwaal: najasate mukhaffafah kya hai?
Jawaab: har us ladke ka peshaab jiski umr 2 saal se kam ho aur doodh ke siwa koi cheez ko na khaaya ho najaasate mukhaffafah hai.

Suwaal: najaasate mutawassitah kya cheez hai?
Jawaab: mugallazah aur mukhaffafah ke siwa tamaam naapaak cheeze najaasate mutawassitah hai jaisa ke, 1) Tamaam jaanwaron ka khoon,peshaab,paakhaana,peep aur ulti. 2) Aadmi,machli aur tiddi ke siwa tamaam jaanwaron ka murdaar. 3)insaan aur khaaye jaane waale jaanwaron ke siwa tamaam jaanwaron ka dudh. 4) na khaaye jaane waale jaanwaron se juda hua par aur baal. 5) murdaar se juda hua baal aur par. 6) har maaie yani patli cheez jismain nasha ho. ha halaal kiye huwe maakool jaanwar ke par,baal aur gosht paak hai. na khaaye jaane waale jaanwar ka murdaar naapaak hai agarche use Allah ka naam lekar zabah kiya gaya ho. NOTE: upar batayi hui najaasat ''ainunnajs"hai yani kisi cheez ke lag jaane se wo naapaak nahi hui hai balke wo apni fitrat main hi naapaak hai aur ye paak nahi ho sakti albatta sharaab khud bakhud sirkah ban jaane se paak hoti hai yuhi kutte aur khinzeer ke siwa tamaam jaanwaron ka chamda dibagat se paak ho jaata hai. aur najaasat ke lag jaane se jo bhi paak cheez napaak huwi ho wo mutanajjis kahlati hai aur jo cheez najaasat ke lag jaane se naapaak hui ho aur wo kapda aur bartan jaise thhos  cheez ho to wo dhone se paak ho jaati hai aur siyal cheez yani LIQUID ho to paani ke siwa koi bhi siyyal cheez paak nahi hoti.

Suwaal: najasate mugallazah se koi cheez naapaak ho to kis tarah paak kare?
Jawaab: kutte aur khinzeer ka badan lag jaane se koi cheez naapaak ho jaaye to use saat martaba dhone se paak ho jaati hai albatta saat main se ek martaba mitti milaaya hua paani hona zaroori hai. ha agar kutte aur khinzeer ke khoon, paakhaana, peshaab, peep wagairah se koi cheez naapaak ho jaaye to un khabaais ke rang, bu aur maza paani se nikale, rang, bu aur maze ko zaail karne keliye kayi martaba dhona pade uska shumaar ek hi martaba hoga.isliye rang,bu aur maze ke zaail hone ke baad 6 martaba mazeed dhoye 6 main se ek martaba mitti milaya hua paani ho, haan agar peshaab se koi cheez naepaak ho jaeye aur uske baad kisi sabab se peshaab ka asar zaeil ho jaeye to 7 martaba paeni bahaaye 7 main se ek martaba mitti milaaya hua paani ho.

Suwaal: najaasat e mukhaffafah se koi cheez naapaak ho to kis tarah paak kare?
Jawaab: najaasat e mukhaffafah se agar koi cheez naapaak ho to us par paani chhidhke yahan tak ke paani pure maqaam ko gher le.

Suwaal: najaasat e mutawassitah se koi cheez naapaak ho jaaye to kis tarah paak kare?
Jawaab: najaasat e mutawassitah se koi cheez naapaak ho jaaye aur us main najaasat ka rang,bu ya maza ho to unka izaala hone tak dhona waajib hai haan agar be jism waali cheez ho aur uske rang,bu aur maza bhi na to uspar sirf ek martaba paani bahaana kaafi hai,paak hojaayegi. Note:han agar bahut malne aur saaban lagaane ke baad bhi rang ya bu main se koi ek baaqi rahe to kuch harj nahi,wo paak hoga aur agar rang aur bu donon baaqi rahe to paak nahi hoga.yuhi najaasat ka jism ya maza baaqi raha to bhi paak nahi hoga. thoda sa khoon aur peep maaf hai.aur machcharon ka khoon namaaz main maaf hai. najas alooda kichad jo raste main ho wo maaf hai. yuhi paani main machchar, makhkhi ki laashein maaf hai. yun hi ihtiyaat na kar sake to machcharon ke par jo aksar barish ke mausam main masjid main rahte hai wo bhi maaf hai. NOTE: jo kapda naapaak ho us par paani bahaana zaroori hai balti bhar paani main naapaak kapde ko kayi martabah dubakar nichoodne se wo kapda paak nahi hoga balke balti aur balti main moujood paani bhi naapaak ho jaayega, koi kapda naapaak ho lekin us main kisi naapaak cheez ki nishaani na ho to use kisi balti main rakhkar uspar paani daala jaaye to kapda paak ho jaayega lekin uske bar aks us kapde ko balti bhar paani main dubaaya jaaye to kapda paak nahi hoga balke paani aur balti bhi naapaak hojaayegi. washing machine main kapde dhote waqt naapaak kapde aur paak kapde ko ek saath machine ke andar daal dete hai  phir paani dalte hai aur paani naapaak kapde ki wajh se mutagayyir ho jaata hai aur us paani ki wajh se paak kapde bhi naapaak ho jaate hai, aur machine bhi naapaak ho jaati hai is ke baad agar kapde par paani bahaaya jaaye to kapda paak ho jaata hai warna  nahi.isiliye washing machine se kapda dhote waqt ihtiyaat bartein. Sukhaane keliye daalne se pehle tamaam kapdhon par ek martaba paani bahaya jaaye machine main aise naapaak kapde rakh kar jin main najaasat ka koi asar na ho upar se paani daala jaaye to tamaam kapde paak ho jaayenge aur agar koi asar ho aur paani daalte hi wo asar zaail ho jaaye tab bhi tamaam kapde paak ho jaayenge jab ke najaasat ke sabab paani ka wazan badha na ho na hi paani main koi tagayyur paida ho. Istinja ka bayaan

Suwaal: istinja kise kahte hain?
Jawaab: peshaab aur paakhaane ke baad paani ya mitti ke dhele ya paththar se  saaf karne ka naam istinja hai.

Suwaal: istinja karne ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: istinja karna waajib hai.

Suwaal: istinja ka sunnat tareeqah bataaeye?
Jawaab: paakhaana ya peshaab se faarigh hone ke baad us jagah ko mitti ke dhele ya paththar se  saaf kare aur uske baad paani se dho daale ye istinja ka mukammal sunnat tareeqah hai. PESHAAB AUR PAKHAANE KE ADAAB:

Suwaal: paakhaana ya peshaab karne ke aadaab kya hai?
Jawaab: paakhaana ya peshaab karte waqt, 1)Allah ta’ala aur rasool e paakﷺ ka naam na lena(agar koi kagaz ka tukda ya koi aisi cheez pass ho jis par muazzam naam likha ho to usko baahar rakh kar andar jaana chahiye). 2)chappal pehenna. 3)sar ka chhupaana. 4)baitul khala main daakhil hote waqt baya paav pehle daakhil kare. 5)daakhil hote waqt padhna " اَللّٰہُمَّ إِنِّیْ أَعُوْذُ بِکَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ" (yani aaye Allah!mai gandi aur khabees cheezon se teri panaah mangta hu) 6)nikalte waqt daayan paav pehle baahar nikaalna. 7)nikalte waqt kahna'' غُفُرَانَکَ اللّٰہُمَّ اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ الَّذِیْ أَذْھَبَ عَنِّیَ الْأَذَیٰ وَعَافَانِيْ" (yani aaye Allah!hum teri magfirat talab karte hai.tamaam khoobiyan Allah keliye hai jisne takleef ko mujh se door kiya aur afiyat bakhshi). 8) paakhaana peshaab ke baad istabra karna taake jo kuchh najaasat baaqi hai wo nikal jaaye. 9) baaein haath se istinja karna. 10) istinja ke baad ye dua padhe. ''اَللّٰہُمَّ طَہِّرْ قَلْبِیْ مِنَ النِّفَاقِ وَحَصِّنْ فَرْجِیْ مِنَ الْفَوَاحِشِ'' (aye Allah!mainre dil ko nifaaq se paak kar de aur mainri sharmgaah ko behayaai se mahfooz rakh). 11) qazaaye haajat ke waqt rukh ya peeth qibla ki taraf na karna. 12) kisi se baatcheet na karna. 13) peshaab o paakhaana karne keliye aisi jagah jaana jis jagah main kisi ki nazar apne satar par padhne ka andesha na ho. Namaaz ke auqaat

Suwaal: paanchon waqt ki namaaz ke auqat kya hain?
Jawaab: namaaze zuhar ka waqt zawaal se lekar ek cheez ka saaya us cheez ki miqdaar hone tak hai. Namaaze asar ka waqt zuhr ke waqt ke khatam hone ke baad se lekar suraj ghuroob hone tak hai. Namaaze maghrib ka waqt suraj ghuroob hone ke baad se lekar aasmaan ki shafaqe ahmar(red)khatam hone tak hai. Namaaze isha ka waqt aasmaan ki shafaqe ahmar khatam hone ke baad se lekar fajr swaadiq tulu hone tak hai. namaaze fajr ka waqt fajr swaadiq tulu hone se lekar suraj tulu hone tak hai.

Suwaal: paanch waqt main kul kitni rak’ate farz hain?
Jawaab: paanch auqaat main kul 17 rak’atein farz hain,fajr main do rak’at,zuhar main chaar rak’at,asar main chaar rak’at,maghrib main teen rak’at aur isha main chaar rak’ate hai.

Suwaal: Makrooh auqaat ka bayaan:
Jawaab: Paanch waqt aise hain jin main nafl mutlaq aur wo sunnat namaazein jin ka sabab namaaz ke baad paya jaata ho padhna na jaaiz wa haraam hai wo paanch auqaat ye hain . (1)fajr ki farz adaa karne ke baad tulue aaftaab tak. (2)tulue aaftaab se lekar suraj ka ek neze ki miqdaar buland hone tak.(tulue aaftab se taqreeban 20 minute tak) (3)jumua kedin ke siwa dusre dinon main ain istiwa ka waqt (4)asar ki farz ko adaa karne ke baad isfiraare shams  yani suraj ke zard hone tak. (5)suraj ke zard hone se le kar ghurube aaftaab tak . In auqaat main nafal e mutlaq aur wo sunnatein jin ka sabab namaaz ke baad paya jaata ho adaa kare to durust bhi nahi hogi. In aouqat main farz, waqt waali sunnat namaazein aur sabab waali sunnat namaazein jin ka sabab namaaz se pehle paya jaata ho padhna haraam nahi albatta agar koi kisi namaaz ko in auqaat main se kisi waqt main padhne ki taharri kare to haraam hai agarcha farz namaaz ki qaza ho yani kisi makrooh waqt main qaza namaaz ko adaa karne ke qasd se taker kare aur makrooh waqt main padhe to wo najaaiz wa haraam hai isi tarah in auqaat main sajda e tilaawat karne ki gharz se agar kisi ne aayate sajda ki tilaawat ki to sajda e tilaawat karna najaaiz wa haraam hai jaisa ke auqaat e makrooha main tahyat ul masjid padhne ki garz se masjid main   daakhil   ho to tahyat ul masjid padhna haraam hai. Albtta jis namaaz ka waqt hi makrooh waqt ho jaisa ke fajr ki sunnat ka waqt tulu e aaftaab tak hai aur asar ki farJ aur asar ki snnaton ka waqt ghuroob e aaftaab tak hai agar koi fajr ki farz ke baad fajr ki sunnat ya asar ki farz ke baad asar ki sunnat ya isfiraar kebaad asar ki farz padhne ka iraada kare aur padhe to koi haraj nahi namaaz hojaayegi. Haraam e makka main koi bhi waqt namaaz keliye makrooh waqt nahi, wahan fajr aur asar ki farz ko adaa karne ke baad bhi nafl e mutlaq adaa karne main koi harj nahi.isi tarah jumua ke din istiwa ka waqt makrooh waqt nahi balke jumua kedin istiwa ke waqt tasbeeh ki namaaz padhna musthabb hai. Ye auqaat, namaaz keliye makrooh auqaat hai tilaawat e quraan, nikah wagairah dusre umoor keliye ye auqaat makrooh nahi. Satre aurat

Suwaal: satre aurat ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: satre aurat farz hai aur wo namaaz ki sharton main se ek shart hai.

Suwaal: namaaz keliye badan ke kin aazaa ka chupaana farz hai?
Jawaab: namaaz keliye mard ka apne naaf aur ghutnon ke darmiyaan  hisse ka chupaana farz hai aur aazaad aurat ke chehre aur donon panjon ke siwa badan ke tamaam hisson ka chupaana farz hai yahan tak wo apne donon talve bhi chupaayegi warna namaaz nahi hogi isi tarah thodi ke neeche waala wo hissa jise wuzu main dhona farz nahi agar douraan e namaaz zaahir hojaaye to namaaz nahi hogi.

Suwaal: kharij e namaaz badan ke kin hisson ko chupaana farz hai?
Jawaab: farz hai ke mard khaarij e namaaz main logon ke saamne naaf aur ghutnon ke darmiyaan hisse ko chupaaye aur tanhaayi main agli aur pichli sharmgaah ko chupaaye jab ke us se ziyaada kholne ki haajat na ho haan agar tanhai main mukammal badan khoolne ki haajat ho to mukammal satar ka khoolna bhi jaaiz hai. isi tarah farz hai ke aurat ajnabi mardon ke saamne apne tamaam badan ko chupaaye aur tanhaayi aur mahram ke saamne naaf aur ghutnon ke darmiyaan hisse chupaye isi tarah kaafirah auraton ke saamne bhi parda hai albatta wo kaafirah aurat ke saamne kalaiyon aur pindiliyon ke chand hisson ko khool sakti hai jab ke wahan ajnabi mard na ho ihraam ki haalat main aurat ka chehra  chupaana na jaaiz wa haraam hai.

Suwaal: Istiqbal e qibla
Jawaab: Aine kaaba ka rukh karna namaaz ki sharton main se ek shart hai. Yaani ye ghalib guman hona zaroori hai ke seene se ek seedhi lakeer agar kheenchi jaaye to wo kaabe se ya kaabe ki fiza se jaatakraaye warna namaaz durust nahi hogi yani kaabe ke daaein ya baayen jaanib munharif hone se namaaz durust nahi hoti. Note:logon ke darmiyaan ye baat mashhoor hai ke kaabe se 45digree daaein ya 45 digree baaye munharif hona koi haraj nahi namaaz ho jaayegi, yaad rakhein ke ye saraasar galt masala hai 45digree kya? Ek digree munharif hone se bhi namaaz durust nahi hogi.

Suwaal: qibla ta’ayyun karne ka koi aasaan tareeqah bataaye.
Jawaab: Hindustani waqt ke mutaabi 28 may ke din dupehar 2baj kar 48 minute main aur 16 jully ke din dupehar 2 baj kar 57 minute main hamwar zameen  par namoodar hua gadi hue khonti wagairah ka saaya qibla ka saheeh simt bataata hai. us khoonti ke saaye ke kinaare par khade ho kar khonti ki taraf muh karne se qible ko muh hoga. isliye ke un do dinon main makka shareef ke istiwa ke waqt suraj kaabe ke theek upar rahta hai. Is liye us waqt namudar hone waale saaye ka rukh makka ki taraf rahta hai. Note:dushman wagairah se apni jaan wagairah ko bachaane keliye faraar hote waqt padhi jaane waali namaaz main kaabe ka rukh shart nahi hai basurate digar tamaam farz namaazon main kaabe ka rukh karna namaaz ki sharton main se ek shart hai.

Suwaal: chalti gaadi main farz namaaz padhi jaa sakti hai?
Jawaab: ji haan padhi jaa sakti hai albatta istiqbaale qibla aur itmaamain arkaan zaroori hai warna namaaz nahi hogi. car jaisi aisi gaadi jis main istiqbaale qibla ya itmaamain arkaan mumkin na ho to zaroori hai ke farz namaaz keliye gaadi se utar jaaye.

Suwaal: safar ki sunnat namaazon main istiqbaale qibla aur itmaamain arkaan zaroori hai?
Jawaab: motorcycle’car aur bus jaisi aisi gadi jis main istiqbaale qibla aur itmaamain Arkaan mumkin na ho to jis taraf gaadi jaa rahi ho us taraf rukh ka ke ishaare se  musaafir sunnat namaaz padhega yani na itmaamain Arkaan ki zaroorat hai no hi istiqbaale qila ki zaroorat albatta mumkin ho to takbeere tahreemah ke waqt istiqbaale qibla karega warna wo bhi zaroori nahi aur musaafir agar rail gaadi main safar kar raha ho to farz hai ke wo sunnat namaazon main bhi itmaamain arkaan aur istiqbaale qibla kare warna namaaz nahi hogi aur agar paidal safar kar raha ho to farz hai ke takbeere tahreema, ruku, sajde, aur do sajdon ke darmiyaan ke jalse ko baqaida adaa kare aur us waqt istiqbaale qibla kare baqiya arkaan main maqsad ki taraf rukh kar sakta hai aur chalkar masafaat te kar sakta hai.

Suwaal: Azaan o iqaamat:
Jawaab: sunnat hai ke mard apni panjwaqta namaazon keliye azaan aur iqaamat donon kahe aur khatoon iqaamat kahe agarche namaaz tanha aur khaarij masjid main adaa ki jaa rahi ho.baaz logon ka gumaan hai ke masjid main baajamaa’at adaa karte waqt hi azaan wa iqaamat kahijaayegi ye saraasar galat hai.

Suwaal: azaan dene ka tareeqah kya hai?
Jawaab: wuzu banaakar qibla rukh khade hokar azaan de aur agar kisi namaaz ka waqt daakhil hone ki ittila dene keliye azaan di jaa rahi ho to unchi jagah qibla rukh khade hokar kaanon main shaha maanind  ki ungliyan rakhkar buland awaaz se azaan de azaan main yu kahe حَیَّ عَلَی الصَّلَاۃ  kehte waqt chehra dahini jaanib pher lein. حَیَّ عَلَی الْفَلَاح kehte waqt chehra baaye jaanib pher lein. aur fajr ki azaan main  حَیَّ عَلَی الْفَلَاحke baad اَلصَّلَوۃُ خَیْرٌ مِنَ النَّومِ  2 martaba kahein. azaan main أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّاإِلٰہَ إِلَّا اللہ  kehne se pehle aahista yani ek aadmi sune itni awaaz se 2martaba أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّاإِلٰہَ إِلَّا اللہ aur 2martaba أَشْہَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا رَّسُوْلُ اللہ  kahna sunnat hai.isko tarjee kahte hain. Iqaamat ke alfaaz yun hai : اَللہُ أَکْبَرْ اَللہُ أَکْبَرْ،أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّاإِلٰہَ إِلَّا اللہ،أَشْہَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًارَّسُوْلُ اللہ،حَیَّ عَلَی الصَّلَاۃحَیَّ عَلَی الْفَلَاح، قَدْ قَامَتِ الصَّلَاۃقَدْقَامَتِ الصَّلَاۃ، اَللہُ  أَکْبَرْ اَللہُ أَکْبَرْ، لَاإِلٰہَ إِلَّااللہ

Suwaal: azaan ke jawaab ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: azaan wa iqaamat keliye jawaab dena sunnat hai. tark makrooh hai.

Suwaal: azaan wa iqaamat ke jawaab kya hain?
Jawaab: azaan wa iqaamat ke jawaab ye kalimaat hain. Note:Jo azaan ke waqt baaton main mashghool rahe us par معاذاللہ  khaatma bura hone ka khauf hai. Note:iqaamat main قَدْقَامَتِ الصَّلَاۃ  sune to أَقَامَہَااللہُ وَأَدَامَہَا وَجَعَلَنِیْ مِنْ  صَالِحِیْ أَہْلِہَا kahe. jab azaan wa iqaamat khatam hojaaye to azaan wa iqaamat dene aur sunne waala huzoorﷺ Par Durood o salaam padh kar azaan ke bad ki dua padhein. اَللّٰہُمَّ رَبَّ ہٰذِہِ الدَّعْوَۃِ التَّامَّۃِ وَالصَّلَاۃِ الْقَآئِمَۃِ اٰتِ سَیِّدَنَا مُحَمَّدَانِ الْوَسِیْلَۃَ وَالْفَضِیْلَۃَ وَالدَّرَجَۃَ الرَّفِیْعَۃَ وَابْعَثْہُ مَقَامًا مَحْمُودَانِ  الَّذِيْ وَعَدتَّہٗ وَارْزُقْنَا شَفَاعَتَہُ یَوْمَ الْقِیَامَۃِ  إِنَّکَ لَاتُخْلِفُ الْمِیْعَادْ. Azaan ke baad, is dua se faarighh hokar aayatul kursi padhe, uske baad dua karein quki azaan aur iqaamat ke darmiyaan ki jaane waali dua maqbul hoti hai. jamaa’at keliye iqaamat dete  waqt namaaz padhna makrooh hai.aur iqaamat khatam hone ke baad hi khade hona sunnat hai. Note:baaz ilaqon main jumu’ah ki azaan zuhar ka waqt   daakhil   hone se pehle di jaati hai ye saraasar galat hai. waqt se pehle azaan dene waala gunaahgar hoga isi tarah masjidon ki wo trustiyan bhi gunaahgar hoge jo kisi ko waqt se pehle azaan dene par israar kare. isliye ke jumu’ah ke din bhi zuhar ka waqt   daakhil   hone se pehle azaan dena aur jumu’ah ki pehli waali sunnatein padhna najaaiz o haraam hai.

Suwaal: farz namaazon ke ilawa aur bhi kisi waqt azaan kahi jaati hai?
Jawaab: ji haan!maghmum ke kaan main, mirghi waale, ghazabnaak aur badmizaaj aadmi ya jaanwar ke kaan main,aag lagne ke waqt,jin ki sharkasi ke waqt in suraton main azaan kahna mustahab hai isi tarah nomoulood bachche ke daaein kaan main azaan aur baaein kaan main iqaamat dena mustahab hai. Namaaz ke masaail

Suwaal: Namaaz ke arkaan kitne hain aur  wo kya kya hain?
Jawaab: namaaz ke arkaan 14 hain 1) niyyat karna. 2) takbeer e tahreemah kahna. 3) khade hone ki qudrat rakhne waale ka farz namaaz main khada hona. 4) surah e faatihah ka padhna. 5) ruku karna. 6) itidaal karna. 7) 2 sajde karna. 8) 2 sajdon kedarmiyaan jalsa karna. 9) ruku, itidaal, do sajdon aur jalse main tumaneenat karna. 10) aakhiri tashahhud ka padhna. 11)aakhiri tashahhud ke baad huzoor ﷺ par durood bhejna. 12) aakhiri tashahhud aur us ke baad huzoor ﷺ par durood bhejne keliye baithna. 13) pehla salaam pherna. 14) tarteeb Note:faraiz o sharaait ke ilawa tamaam baate sunnat hai, sunnaton ki do qismein hai. 1)sunane aba’az aur 2)sunane hai’aat.

Suwaal: sunane aba’az aur sunane hai’aat ke darmiyaan kya farq hai?
Jawaab: sunane aba’az ke tark par sajda sahv hai aur sunane hai’aat ke tark par sajda nahi kiya jaayega.

Suwaal: sunane abaaz ko bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: sunane abaaz ye hai, 1)pehle tashahhud ka padhna, 2)pehle tashahhud ke baad huzoor ﷺpar Durood bhejna, 3)pehle tashahhud aur Durood keliye baithna, 4)akhri tashahhud ke baad huzoor ﷺ ki aal par Durood bhejna, 5)namaaze fajr ki dusri rak’at ke itidaal main aur maahe ramzaan ke nisf e sani ki namaaze vitr ki aakhiri rak’at ke itidaal main dua e qunoot ka padhna. 6)duaye qunoot ke baad huzoorﷺ par Durood bhejna, 7)duaye qunoot ke baad huzoor ﷺki aal par Durood bhejna, 8)duaye qunoot ,uske baad huzoor ﷺ aur aale rasool par Durood bhejne keliye khada hona.

Suwaal: sunane hai’aat ko bayaan kijiye?
Jawaab: sunane aba’az ke ilawa baaqi tamaam sunnatein sunane hai’aat hai,in main chand ye hai azaan o iqaamat padhna,takbir se pehle niyyat ke alfaaz ka zubaan se kahna,takbeere tahreemah ke waqt donon haathon ko kandhon tak uthaana aur takbeere tahreemah ke baad naaf aur seene ke darmiyaan dahina haath baaein haath par is tarah rakhna ke dahini hatheli se baaein gatthe ko pakde,duaye iftitaah padhna,surah e faatihah ke pehle"أَعُوْذُ بِاللہِ مِنَ الشَّیْطَانِ الرَّجِیْم" padhna,surah  e faatihah ke baad aameen  kahna, aur aameen  ke baad "رَبَّ الْعٰلَمِیْن" kahna, surah e faatihah ke baad koi dusri surat ka padhna,har martaba jhukte aur uthte waqt"اَللہُ أَکْبَرْ"kahna albatta ruku se uthte waqt"اَللہُ أَکْبَرْ"na kahe balke us waqt'' سَمِعَ اللہُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَہٗ" kahe.ruku keliye jhukte aur ruku se uthte waqt  donon haathon ko kandhon tak uthaana, ruku, sajda,itidaal,do sajde ke darmiyaan baithak main zikr o tasbeeh ka padhna, pehle tashahhud  aur jalse main baaein pair par baithna aur daaein pair ko khada rakhna.Akhri tashahhud main sureen ko zameen par rakhna aur baaein pair ko daaein pair ke niche se nikalna,pehle qaada se uthte waqt rafa yadain karna(donon haathon ko kandhon tak uthaana), namaazi ka sajde ki jagah par nigaah rakhna albatta tahiyyat main "أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّاإِلٰہَ إِلَّااللہ" ke lafz "إِلَّااللہ"ke hamza yani alif padhte waqt shaha maanind   ki ungli uthaana.aur shaha maanind   ki ungli uthane ke baad nazar ko sajde ki jagah se hata kar shaha maanind   ki ungli ko dekhna. Aur tahiyyat ka lafz"أَیُّہَا النَّبِیّ"main pahuche to huzoor ﷺ ki zaat ka tasawwur karna agar huzoorﷺ ki zaat ka tasawwur na kar sake, yani huzoor ﷺ ko khwab main bhi nahi dekha tha to rouza e sharif ka tasawwur kare, dusra salaam pherna. salaam pherte waqt lafz"عَلَیْکُمْ"ke mainem par pahuche to chehre ko is tarah phere ke chehre ka rukh pehle salaam main daaein taraf aur dusre salaam main baaein taraf ho. namaaz main do qadmon ke darmiyaan ek balisht ka faasila rakhna bhi sunnat hai. Baaz logo ka gumaan hai ke azaan o iqaamat sirf jamaa’at keliye sunnat hai tanha namaaz padhte waqt azaan o iqaamat nahi dijaayegi ye saraasar galat hai. NAMAAZ KE MAKROOHAT:

Suwaal: namaaz ki makroohat kya kya hain bayaan kijiye?
Jawaab: makroohate namaaz ye hain ke namaaz ki sunnaton main se kisi sunnate muakkadah ka tark karna, peshaab, paakhaana aur reeh ko rook kar namaaz shuru karna, khaane peene ki cheezon ya biwi maujood hote waqt khaane peene ya jima ki taraf nafs maa-il hone ke bawujood namaaz shuru karna,neend ke ghalbe ke waqt namaaz shuru karna,bigair kisi uzr ke kisi cheez se teka lagaana,bila uzr ek pair ke sahaare khada hona,kutte ke baithne ki tarah baithna, jalsa e istiraahat ko do sajdon ke darmiyaan ke aqal juloos se lamba karna,bila kisi uzr ke apne kamar par haath rakhna,tawuz ya surat ko chhod dena, faatihah par surat ko muqadaam karna, Sajde main aazaye sajda rakhne main tarteebe masnoona ki mukhaalafat karna,sajde main naak na rakhna, qa’ada e akheera main tahiyaat ke baad duaye maasoora ko tark krna, aasmaan ki taraf nazar karna, aisi cheez par nigaah karna jo namaaz se mashgul kar de jaise munaqqash kapda, sar ya mundhe ka khula rakhna,bila haajat baal ya kapde ko lapetna, bigair zaroorat ke pishani ka gard  saaf karna, bila haajat muh par apna haath rakhna. NAMAAZ KA TAREEQAH:

Suwaal: namaaz ka tareeqah bayaan kijiye?
Jawaab: namaaz ka tareeqah ye hai ke bewuzu ho to wuzu karke aur agar uspar  ghusl waajib ho gaya  to naha kar  saaf ho jaaye aur paak o  saaf kapda pehan kar paak o  saaf jageh par qibla rukh khade ho kar azaan o iqaamat padhe phir niyyat kare .niyyat ke alfaaz ko zaban se bhi adaa kare. Phir niyyat seاَللہُ أَکْبَرko milaate hue donon haathon ko kaanon tak is tarah uthaye ke lafz Allah ke hamza ka talaffuz shuru karte waqt donon haathon ko uthaana bhi shuru kare aur akbar ke ''RA" khatam hote waqt haath donon kandhon tak pahuche. phir ahista naaf aur seene ke darmiyaan is tarah haath baandhe kh dahine haath se baaein haath ki kalayi pakde phir duay e iftitaah yani" وَجَّہْتُ وَجْہِيَ"padhe phir''أَعُوذُ بِاللّٰہِ مِنَ الشَّیْطَانِ الرَّجِیْمِ"ke saath surah faatihah padhe. surah faatihah ke aakhir main aameen  kahe, aur uske bad koi dusri surat padhe. ab kaanon tak donon haath uthaakar اَللّٰہُ أَکْبَرُ kahte hue ruku keliye jhuke. aur ruku main kam se kam 3 martaba" سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْعَظِیْمِ وَبِحَمْدِہِ" padhe ya 5 martaba ya ziyaada se ziyaada 11 martaba padhe. 5 martaba padhna 3 martaba padhne se afzal hai yuhi 7 martaba  5 martaba se aur 9 martaba 7se aur 11 martaba 9martaba se afzal hai. ruku main donon haathon ko ghutnon par rakhe, bazuwon ko is tarah phailaye ke peechhe rahne waalon ko baghal dikhayi de.phir ruku se “sami’Allahu liman hamidah” kahte hue uthe aur ruku se uthte waqt raf’e yadain karna sunnat hai.Aur itidaal main رَبَّنَا لَکَ الْحَمْدُ مِلْأَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَمِلْأَالْأَرْضِ وَمِلْأَمَا شِئْتَ مِنْ شَیْءٍ بَعْدُ.أَہْلَ الثَّنَائِ وَالْمَجْدِ أَحَقُّ مَّا قَالَ الْعَبْدُ وَکُلُّنَا لَکَ عَبْدٌ لَّامَانِعَ لِمَاأَعْطَیْتَ وَلاَمُعْطِیَ لِمَامَنَعْتَ وَلاَیَنْفَعُ ذَاالجَدِّمِنْکَ الْجَدُّ padhe phir  Allahu akbar kehte hue sajda kare. sajda karte waqt peshaani donon haathon ki hatheliyan ghutnon  aur dono pairon ki kam se kam ek ek ungli ke pet ko zameen  par rakhna waajib hai. aur sajde main kam se kam 3 martaba سُبْحَانَ رَبِّیَ الْأَعْلٰی وَبِحَمْدِہ padhna sunnat hai aur agar ziyaada padhna chahe to 5, 7, 9, 11 martaba bhi padhna sunnat hai. phir sajde se uth kar baithe jalse main donon haathon ko raanon par rakhen aur jalse main ‘‘رَبِّ اغْفِرْلِی ‘‘3 martaba padhein phir ek martaba وَارْحَمْنِیْ وَاجْبُرْنِیْ وَارْفَعْنِیْ وَارْزُقْنِیْ وَاہْدِنِیْ وَعَافِنِی padhein phir dusra sajda karein jaisa ke pehla sajda. phir dusre sajde se uth kar thodi der baithe.fir khada ho jaaye. aise hi dusri teesri chauthi rak’at padhein lekin pehli rakat ke siwa  dusri rak’aton main وَجَّہْتُ (yani dua e iftitaah) na padhein. teesri chauthi rakaton main surah e faatihah ke bad koi dusri surah padhna sunnat nahi. dusri rakat ke dusre sajde ke bad baith kar tashahhud padhein aur agar do rakat waali namaaz ho to tashahhud  ke bad Duroode ibraheem aur  tashahhud ke bad waali dua padhein warna  اَللّٰہُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَی سَیِّدِنَامُحَمَّدٍ padh kar teesri rakat keliye khada hojaaye. namaaz padhte waqt nazar ko mahalle sajde par rakhe aur tahyaat  main أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّاإِلٰہَ  إِلَّااللّٰہُ padhte waqt jab illa ke hamza par pahonche to shaha maanind   ki ungli uthaaye aur nazar ko sajde ke mahal se hataa kar ungli ki taraf kare. aakhir main salaam pher kar namaaz se faarighh hojaaye. pehla salaam pherte waqt daaein aur dusre salaam main baaein jaanib chehre ko phere. phir  3 martaba أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللہَ الْعَظِیْمِ padhte hue peshaani par daayan haath phere. أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللّٰہَ الْعَظِیْمَ الَّذِیْ لَاإِلٰہَ إِلَّا ہُوَالْحَیُّ الْقَیُوْمُ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَیْہِ 3 martaba padhte hue daayan haath sar par phere. aur 3 martaba  بِسْمِ اللہِ الَّذِی لَاإِلٰہَ إِلاَّ ہُوَ الرَحْمٰنُ الرَّحِیْمْ اَللّٰہُمَّ أَذْہِبْ عَنِّیَ الْہَمَّ وَالْحَزَن  phir ek martaba اَللّٰہُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلَامُ وَمِنْکَ السَّلَامُ وَإِلَیْکَ یَرْجِعُ السَّلاَمُ، حَیِّنَارَبَّنَا
