بِالسَّلَامِ وَأَدْخِلْنَا دَارَ السَّلَامِ تَبَارَکْتَ رَبَّنَا وَتَعَالَیْتَ یَاذَاالْجَلَالِ وَالْإِکْرَامِ اَللَّہُمَّ أَعِنِّیْ عَلٰی ذِکْرِکَ وَشُکْرِکَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِکَ اَللّٰہُمَّ لَامَانِعَ لِمَاأَعْطَیْتَ وَلَا مُعْطِیَ لِمَامَنَعْتَ  وَلَارَادَّلِمَاقَضَیْتَ وَلَامُبَدِّلَ لِمَا حَکَمْتَ  وَلَا یَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْکَ الْجَدُّ Phir aayatul kursi padhein phir سُبْحَانَ اللہِ   33 martaba اَلْحَمْدُ لِلہِ  33 martaba  اَللہُ أَکْبَرْ 33 martaba padhe. Phir ek martaba لاَ إِلٰہَ إِلاَّاللّٰہُ وَحْدَہُ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ لَہُ الْمُلْکُ وَلَہُ الْحَمْدُ وَہُوَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیْءٍ قَدِیْر   padh kar huzoor ﷺ par durood bejhe phir  لَاإِلٰہَ إِلَّااللَّہ  10 martaba padhein.phir dua mange. dua ke bad log inAllah sharif aur faatihah padhte hai ismain koi gunaah nahi. aur dua karte waqt haathon ko kandhon tak uthaaye. dua se pehle hamd aur huzoor ﷺ par aur aapke ashaab wa aal par durood o salaam bheje aur dua ke beech aur aakhir main huzoor ﷺ par durood wa salaam bheje aur dua ke beech aur aakhir main huzoor ﷺ par durood wa salaam bheje aur dua ke aakhir main hamd padhe  dua main  رَبَّنَااٰتِنَا فِی الدُّنْیَا حَسَنَةً وَّ فِی الْاٰخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَّ قِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ۝۲۰۱ Aur رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا   إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِیْعُ الْعَلِیْمُ۝۱۲۷ ‘وَ تُبْ عَلَیْنَا ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِیْمُ۝۱۲۸ padhna salf e soliheen ka tarika hai aur dua ke ikhtetam par.اٰمِیْنَ بِرَحْمَتِکَ یَا أَرْحَمَ الرَّحِمِیْنَ padhe.aur aameen  ko 3 martaba duhraye.Namaaze fajr ki dusri rakat ke itidaal main donon haath utha kar qunoot padhe.aur namaaze fajr aur namaaze maghrib se faarigh ho kar  أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللّٰہَ العَظِیْمَ 3 martaba padhne ke baad pair hilane se pehle 10 martaba لاَ إِلٰہَ إِلاَّاللّٰہُ وَحْدَہُ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ لَہُ الْمُلْکُ وَلَہُ الْحَمْدُ یُحْیِيْ وَیُمِیْتُ وَہُوَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیْءٍ قَدِیْرٌ padhe aur 7 martaba أَللّٰہُمَّ أَجِرْنِیْ مِنَ النَّار padh liya kare aur asar ki namaaz ke baad 10 martaba لاَ إِلٰہَ إِلاَّاللّٰہُ وَحْدَہُ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ لَہُ الْمُلْکُ وَلَہُ الْحَمْدُ یُحْیِيْ وَیُمِیْتُ وَہُوَ عَلٰی کُلِّ شَیْءٍ قَدِیْرٌ padhe.namaaz khushu wa khuzu ke saath adaa karein aur jo kuch dua padhe uska  maana samajh kar padhe

Suwaal: sajda kis tarah karna chahiye?
Jawaab: sajda is tarah kare ke zameen  par sabse pehle donon guthne phir donon hatheliya rakhe phir naak aur peshaani ek saath rakhe,kohniya zameen  se uthi hui rahna chahiye,pet raan se,aur raan pindaliyo se,haath pahlu se juda rakhna sunnat hai aur hatheliyon ko kandhon ke muqabil main rakhe,aur aurat ko sunnat hai ke wo raan pet se aur bazu pahlu se milaye rakhe. Sajd e sahv:

Suwaal: sajda e sahv kab sunnat hai aur kab waajib?
Jawaab: in suraton main sajda sahv sunnat hai ke 1)aba’az sunan main se kisi ek ko tark karna, 2)aba’az sunan main kisi ek ko tark karne main shak karna.. 3)Arkaan namaaz main se kisi qauli ko uske muqarrara mahal ke ilawa kisi aur mahal main baja laana, 4)sunane aba’az main se kisi qauli ko uske mauqarrara mahl ke ilawa kisi aur mahal main baja laana, 5)gair qayaam main quraan ki kisi aayat ka padhna, 6)sahvan koi aisa kaam karna jisko jaan bujhkar karne se namaaz baatil ho, 7)namaaz ki rak’at main shak krna, ye baatein agar kisi emaam se sadir ho jaaye aur emaam sajda sahv kare to uski perawi main muqtadi par sajda waajib hai albatta emaam hanfi ho aur us ne ek salaam pherne ke baad sajda e sahv kiya ho to muqtadi us hanfi emaam ki perawi nahi karega. (mas’ala) emaam aur tanha namaaz padhne waale keliye waajib hai ke wo sajda e sahv keliye jhukte waqt dil main sajda e sahv ki niyyat kare warna namaaz toot jaayegi albatta muqtdi keliye jo emaam ke saath sajda e sahv kar raha ho sajda e sahv keliye jhukte waqt sajda e sahv ki niyyat karna waajib nahi albatta sunnat hai haan agar kisi ne zubaan se niyyat ki to namaaz toot jaayegi . (masala)sajda e sahv main ‘’ سُبْحٰنَ رَبِّیَ الْأَعْلیٰ وَبِحَمْدِہٖ’’padhna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: Sajada e tilaawat:
Jawaab: quraan paak main 14 aayatein aisi hai jinhe padhne par sajda e tilaawat karna masnoon hai aur market main dastiyab quraan paak main un aayaton ki nishandahi ki gayi hai,yaad rahe ke market main dastiyab quraan paak main surah saad main sajda ki nishandehi hai lekin wo ham shafaiyon ke nazdeek tilaawat ka sajda nahi hai,shukr ka sajda hai,isliye use namaaz main nahi kiya jaayega. Note:agar koi hanafi emaam,surah saad ki tilaawat par sajda  e tilaawat kare to shafai muqtadi uski perawi nahi karega,shafai muqtadi qiyaam main hi emaam ka intezar karega aur agar hanafi emaam ki perawi main jante hue jaanbujh kar agar koi shafai muqtadi surah swaad ki aayat par sajda kare to namaaz baatil hojaayegi. Note:maslak hanafi main surah e hajj ki aayat number 77 main sajda nahi hai.baaz jagah,emaam shafai  ki iqtida main hanafi hazraat tarawih ki namaaz adaa karte hai to emaam ilan karta hai''fulaan rak’at main sajda hai lekin ye sajda hanafi hazraat na kare"yaad rakhe ke ye saraasar galat hai kyuje hanafi maslak ke mutaabiq is aayat main sajda nahi hai lekin agar koi hanafi,shafai maslak emaam ki iqteda main namaaz adaa kare aur emaam surah hajj ki aayat number 77 main sajda kare to hanafi muqtadi par waajib hai ke wo emaam ki perawi main sajda kare.(bahare shariyat)isliye shafai emaam ko chahiye ke wo is tarah ka ailan hargiz na kare. Namaaz ya khaarije namaaz main aayate sajda ki tilaawat karne par sajda e tilaawat sunnat hai. khaarije namaaz main aayate sajda ki tilaawat ko sunne par bhi sajda karna sunnat hai aur agar emaam ne aayate sajda padhi aur sajda kiya to muqtadi par sajda krna waajib hai aur emaam ne sajda nahi kiya to muqtadi ka sajda krna na waajib hai na sunnat balke sajda karne se namaaz baatil ho jaati hai.

Suwaal: sajda  e tilaawat ki kitni shartein hai aur wo kya kya hai?
Jawaab: sajda tilaawat ki 10  shartein hai aur wo ye hai (1)hadas se paak hona (2)najasat se paak hona (3)satr e aurat (4)istiqbal e qibla (5)aayate sajda se faarigh hona (6)mukammal aayat ka padhna ya sunna(7)aayate sajda ki tilaawat,namaaze janaazah main na hona (8)aayate sajda ki tilaawat matlub aur maqsud hona(9)aayate sajda ki tilaawat ek shaks se ek hi waqt main hona aur (10)aayate sajda aur sajde ke darmiyaan lamba waqt na hona.

Suwaal: sajda tilaawat ke Arkaan kya kya hai?
Jawaab: khaarije namaaz main sajda tilaawat ke Arkaan chaar hai, (1)sajda e tilaawat ki niyyat karna,(2)takbeere tahreemah kahna (3)namaaz ke sajde ke maanind sajda karna aur (4)salaam pherna aur namaaz main ek hi rukn hai,wo hai ke namaaz ke sajde ke maanind ek sajda karna.

Suwaal: Sajda tilaawat ki sunnate kya kya hai?
Jawaab: 1)khaarije namaaz main niyyat ke alfaaz ka talaffuz karna. 2)namaaz main sajda  e tilaawat ki niyyat krna. 3)takbeer e tahreemah ke waqt rafayadain karna. 4)namaaz aur khaarije namaaz main sajde keliye jhukte waqt takbeer kahna. 5)namaaz aur khaarije namaaz main sajde se uthte waqt takbeer kahna. 6)salaam pherne keliye baithna aur 7)sajde main padhna: سَجَدَ وَجْہِیَ لِلَّذِیْ خَلَقَہٗ وَصَوَّرَہٗ وَشَقَّ سَمْعَہٗ وَبَصَرَہٗ بِحَوْلِہٖ وَقُوَّتِہٖ فَتَبَارَکَ اللہُ أَحْسَنُ الْخَالِقِیْنَ. 8)namaaz main sajda e tilaawat ke baad ruku se pehle thodi tilaawat karna. Note: Sajda tilaawat ki ek shart hai ke aayate sajda ki tilaawat karne par fauran sajda kare, der na kare, awaam main se baaz, sajde ki ayaton ki tilaawat karne par fauran sajda nahi karte, bahut der ke baad sajda karte hai,baaz log kayi kayi sajdon ko jama karke ek saath adaa karte hai,ye jahaalat hai,istarah karne se sajda durust nahi hoga, balke istarah karna najaaiz hai. Note:khaarije namaaz main sajda tilaawat aur sajda shukr ke ilawa koi sajda jaaiz nahi,yani chand log,namaaz ke baad dua karne keliye sajda krte hai ye najaaiz o gunaah hai isliye ke ye sajda,sajda  e shukr nahi hai aur na hi sajda  e tilaawat hai,baaz log kahte hain ke ye sajda e shukr hai ye bhi galat hai isliye ke sajda shukr iba maanind  hai,aur uski chand  shartein hai un main se ek shart hai ke niamat ke haasil hone par fauran baad sajda e shukr kiya jaaye aur sajda shukr ke faraiz main se hai ke pehle niyyat kare,takbeer tahreemah kahe,aur akhir main salaam phere aur ye qaida hai ke iba maanind  ki kisi shart aur kisi farz ko nazar andaz kiya jaaye to iba maanind  faasid hogi aur fasib iba maanind  karna najaaiz o haraam hai. Note: jis tarah aaayate sajde ki tilaawat par sajda sunnat hai isi tarah surah e faatihah ki aakhiri aayat ’’وَلَاالضَّالِیْنَ ‘‘ki tilaawat ke baad آمین  kahna surah e anfaal ki aayat  ‘وَ یَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ  وَ اللّٰهُ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِیْمٌ۝۷۰ ko padhne par rahmat talab karna yani ye kahna ke  رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ وَ ارْحَمْ وَ أَنْتَ خَیْرُ الرّٰحِمِیْنَ۔ surah e zumar ki aakhiri aayat yani  قَالُوْا بَلٰی وَ لٰكِنْ حَقَّتْ كَلِمَةُ الْعَذَابِ عَلَی الْكٰفِرِیْنَ ۝۷۱ ko padhne par  رَبِّ أَعِذْنِيْ مِنْ عَذَابِكَ kahna surah e rahmaan ki aayat فَبِاَیِّ اٰلَآءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبٰنِ۝ jab jab padhi jaaye to وَلَا  نُكَذِّبُ بِآلَائِكَ يَا رَبُّ  ya  لَا بِشَيْءٍ مِّنْ نِّعْمَةِ رَبِّنَا نُكَذِّبُ kahna surah e waqia wagairah ki aayat فَسَبِّحْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الْعَظِیْمِ۝ ko padhne par سُبْحَانَ رَبِّي الْعَظِیْمِ kahna surah e qiyamah ki aakhiri aayat   أَلَیْسَ ذٰلِكَ بِقٰدِرٍ عَلٰی أَنْ یُّحْیِیَ الْمَوْتٰى ko padhne par  بَلَى وَأَنَا عَلَى ذَلِكَ مِنْ الشَّاهِدِينَ kahna surah e mursalat ki aakhiri aayat فَبِاَیِّ حَدِیْثٍ بَعْدَهٗ یُؤْمِنُوْنَ ۝۵۰ ko padhne par آمَنَّا بِاللّٰهِ يا لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللهُ kahna surah e watteeni wazzaitoon ki aakhiri aayat  أَلَیْسَ اللّٰهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحٰكِمِیْنَ ۝۸ ko padhne par  بَلَى وَأَنَا عَلَى ذَلِكَ مِنْ الشَّاهِدِينَ kahna surah e mulk ki aakhiri aayat yani  فَمَنْ یَّاْتِیْكُمْ بِمَآءٍ مَّعِیْنٍ۝۳۰ ko padhne par  اَللہُ رَبُّ الْعٰلَمِيْن kahna surah e aala ki pehli aayat  سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلیٰ ۝۱ ko padhne par  سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْأَعْلٰى kahna sunnat hai yani dourane qiraat jab jab rahmat ki aayatein guzrein to rahmat talab karna aur jab jab jnt ka zikr guzre to jannat talab karna, azaab ki aayatein guzrein to azaab se panaah maangna jahanam ka zikr guzre to jahanam se panaah maangna aur tasbeeh ki aayat guzre to tasbeeh padhna sunnat hai. AURATOn KI NAMAAZ

Suwaal: auraton ki namaaz ka tareeqah kya hai?
Jawaab: auraton ki namaaz, mardon ki namaaz ke maanind hai magar chand baaton main farq hai wo ye hai ke mard namaaz se pehle azaan o iqaamat donon dega aur aurat sirf iqaamat degi, mard keliye sirf naaf aur ghutnon ke darmiyaan ka hissa chhupana waajib hai,aurat apni panje aur chehre ke siwa badan ke tamaam hisson ko chhupayegi yahan tak ke apne qadam ke nichle hisse ko bhi chhupayegi warna namaaz durust nahi hogi. bila uzr jamaa’at ko tark karna mard keliye makrooh hai aur aurat keliye makrooh nahi.mard maghrib,eshaa,aur fajr ki namaazon main qiraat ko jahr karega,agar qareeb koi namahram mard ho to aurat apni maghrib,ishaa aur fajr ki namaazon ko bhi jahr nahi karegi.mard ruku aur sajde main bazu ko karwat se,raan ko pet se juda rakhega aur aurat apas main milayegi.mard keliye behtar hai wo apni panj waqt namaaz masjid main padhe aur aurat keliye behtar hai ke wo apne ghar ke khaas kamre main namaaz padhe.masjid ki jamaa’at main shirkat karna makrooh hai balke najaaiz o gunaah hai.albatta aurat apne ghar ke khwateen se milkar ghar main jamaa’at bana sakti hai. MUBTILAATE NAMAAZ

Suwaal: kin kin cheezon se namaaz baatil ho  (tut) jaati hai?
Jawaab: chand baaton se namaaz baatil ho jaati hai.wo ye hai ke namaaz ke arkaan main se kisi ek rukn ko tark karna,sharaait main se kisi ek shart ko tark karna (hatta ke dauraane namaaz main najaasat ka girna jabke usko fauran dur na kare aur satr ka khulna jabke fauran na dhaanpe), hamdan fi’ali rukun ko ziyaada karna, takbeere tahreemah aur salaam ko hamdan uski apni jagah ke gair main padhna, qible se seena pherna, hamdan koi cheez nigalna agarche wo till ke dane ke baraabar ho, ziyaada khana khwah wo bhule se ho, pe dar pe teen harkatein karna agarche wo bhule se ho, niyyat aur takbeere tahreemah main shak karna. Do rukn e fi’ali main emaam se aage badna, bila uzr 2 rukne fi’ali emaam se peechhe rahna, namaaz ka toodna kisi cheez par mauqoof rakhna (maslan dil main sooche ke rail gaadi aaye to namaaz tood kar rail gaadi main sawaar ho jauga)

Suwaal: JAM’A wa QASR:
Jawaab: musaafir agar taweel yani 132 km ya us se ziyaada faasle ke safar par hai to uskeliye jam’a wa qasr donon jaaiz hai warna jayaz nahi.

Suwaal: jam’a ki kitni qismein hain? bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: jama ki do qismein hain. (1)jam’a taqdeem (2)jam’a taakheer. Jama taqdeem:namaaze asr ko zuhar ke waqt main aur namaaze ishaa ko maghrib ke waqt main padhna jam’a taqdeem kahlata hai. Jama taakheer:namaaze zuhar ko asr ke waqt main aur namaaze maghrib ko ishaa ke waqt main padhne ko jam’a taakheer kahte hain.

Suwaal: jam’a taqdeem ki shartein kitni hain?bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: jam’a taqdeem ki paanch  shartein hai (1)pehli waali namaaz ko pehle padhna. (2)pehli namaaz main jam’a ki niyyat karna. (3)donon namaazein pedarpe padhna. (4)dusri namaaz ke takbeere tahreemah tak safar baaqi rahna. (5) gumaan ke mutaabiq pehli namaaz ka  saheeh hona.

Suwaal: jam’a taqdeem main jam’a ki niyyat kab karna chahiye?
Jawaab: jam’a taqdeem main jam’a ki niyyat pehli namaaz ki takbeere tahreemah ke saath ya pehli namaaz main salaam pherne se pehle karna chahiye, taqbir e tahreemah se pehle ya pehli waali namaaz se salaam ke baad niyyat krna saheeh nahi.

Suwaal: jama taakheer ki kitni shartein hain bayaan kijiye?
Jawaab: jama taakheer ki do  shartein hain, (1)pehli namaaz ke waqt main se ek taqbir ki miqdaar waqt baki rahte waqt jama taakheer ki niyyat krna. (2)dusri namaaz khatam hone tak safar ka baki rahna. jama taakheer main tarteeb ke saath padhna aur pe dar pe hona sunnat hai.

Suwaal: qasr ki kitni shartein hai?
Jawaab: panjwaqta namaazon main se 4 rak’at waali namaaz ko 2 rak’at padhna qasr kahlata hai, qasr ki 7 shartein hain. (1)safar ka 2 manzil hona yani 132 km  ka safar hona (2)safar jaaiz hona (3)qasr jaaiz hone ka ilm hona (chaar (4))ihraam ke waqt qasr ki niyyat karna (5)chaar (4)rak’at waali namaaz hona (6)namaaz khatam hone tak safar ka baki rahna (7)namaaz ka koi hissa puri namaaz padhne waale ke peechhe na padhna. Note:khud ke gaaon ya shahr main daakhil hone se safar munqati (khatam) ho jaata hai aur mukammal chaar (4) din rahne ka iraada ho ya koi muddat mutayyan kiye bigair thehrne ke iraade se kisi jagah   daakhil   hone se bhi safar munqata ho jaata hai,haan agar chaar (4) din se kam ka iraada kare to daakhil  hote hi safar munqata nahi hoga balke chaar (4) din mukammal hone par safar munqata hoga.  musaafir kisi jagah is iraade se thehra ke jab fulaan haajat puri ho jaaye to nikluga is surat main wo 18 dino tak  musaafir hi rahega jabke mazkura haajat kisi bhi waqt puri hone ka imkaan ho. NAMAAZE JAMA’AT KA bAYAAN.

Suwaal: jama’at ke saath namaaz padhne ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: jama’at ke saath namaaz padhna mukallifin par farz kifaya hai.

Suwaal: jamaa’at ke saath namaaz padhne ka fayda kya hai?
Jawaab: jamaa’at ke saath namaaz padhna tanha namaaz padhne 27 darja afzal hai.

Suwaal: namaaze ba jama’at padhne ka tareeqah bataiye?
Jawaab: azaan o iqaamat ke baad ek aadmi saamne khade ho kar emaamat kare baaqi log qataar main uske peechhe khade ho jaaye. emaam ka sab se ziyaada alima hona aur parhezgar hona sunnat hai. muqtadi emaam ki perawi kare. emaam namaaz ki niyyat kar ke buland awaaz se Allahu akba kahte hue namaaz shuru kare. emaam ko jamaa’at ki niyyat karna sunnat hai. emaam ki takbeere tahreemah ke baad muqtadi iqtedaa ki niyyat karte hue dheemi awaaz se takbeere tahreemah kahe, muqtadi par jama’at ki niyyat waajib hai. agar jamaa’at ki niyyat ke bigair emaam ke saath namaaz padhe to namaaz saheeh nahi hogi. muqtadi par waajib hai ke emaam ki takbeere tahreemah ke baad hi takbeere tahreemah kahe. aur agar emaam ke saath kahe to namaaz saheeh nahi hogi. emaam o muqtadi dhimi awaaz se duay e iftatah padhe, duay e iftatah ke baad emaam dhimain aawaaz se"أَعُوْذُ بِاللہِ مِنَ الشَّیْطَانِ الرَّجِیْمِ"padhe aur bismillah ke saath surah e faatihah bhi dhimi awaaz se padhe. aur faatihah ke baad pehli aur dusri rak’aton main koi dusra surah padhe. Emaam aur tanha namaaz padhne waala.maghrib, ishaa,fajr, eidain, khusuful qamar,jumu’ah jaisi jahri namaazon main faatihah aur surah ko unchi aawaaz se padhega.aur muqtadi jahri namaazon main takbeere tahreemah ke fauran baad past aawaaz se duay e iftatah padhe aur khaamoosh rahkar emaam ki qira’at e faatihah sune. yani duay e iftatah ke baad muqtadi emaam ki faatihah ka intezar kare aur chup rahkar sune. aur faatihah ke baad emaam ke saath saath muqtadi bhi unchi aawaaz se "AAAMEEN "kahe. faatihah aur surah ke darmiyaan emaam itni der khaamoosh rahe jismain muqtadi faatihah padh sake. aur muqtadi us waqfe main hi surah e faatihah padh kar emaam ki qiraat ko sune. muqtadi ko jahri namaazon main surah padhna sunnat nahi. aur agar sirri namaaz ho ya kisi wajh se emaam ki qiraat ko nahi sun sake  to muqtadi ko ye sunnat hai ke takbeere tahreemah aur duay e iftatah ke fauran baad surah e faatihah padhe aur us ke baad koi ek surah padhe. Isi tarah dursri rak’at main surah padhna sunnat hai yaad rahe ke har rak’at main surah e faatihah se pehle awoozu billah shareef ka padhna sunnat hai.Emaam qira’at se faarigh hone ke baad Allahu akbar kahte hue ruku kare aur jab emaam ruku kare to muqtadi bhi ruku kare. sunnat ye hai ke emaam ruku main pahuchne ke baad hi muqtadi ruku keliye jhukna shuru kare, emaam sajde main pahuchne ke baad hi muqtadi sajde keliye jhukna shuru kare. emaam khade hone ke baad hi muqtadi sajde se uthe. yaani har ek kaam emaam ke baad hi karna sunnat hai, magar aameen  emaam ke saath hi kahega ke ye sunnat hai. Takbeere tahreemah,tasleem (salaam pherna) emaam ke saath ho jaaye to namaaz saheeh nahi hogi. emaam se pehle koi Ii’al na kare. emaam qunoot ko unchi aawaaz se padhega. Aur emaam ko qunoot main jama ka segah istemal karna chahiye yani ni ki jagah na aur li ki jahan laana padhna jaisa ke اَللّٰہُمَّ اہْدِنِیْ فِیمَنْ ہَدَیْتَ٭ وَعَافِنِیْ فِیْمَنْ عَافَیْتَ وَتَوَلَّنِیْ فِیْمَنْ تَوَلَّیْتَ٭ وَبَارِکْ لِیْ فِیْ مَاأَعْطَیْتَ٭ وَقِنِیْ شَرَّمَا قَضَیْتَ‘‘ main ‘’ اَللّٰہُمَّ اہْدِنَا’'’’وَعَافِنَا’’’’ وَتَوَلَّنَا’’’’ وَبَارِکْ لَنَا’’’’ وَقِنَا’’ aur أَسْتَغْفِرُکَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَیْکَ ki jagahنَسْتَغْفِرُکَ وَنَتُوبُ إِلَیْکَpadhe aur muqtdadi qunoot ko chup rah kar sunega aur har waqfe par unchi aawaaz se aaameen  kayega. Qunoot main emaam فَإِنَّکَ تَقْضِی وَلَا یُقْضَی عَلَیْکَ٭ وَإِنَّہٗ لَایَذِلُّ مَنْ وَّالَیْت وَلَایَعِزُّ مَن عَادَیْتَ٭ تَبَارَکْتَ رَبَّنَاوَتَعَالَیْتَ فَلَکَ الْحَمْدُعَلَی مَاقَضَیْتَ padhte waqt muqtadi bhi us ke saath padhega lekin emaam unchi aawaaz se aur muqtadi past aawaaz se padhega. Yani us waqt muqtadi aaameen  nahi kahega.phir أَسْتَغْفِرُکَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَیْکَ se le kar qunoot ke akheer take mam padhte waqt muqtadi aaameen  kahega. Attahiyyat ke baad emaam salaam phere to muqtadi bhi salaam pherega. emaam ke"اَلسَّلَامُ عَلَیْکُمْ" ke mainem ke baad hi muqtadi salaam pherna shuru karega. emaam ke salaam ke saath muqtadi salaam phere to muqtadi ki namaaz baatil hoti hai. behtar ye hai ke emaam ke dusri salaam pherne ke baad hi muqtadi salaam phere. emaam agar buland awaaz se dua kare to muqtadi aaameen  kahega. emaam jis jagah namaaz padhe  us jagah se emaam jab tak na uthe tab tak muqtadi bhi apni jagah se na uthe. emaam ke musalle se uthne ke  pehle muqtdi ka uthna makrooh hai. Note:namaaz se salaam pherne ke baad emaam is tarah baithega ke us ke daaein jaanib muqtadi aur baaein jaanib qibla ho.

Suwaal: jahri namaaz kise kahte hain?
Jawaab: jin namaazon main qira’at buland aawaaz se padhi jaati hai unhe jahri namaaz kahte hain jaisa ke maghrib,isha aur fajr magar in namaazon main chaar aur teen rak’aton waali namaazon ki teesri aur chauthi rak’at main qira’at buland awaaz se nahi ki jaati aur wo tamaam namaazein bhi jahri namaazein hai jinmain jamaa’at sunnat hai.lekin Janaaze ki namaaz aur suraj grahen ki namaaz ko sirri namaazon main hi shumaar kiya jaayega.

Suwaal: namaaz ke farz ko sunnat samajhna kaisa?
Jawaab: namaaz ke farz ko sunnat samajhte hi namaaz baatil ho jaati hai maslan faatihah ke pehle bismillahir rahmanir rahim padhna waajib hai agar kisi ne sunnat samajhkar padha to namaaz baatil hui.

Suwaal: kya hanafi emaam ke peechhe shafai muqtadiyon ki namaaz saheeh hai?
Jawaab: ji haan hanafi emaam agar bismillah sharif padhe to uske peechhe shafai muqtadi ki namaaz saheeh hai agarche hanafi emaam bismillah sharif ko sunnat samajh kar padhe kyuki chaaron mazhab barhaq hai. Note:wahabi,najdi,tabligi,devbandi,aur shiyi wagairah gair sunni emaam ki iqteda main namaaz padhna sakht mana hai. gustakhe rasool (sallAllahu alaihi wasallam)Kaafir aur jahannami hai isliye uski iqteda main namaaz hoti hi nahi hai. Namaaze jumua ka bayaan

Suwaal: namaaze jumu’ah kitni rak’at hain?
Jawaab: namaaze jumu’ah 2 rak’ate hain.

Suwaal: jumu’ah kin logon par farz hai?
Jawaab: har mukallaf (aaqil aur baaligh) azaad musalmaan mard par jo muqeem aur gair ma’azoor ho jumu’ah farz hai.

Suwaal: namaaze jumu’ah kab saheeh hoti hai?
Jawaab: har ek gaon ya shaher main padhi jaane waali namaaze jumu’ah saheeh hojaayegi jab ke kam az kam chaar (4)0 aise afraad jumu’ah qayam kare jin main har ek fard ahle jumu’ah hon.

Suwaal: ahle jumu’ah kaun hai?
Jawaab: har musalmaan ,mukallaf, azaad mard jo mutwatin fil balad (watan banakar rahne waale)ho wo ahle jumu’ah hai.

Suwaal: jumu’ah ke sharaait kitne hain?aur wo kya kya hain?
Jawaab: jumu’ah ki shartein 6 hain. (1)jumu’ah kisi abaadi main ho (2)jumu’ah zuhar ke waqt main ho (3)jumu’ah 2 khutbe ke fauran baad ho (chaar (4))jumu’ah shaher main ek hi jagah ho (5)jumu’ah jama’at se padhi jaaye (6)jumu’ah kam az kam chaar (4)0 aise mardon se padhi jaaye jo ahle jumu’ah ho.

Suwaal: Arkaan e khutbah kitne hain?
Jawaab: Arkaan e khutba 5 hain (1)donon khutbey main Allah ta’ala ki hamd padhna(2)dono khutbo main huzoor ﷺ ka naam lekar Durood bhejna  (3)donon khutbon main taqwe ki wasiyat karna (chaar (4))kisi ek khutbe main quraan majeed ki koi ek aayat ki tilaawat karna (pehle khutbe main padhna afzal hai) (5)dusre khutbe main musalmaanon keliye dua karna. Note:alwazul a’azam,khutbat e ilmi,khutbat e rizaviya wagairah jo khutbe ki kitaabein market main dastiyab hai unmain khutbe ke chand Arkaan nahi hai isliye un kitaabon se khutba na de is kitaab main jumu’ah ke 2 khutbe diye gaye hai,unmain pahla khutba ala Hazrate qaddasAllahu sirrahul azeez ka likha hua hai use chand izafe ke saath shafai maslak ke mutaabiq banaya gaya hai.

Suwaal: kya dusre gaon ke logon par jumu’ah waajib hai?
Jawaab: ji haana dusre gaon ke logon par namaaze jumu’ah waajib hai jabke wo  musaafir na ho. lekin un logon ko jumu’ah ke sharayee tadad main shumaar nahi kiya jaayega. waqt se pehle ya waqt khatam hone ke baad yani asr ke waqt jumu’ah padhe to wo jumu’ah saheeh nahi hogi. Ek gaon main ek hi jumua qaum kar sakte hain ek se ziyaadah nahi agar ek ilaqe main 2 jumua qaim kare aur donon jumua ke emaam ek hi waqt main ihraam bandhen to donon jumua baatil hai aur agar ek ke baad dusra ihraam bandhe to wo jumua durust hue jis ka emaam pehle ihraam bandha ho. kuchh gaon ke khatib khutba padhne ke baad mimber se utar kar musalle par baithte hai ye sunnat tareeqah nahi hai. iqaamat khatm hote hi emaam musalle par pahuche aur rak’at bandhe ye sunnat tareeqah hai. Note:khutba padhne waala khatib khutbe ke waqt masjid aaye aur masjid main   daakhil   hote waqt masjid main baithe hue logon ko salaam kare aur moazzin ke pass akar moazzin ko bhi salaam kare. muazzin se asaa seedhe haath se le aur sidhi chadhne se pehle hi asaa ulte haath main pakde phir seedhi chadhe. teesri seedhi par pahuchkar logon ki taraf mutwajji ho kar salaam kare aur chouthi seedhi par baithe.phir muazzin azaan de,azaan khatm hone ke baad khatib azaan ke baad waali dua padhe aur phir khade ho kar khutba shuru kare. khutbe ke dauran seedhe haath se mimber ka sutun aur ulte haath se asaa pakde.sunnat hai ke khutba mukhtasar ho na ke namaaz se tawil. Sunnat namaazein

Suwaal: sunnat namaazon ki qismein bayaan kijiye!
Jawaab: sunnat namaazon ki 2 qismein hain,ek wo namaazein jin ko jamaa’at se padhna sunnat hai aur dusri wo namaazein jin ko jamaa’at se padhna sunnat nahi.

Suwaal: sunnat namaazon main kin kin namaazon ko jamaa’at se padhna sunnat hai?
Jawaab: sunnat namaazon main se 7 namaazon ko jamaa’at se padhna sunnat hai wo 7 namaazein ye hain (1)eidul azha ki namaaz (2)eidul fitr ki namaaz (3)chand grahan ki namaaz (chaar (4))suraj grahan ki namaaz (5)namaaze tahawih (6)namaaze istasqa aur ((7)maahe Ramzaan main vitr ki namaaz In namaazo ke siwa baqiya namaazon main jamaa’at sunnat nahi.

Suwaal: un namaazon ko bayaan kijiye jin namaazon ko jamaa’at se padhna sunnat nahi!
Jawaab: rawatib yani farz ke pehle aur baad main padhi jaane waali sunnat namaazein, chasht ki namaaz,tahajjud ki namaaz,salatul awwabin, tahiyyatul masjid ki namaaz, tahiyyatul wuzu ki namaaz, salatul haajat, istikhara ki namaaz,safar ki namaaz,tasbeeh ki namaaz, zawaal ki sunnat namaaz aur tauba ki sunnat namaaz in namaazon main chand hai jinko jamaa’at se adaa karna sunnat nahi hai.

Suwaal: namaaz rawatib kul kitni rak’atein hain?
Jawaab: namaaze rawatib kul 22 rak’atein hain un main 10 rak’atein sunnate muakkadah hai aur 12 rak’atein sunnate gair moakkada hain subah ki farz se pehle 2 rak’at sunnate muakkadah hai,zuhr ki farz se pehle  2 rak’at sunnate muakkadah aur 2 rak’at sunnate gair muakkadah aur farz ke baad 2 rak’at sunnate muakkadah aur 2 rak’at sunnate gair muakkadah asar ki farz se pehle chaar (4) rak’aten sunnate gair muakkadah, maghrib aur esha ki farz se pehle do do rak’at sunnat gair muakkadah aur maghrib aur esha ki farz namaazon kebaad do do rak’at sunnat muakkadah. Note:Farz se pehle waali sunnat namaaz ko sunnate qabliyya aur baad waali namaaz ko sunnate baadiyya kahte hain. Farz se pehle waali sunnat namaaz ki niyyat main sunnate qabliyya yani pehli waali sunnat namaaz aur farz ke baad waali sunnat namaaz ki niyyat main sunnate ba’adiyya yani ba’ad waali sunnat namaaz is tarah niyyat karna zaroori hai warna namaaz durust nahi hogi, jaisa ke zuhr ke baad waali sunnat namaaz ki niyyat yun kare “zuhr ki baad waali sunnat namaaz padhta /padhti hum’ adaa 2 rak’at’ qibla rukh ho kar’ Allah ta’ala ke waaste’’  arabi zubaan main is tarah ki jasakti hai ‘’ أُصَلِّیْ سُنَّۃَ الظُّہْرِ الْبَعْدِیَّۃَ مُتَوَجِّہًا اِلَی الْقِبْلَۃِأَدَاءً لِلہِ تَعَالیٰ’’ Isi tarah pehli waali sunane ratiba ki niyyat main sunnate qabliyya yani pehli waali sunnat namaaz is tarah niyyat karna zaroori hai jab ke us namaaz ke baad waali sunnat namaaz ho warna zaroori nahi yani fajr aur asar ki pehli waali sunnat namaaz main sunnate qabliyya is tarah niyyat karna zaroori nahi is liye ke fajr aur asar main sunnat ba’adiya nahi hai.

Suwaal: namaaze rawatib main kya kya surate padhi jaati hai?
Jawaab: fajr ki pehli waali do rak’at sunnat namaaz ki pehli rak’at main قُلْ یٰأَیُّہَا الْکَافِرُوْنَ aur dusri rak’at main قُلْ ھُوَ اللہُ أَحَدْ  padhe ya pehli rak’at main أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَکَ صَدْرَک aur dusri rak’at main أَلَمْ تَرَکَیْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّکَ  padhe.behtar hai ke pehli rak’at main أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَکَ صَدْرَک  aur قُلْ یٰأَیُّہَا الْکَافِرُوْنَ  aur dusri rak’at main أَلَمْ تَرَکَیْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّکَ   aur قُلْ ھُوَ اللہُ أَحَدْ   is tarah donon suraten padhein. maghrib ki sunnat ki pehli rak’at main قُلْ یٰأَیُّہَا الْکَافِرُوْنَ  aur dusri rak’at main قُلْ ھُوَ اللہُ أَحَدْ padhna sunnat hai. in namaazon ke siwa baqiya rawatib keliye koi surat warid nahi hui hai. NAMAAZE VITR:

Suwaal: vitr ki namaaz ka waqt kya hai?
Jawaab: namaaze ishaa ko adaa karne se vitr ka waqt shuru ho jaata hai aur ye waqt fajr e saadiq tak rahta hai.

Suwaal: namaaze vitr ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: namaaze vitr sunnate muakkadah hai.

Suwaal: vitr ki kitni rak’aten hai?
Jawaab: vitr ki 11 rak’atein hain,kam az kam ek rak’at aur ziyaada se ziyaada 11 rak’atein hain,3  rak’at se kam padhna khilaf e awla hai aur 3 se kam padhne ki  maanind  banana makrooh hai.

Suwaal: vitr ki namaaz main padhi jaane waali suratein kya kya hai?
Jawaab: vitr ki pehli rak’at main surah aala yani سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّکَ الْأَعْلٰی ‘dusri rak’at main قُلْ یٰأَیُّہَا الْکَافِرُوْنَ aur teesri rak’at main قُلْ ھُوَ اللہُ أَحَدْ قُلْ أَعُوْذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَکِ  aur قُلْ أَعُوْذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ padhna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: Vitr ki namaaz  kebaad kya padhein?
Jawaab: Namaaze vitr ke ba’ad 2 martaba dhimi aazaaz se سُبْحَانَ الْمَلِکِ الْقُدُّوْسِ aur ek martaba buland aawaaz se سُبْحَانَ الْمَلِکِ الْقُدُّوْسِ padhe phir ek martaba اَللّٰہُمَّ إِنِّیْ أَعُوْذُ بِرِضَاکَ مِنْ سَخَطِکَ، وَبِمُعَافَاتِکَ مِنْ عُقُوْبَتِکَ، وَبِکَ مِنْکَ،لَا أُحْصِیْ ثَنَاءً عَلَیْکَ أَنْتَ کمَا أَثْنَیْتَ عَلَی نَفْسِکَ. Note:maah e Ramzaan main vitr ko jama’at se adaa karna sunnat hai aur maah e Ramzaan ke siwa bakiya mahinon main jama’at se adaa karna sunnat nahi.maahe Ramzaan ki 16wi tarikh se lekar akheer tak namaaze vitr ke akhiri rak’at ke itidaal main qunoot padhna sunnat hai.behtar hai ke qunoot wo padhe jo fajr ki namaaz main padhi jaati hai yani اَللّٰہُمَّ اہْدِنَا waali qunoot,is qunoot ko qunoot e rasool kahte hain. dusri qunoot wo qunoot hai jo qunoot e umar kahi jaati hai. wo bhi padhi ja sakti hai lekin behtar اَللّٰہُمَّ اہْدِنَا  waali qunoot padhna hai.fajr aur Ramzaan ki solhavi tarikh ke baad vitr ko agar tanha padh raha h to donon qunoot ko jamaa kar sakta hai. iska tareeqah ye hai ke pehle اَللّٰہُمَّ اہْدِنِیْ فِیْمَنْ ہَدَیْت waali dua padhe jab أَسْتَغْفِرُکَ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَیْکَ tak pahuche to اَللّٰہُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْتَعِیْنُکَ waali qunoot padhe phir huzoor ﷺ aur aapki aal par Durood bheje.yaad rakhein ke is tarah donon qunoot ko jamaa karna emaam keliye sunnat nahi hai,emaam keliye makrooh hai aur wo bhi aisi karahat jiski wajh se jama’at ka sawaab se mahroom ho jaata hai. NAMAAZ EIDAIN:

Suwaal: eidain ki namaaz kitni rak’at hai?
Jawaab: eidain ki namaaz 2 rak’at hai.

Suwaal: eidain ki namaaz padhne ka  hukm kya hai?
Jawaab: eidain ki namaaz padhna sunnatein muakkadah hai.

Suwaal: kya eidain ki namaaz tanha padh sakte hain?
Jawaab: ji haan!eidain ki namaaz tanha bhi padh sakte hain, lekin jamaa’at ke saath padhna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: kya aurat par bhi eidain ki namaaz sunnat hai?
Jawaab: ji haan! aurat par bhi eidain ki namaaz sunnat hai,albatta wo apne ghar main hi eidain ki namaaz adaa karegi.

Suwaal: eidain ki namaaz ka waqt kya hai?
Jawaab: eidain ki namaaz ka waqt tulu e aftaab se lekar zawaal tak hai. lekin behtar hai ke tulue aftaab ke 20 minute hone par eidul azha padhi jaaye aur eidul fitr ki namaaz ko mazeed taakhir karna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: kya namaaze eidain ki qaza hai?
Jawaab: ji haan!namaaze eidain ki qaza hai.

Suwaal: eidain ki namaaz ka tareeqah bayaan kijiye!
Jawaab: eidain ki namaaz ka tareeqah ye hai namaaze eid ki niyyat yun kare eidul fitr ki sunnat namaaz padhta/padhti hu do rak’at adaa qibla rukh hokar Allah ta’ala ke waaste, eidul azha ho to niyyat main eidul fitr ke bajaaye eidul azha kahe.muqtadi niyyat main mazid yun kahe ke peechhe is emaam ke ya is emaam iqteda main. emaam emaamat ki niyyat kare.niyyat ke saath takbeer e tahreemah kahe phir duay e iftitaah yani wajhato sharif padhe phir 7 taqbire kahe isi tarah dusri rak’at main khade hote waqt padhi jaane waali taqbeer ke baad mazeed 5 takbeer padhe,in takbeeron ko buland aawaaz se kahna muqtdiyan keliye bhi sunnat hai. Isi tarah in takbeeron ke dauran donon haathon ko khandhon tak uthaana aur har 2 takbeeron ke darmiyaan’’سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ وَلَاإِلٰہَ إِلاَّاللّٰہُ وَاللّٰہُ أَکْبَرُ’’padhna sunnat hai. agar eidain ki namaaz bajama’at padhi gayi hai to namaaz ke baad 2 khutbe padhna sunnat hai. khwateen bhi apne gharon main eidain ki namaaz ko bajama’at se adaa kar sakti hai lekin auraton keliye eid ki namaaz ke baad khutba sunnat nahi. isi tarah tanha namaaz padhne waale keliye namaaze eidain ke baad khutba sunnat nahi. khatib keliye sunnat hai ke wo eidain ki namaaz ke baad diye jaane waale pehle khutbe ke ibtida main 9 takbiren aur dusre khutbe ke ibtida main 7 takbir padhe, isi tarah dauran e khutba takbeer ki kasrat kare. aur ye takbeer muqtadiyon keliye sunnat nahi.

Suwaal: namaaze eidain main jo takbiren hai kya un ko chhodne se namaaz baatil hoti hai?
Jawaab: namaaze eidain main jo takbiren hain un ko chhodne se namaaz baatil nahi hoti kyunki wo sunnat hai,aur wo bhi aisi sunnat jiske tark karne par sajda e  sahv bhi nahi kiya jaayega. Note:Namaaze eidain main takbirate zaayed ka waqt surah faatihah ki tilaawat se pehle hai isliye surah e faatihah shuru karne se takbirat e zaayid ka waqt faut ho jaata hai,isi tarah surah faatihah ki tilaawat ke baad takbir padhna makrooh hai. Note:namaaze eidain hanafi maslak emaam.,afzal par amal krte hue pehli rak’at main surah e faatihah se pehle aur dusri rak’at main surah e faatihah ke baad teen teen takbire kahta hai,us waqt shafai muqtadi emaam ki perawi main pehli rak’at main sirf teen takbire kahega aur dusri rak’at main bilkul takbir nahi kahega isliye surah faatihah ke baad takbir ka mahal nahi hai. Note:khitta e kokan main eidain ki namaaz se pehle shafaiul maslak emaam ye ilan karta hai."hanafi maslak main pehli rak’at main surah e faatihah se pehle teen takbire hai aur dusri rak’at main surah e faatihah ke baad teen takbire hai isliye hanafi hazraat pehli rak’at main emaam ke saath teen hi takbire kahe,dusri rak’at main emaam ke saath bilkul takbire nahi kahe balke wo tilaawat ke baad ruku main jaane se pehle teen takbire kahe."yaad rakhe ke ye saraasar galat hai. Maslak e hanafi main waajib hai ke muqtadi ,shafaiul maslak emaam ki iqteda main pehli rak’at main 7 aur dusri rak’at main 5 yani mukammal 12 takbire kahega,emaam ki iqteda main dusri rak’at main bhi surah e faatihah se pehle takbire kahega.(mulahiza ho hanafi bahare shariat) isliye shafai emaam ko chahiye ke is tarah ka ilan hargiz na kare.

Suwaal: eidain ki takbiron ke bare main bayaan kijiye!
Jawaab: shabe eidain ke suraj dubne se le kar eid ki namaaz shuru karne tak raston main,masjidon main aur gharon main, bazaaron aur logon ke izdiham main buland aawaaz se takbir kahna sunnat hai.is takbir ko takbeere mutlaq kahte hain.aur 9 zill hijja ki fajr se le kar 13 zill hijja ki asr tak padhi jaane waali tamaam namaazon ke baad takbir padhna sunnat hai. aur is takbir ko takbeere muqayyad kahte hain. Takbeere muqayyad ko salaam pherne ke fauran baad kahna sunnat hai. eidul fitr main takbire muqayyad nahi hai, isliye eidul fitr ki maghrib,ishaa aur fajr namaaz ke baad is takbeer ko namaaz ke azkar aur dua se pehle na padhe. Takbeer e muqayyad aur mutlaq ka mahboob seegah hai اَللہُ  أَكْبَرُاللهُ أَكْبَرُ اللهُ أَكْبَرْ  لَا إلٰهَ إلَّا اللهُ وَاللهُ أَكْبَرْ  اَللهُ أَكْبَرُ وَلِلهِ الْحَمْدُ  اَللهُ أَكْبَرُ كَبِيْرًا وَّالْحَمْدُ لِلهِ كَثِيْرًا وَّسُبْحَانَ اللهِ بُكْرَةً وَّأَصِيْلًا لَّا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَلَا نَعْبُدُ إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ مُخْلِصِيْنَ لَهُ الدِّيْنَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْكَافِرُوْنَ  لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهٗ صَدَقَ وَعَدَهٗ وَنَصَرَ عَبْدَهٗ وَهَزَمَ الْأَحْزَابَ وَحْدَهٗ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللهُ واللهُ أَكْبَرُ وَصَلَّى اللهُ عَلٰى سَيِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلٰی اٰلِهٖ وَأَصْحَابِهٖ وَأَنْصَارِهٖ وَأَزْوَاجِهٖ وَذُرِّيَّتِهٖ وَسَلَّمَ تَسْلِيْمًا كَثِيْرًا Zill hijja ki pehli tarikh se eidul azha tak yani 10 dinon main oont,bakre aur bail ya un jaanwaron ki naslon ko dekhne ya uski aawaaz ko sunne par takbir kahna sunnat hai. Note:Sunnat hai ke qurbana ka iraada karne waale zill hijja ke pehle din se qurbaani karne tak apne nakhoon aur baal na katein. (mas,ala):eidul fitr main namaaz se pehle kuchh khana masnun hai aur eidul azha main bila kuchh khaye namaaz eid padhna masnun hai,mustahab hai eidul azha main namaaze eid ke baad qurbaani ke jaanwar ke kaleje se iftaar kare. NAMAAZE ISTISQA:

Suwaal: istisqa ka kya matlab hai aur istisqa kab kiya jaata hai?
Jawaab: paani mangne ko istisqa kahte hain aur paani ki zaroorat ho aur talaab wagairah khushk ho jaaye ya zaroorat se kam ho jaaye to istisqa kiya jaata hai.

Suwaal: istisqa ka kya tareeqah hai?
Jawaab: istisqa ki 3 suratein hai, pehli surat ye istisqa ka mukhtasar tareeqah hai wo hai ke Allah ta’ala se dua mangna hai, dusri surat ye hai  istisqa ka darmiyaani tareeqah hai wo hai ke kisi bhi namaaz ke baad ya jumu’ah ke khutbe main dua mangna aur teesri surat istisqa ka mukammal tareeqah hai wo hai ke namaaze istisqa ka padhna.

Suwaal: namaaze istisqa ka tareeqah kya hai?
Jawaab: namaaze istasqa ka tareeqah namaaze eidain ke maanind 2 rak’aten hai pehli rak’at main 7 takbire aur dusri rak’at main 5 takbire padhi jaati hai, albatta khutbe main takbeeron ke bajaaye istigfar padhna sunnat hai. isi tarah dusre khutbe main dua ke waqt khatib qible ka rukh karega aur khatib aur haazireen dusre khutbe ke waqt apni chaadaron ko ultege.yani apni chaadar ke upari kinare ko niche aur daaein shane par rahne waale kinare ko baaein shane par aur baya shane par rahne waale kinare ko dahine shane par kare. Hakim e islaam keliye sunnat hai ke namaaz keliye nikalne se pehle logon ko tauba karne, sadqa dene aur 3 roze rakhne ka hukm de phir chauthe din bahaalat e roza  paak o  saaf ho kar khushu o khuzu ke saath sare logo ko sahra ki taraf le chale aur unke saath budhe,bachche aur jaanwar bhi ho. sahra pahuchne ke baad " اَلصَّلٰوۃُ جَامِعَۃٌ" pukare,uske baad namaaz padhaye phir 2 khutbe de. agar roza rakhne par hakim e islaam ka hukm ho to logo par roza rakhna farz ho jaayega. Namaaze kusufain:

Suwaal: kusufain ka kya matlab hai?
Jawaab: chand aur suraj grahan ko kusufain kahte hai.

Suwaal: kusufain ki namaaz ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: kusufain ki namaaz sunnate muakkadah hai.

Suwaal: kusufain ki namaaz ka tareeqah kya hai?
Jawaab: namaaze kusufain ka mukhtasar tareeqah ye hai ke fajr ki sunnat ke maanind 2 rak’at padhna hai phir adnal kamaal yani darmiyaani tareeqah ye hai ke 2 rak’at is tarah padhi jaaye ke har rak’at main 2 qiyam,2 qiraat aur 2 ruku ho aur uska mukammal tareeqah ye hai ke pehle qiyam main faatihah ke baad mukammal surah baqara padhna ya mukhtalif suraton main se surah e bakra ki miqdaar aayatein padhna, dusre qiyam main 200 aayatein padhna,teesre qiyam main 150 aayatein aur chauthe qayam main 100 aayatein padhna hai. pehle ruku aur pehle sajde main surah e bakra ki 100 aayaton ki miqdaar ,dusre ruku aur dusre sajde main 80 aayaton ki miqdaar,teesri ruku aur teesre sajde main 70 aayaton ki miqdaar aur chauthe main 50 aayaton ki miqdaar tasbeeh padhna hai. Namaaze kusufain ke baad do khutbe dena sunnat hai.namaaze kusufeen ka waqt grahan ki ibtida se chaand ya suraj ke mukammal roshan hone tak hai. NAMAAZE TARAWIH:

Suwaal: namaaze tarawih ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: maah e ramzaan ki tamaam raaton main namaaze tarawih ka padhna tamaam mukallaf mard aurat keliye sunnate muakkadah hai aur tark karna makrooh hai.

Suwaal: namaaze tarawih ka tareeqah kya hai?
Jawaab: namaaze tarawih ki 20 rak’atein hai aur namaaze tarawih main har 2 rak’at ke baad salaam pherna waajib hai.agar koi tarawih ki niyyat se 2 se ziyaada rak’ato ko ek hi salaam se padhe to namaaz baatil hojaayegi. tarawih ka tareeqah ye hai ke pehle yu niyyat kare ke taraaweeh ki sunnat namaaz padhta /padhti hu 2 rak’at adaa qibla rukh ho kar Allah ta’ala ke waaste, muqtadi ho to niyyat main mazid yu kahe ke peechhe is emaam ke ya is emaam ki iqteda main phir takbeere tahreemah kahe aur har rak’at ke qiyaam main surah e faatihah ka padhna waajib hai aur surah faatihah ke baad kisi bhi surat ke kamaz kam ek aayat ka padhna sunnat hai aur mukammal quraan ka padhna afzal hai. tarawih ki namaaz tanha bhi padhi ja sakti hai albatta jamaa’at se padhna sunnat hai jab tarawih namaaz ko jama’at se padhe to niyyat main jama’at ki niyyat kare. namaaze tarawih ki jamaa’at shuru hone se pehle kisi ek ka "اَلصَّلٰوۃُ جَامِعَۃ" pukarna sunnat hai. khwatin ghar main namaaze tarawih ki jama۔at qayim kar sakti hai aur agar jama’at qayim na kar paye to tanha padhne ki koshish kare,tarawih ki namaaz ko tark na kare.

Suwaal: NAMAAZE ISTEKHARAH:
Jawaab: Jab aap koi jaaiz kaam karne ka iraada karein to us waqt istekhare ki 2 rak’atein padhna sunnat hai.pehli rakat main surah e faatihah ke bad surah Kaafiroon aur dusri rak’at main surah e faatihah ke baad surah e ikhlas padhein ye sunnat hai.jab namaaz se faarigh hon to Allah se ye dua mange. اَللّٰہُمَّ إِنِّیْ أَسْتَخِیْرُکَ بِعِلْمِکَ وَأَسْتَقْدِرُکَ بِقُدْرَتِکَ وَأَسْأَلُکَ مِنْ فَضْلِکَ الْعَظِیْمِ فَإِنَّکَ تَقْدِرُ وَلاَ أَقْدِرُ وَتَعْلَمُ وَلاَ أَعْلَمُ وَ أَنْتَ عَلاَّمُ الْغُیُوبِ۔اَللّٰہُمَّ إِنْ کُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ ہٰذَا الْأَمْرَ (yaha apni haajat ka nam le) خَیْرٌ لِّیْ فِیْ دِیْنِیْ وَدُنْیَایَ وَمَعَاشِیْ وَعَاقِبَۃِ أَمْرِیْ وَعَاجِلِہٖ وَاٰجِلِہٖ فَاقْدُرْہُ لِیْ اَللّٰہُمَّ وَیَسِّرْہُ لِیْ ثُمَّ بَارِکْ لِیْ فِیْہِ وَإِنْ کُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ ہٰذَا الْأَمْرَ(apni haajat ka naam le) شَرٌّلِّیْ فِیْ دِیْنِیْ وَ دُنْیَایَ وَمَعَاشِیْ وَعَاقِبَۃِ أَمْرِیْ وَعَاجِلِہٖ وَاٰجِلِہٖ فَاصْرِفْہُ عَنِّیْ وَاصْرِفْنِیْ عَنْہُ وَاقْدُرْلِیْ الْخَیْرَ حَیْثُ کَانَ ثُمَّ رَضِّنِیْ بِہِ . TARJUMA:Ai Allah! mai tujhse tere ilm ke wasile se khair talab karta hun aur teri taaqat ke wasile se taaqat talab karta hun aur mai tujhse tere azeem karam ka talabgaar hun beshak tu taaqat rakhta hai aur mujh main koi taaqat nahi.tu janta hai aur mai kuch nahi janta.aur tu gaib ki batein achchi tarha janta hai.ai Allah tu janta hai ke mainre deen o duniya mainri ma’eshat mainre mua’amle ke nataaij main deri se ya jaldi se hone waale umoor main tere ilm main mainra ye kaam khair hai to usko mainre liye mumkin bana aur usmain barkat ata farma kar mainre liye aasan bana aur agar tere ilm main mainre deen o duniya mainri zindagi main aur mainre mua’amle ke nataaij,jaldi aur deri se hone waale mu’amilon main ye kam mainre haqq main bura hai to us ko  mujhse pher de aur mujh ko isse bacha le. aur jis taraf bhi bhalayi ho mujhe use karne ki taaqat de.phir mujhe is par razi rakh. dua ki shurua’at aur ikhtitaam Allah ki hamd aur nabi kareem  ﷺ par Durood o salaam se karein.istikhare ki namaaz wa dua ke bad jis mua’amle keliye istikhara kiya tha us muaamle ke karne ya na karne main jis taraf dil maaill ho use kar guzrein. Agar istikhara karne ke bawujood dil kisi taraf mail na ho to baar baar istikhare ki namaaz o dua padhte rahe yahan tak ke dil kisi ek cheez par jam jaaye albatta agar baar baar namaaz wa dua karne ke bawujood kch samajh main na aaye aur us kaam main takeer kar sakte hain to takeer kare warna kam shuru kar den is surat main yahi Allah ki taraf se ijaazat ka isharah hoga.

Suwaal: CHASHT KI NAMAAZ:
Jawaab: Chasht ki namaaz kam se kam 2 aur ziyaada se ziyaada 12 rak’atein hain.aur behtar hai ke ye namaaz 2rak’at kar ke padhein aur 8 rak’at se ziyaada na padhein. suraj nikalne ke bad suraj ke ek nezey ki mikdaar buland hone par chasht ki namaaz ka waqt shuru hota hai.yane suraj nikalne ke taqriban 20 min baad aur ye waqt zawaal tak rahta hai.afzal ye hai ke fajr e sadik ke baad chauthayi din guzarne par namaaze chasht adaa karein.namaaze chasht main har pehli rakat main surah’’ وَالشَّمْسِ’’ aur dusri rak’at main ’’ وَالضُّحٰی’’padhein. CHASHT KI NAMAAZ KE BAD PADHI jaane WAALI DUA: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنَّ الضُّحَاءَ ضُحَاؤُكَ، وَالْبَهَاءَ بَهَاؤُكَ، وَالْجَمَالَ جَمَالُكَ، وَالْقُوَّةَ قُوَّتُكَ،وَالْقُدْرَةَ قُدْرَتُكَ،وَالْعِصْمَةَ عِصْمَتُكَ.اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنْ كَانَ رِزْقِيْ فِي السَّمَاءِ فَأَنْزِلْهُ، وَإِنْ كَانَ فِي الْأَرْضِ فَأَخْرِجْهُ، وَإِنْ كَانَ مُعْسِرًا فَيَسِّرْهُ، وَإِنْ كَانَ حَرَامًا فَطَهِّرْهُ، وَإِنْ كَانَ بَعِيْدًا فَقَرِّبْهُ بِحَقِّ ضُحَائِكَ وَبَهَائِكَ وَجَمَالِكَ وَقُوَّتِكَ وَقُدْرَتِكَ اٰتِنِيْ مَا اٰتَيْتَ عِبَادَكَ الصَّالِحِيْنَ. TARJUMA:Ai Allah raushni khubsurti aur jamaal tera paida kiya hua hai.ai Allah taakat quwwat aur paak daamani teri taraf se hai. ai Allah! agar mainra rizk aasmaan main hoto use nazil farma aur agar zameen  main hoto use nikaal de. agar dushwar hoto use aasan farma de. agar haraam ho to use paak farma de. agar dur ho to use qareeb farma de. teri paida ki hui raushni khubsurti jamaal taakat aur qudrat ke wasile se mujhe wo cheez ata farma jo tu ne apne nek bandon ko ata farmayi.

Suwaal: Ishraaq ki namaaz:
Jawaab: Ishraaq ki 2 rak’at sunnat hai namaaze ishraaq ka waqt tulu e aaftaab se le kar zawaal tak hai aur behtar hai ke suraj niklne ke 20 mint hone ke baad hi ishraaq ki namaaz adaa Karein.

Suwaal: Awwabeen ki namaaz:
Jawaab: Namaaze awwabeen 20 rak’aten hai. Is namaaz ka waqt maghrib aur esha ke darmiyaan hai. Ye kam se kam 2 rakat hai, akshar ulama 6 rak’aten adaa karte hai.

Suwaal: Tahajjud ki namaaz:
Jawaab: Namaaze tahajjud ki kam se kam 2 rak’at hai ,jitni rak’aten bhi chahen padh sakte hain. Raat ke ek neend ke baad tahajjud ka waqt   daakhil   ho jaata hai aur sone se pehle namaaze esha nahi padhe to sirf neend se tahajjud ka waqt   daakhil   nahi hota balke esha ki namaaz ko adaa karne ke baad hi tahajjud ka waqt   daakhil   ho jaata hai.

Suwaal: Tasbeeh ki namaaz:
Jawaab: Salatuttasbeeeh ki chaar (4) rak’aten hai din main salatuttasbeeh adaa karte waqt Chaaron rak’at ko ek salaam se padhna behtar hai jab ke raat main do do kar ke chaar (4) rak’at padhna behtar hai. Is ki pehli rak’at main ‘’ أَلْہٰکُمُ التَّکَاثُر’’dusri rak’at main‘’ وَالْعَصْرِ’’teesri rak’at main ‘’ کَافِرُون’’aur chouti rak’at main ‘‘’ إِخْلَاصِ’’padhna sunnat hai.  Is ki har ek rak’at main 75 baar سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ وَلَا إِلٰہَ إِلاَّ اللّٰہُ وَاللّٰہُ أَکْبَرُ وَلَاحَوْلَ وَلَاقُوَّۃَ إِلاَّ بِاللّٰہِ الْعَلِیِّ الْعَظِیْمِ  padhein. Is namaaz main is tasbeeh ka padhne ka tareeqah ye hai ke har rak’at main qiraaat mukammal hone ke baad 15 martaba padhein aur rukoo, itidaal, 2 sajdon aur 2 sajdon ke darmiyaan jalse main das das martaba padhein isi tarah jalsa  e istiraahat main 10 aur qa’ade main tashahhud se pehle 10 martaba padhein jalsa e istirahat main 10 martaba padi jaane waali tasbeeh ko qiraat ke baad aur qiraat ke baad 15 martaba padhi jaane waali tasbeeh ko qiraat se pehle padh sakte hain qoule mutamat ki bina par salatuttasbeeh ka shumaar nafl mutlaq main hota hai. Salatuttasbeeh se salaam pherne se pehle padhe: اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ تَوْفِيْقَ أَهْلِ الْهُدَى وَأَعْمَالَ أَهْلِ الْيَقِيْنِ وَمُنَاصَحَةَ أَهْلِ التَّوْبَةِ وَعَزْمَ أَهْلِ الصَّبْرِ وَجِدَّ أَهْلِ الْخَشْيَةِ وَطَلَبَ أَهْلِ الرَّغْبَةِ وَتَعَبُّدَ أَهْلِ الْوَرَعِ وَعِرْفَانَ أَهْلِ الْعِلْمِ حَتَّى أَخَافَكَ اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّيْ أَسْأَلُكَ مَخَافَةً تَحْجِزُنِيْ عَنْ مَعَاصِيْكَ حَتَّى أَعْمَلَ بِطَاعَتِكَ عَمَلًا أَسْتَحِقُّ بِهِ رِضَاكَ وَحَتَّى أُنَاصِحَكَ بِالتَّوْبَةِ خَوْفًا مِّنْكَ وَحَتَّى أُخْلِصَ لَكَ النَّصِيْحَةَ حَيَاءً مِّنْكَ وَحَتَّى أَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَيْكَ فِي الْأُمُورِ كُلِّهَا حُسْنَ ظَنٍّ بِكَ سُبْحَانَ خَالِقِ النُّورِ. Tarjuma:.AIi Allah! mai tujh se raah e hidayat par chalne waalon ki taufiq. Ahl e yakeen ke a’amaal tauba karne waalon ka khulus sabr karne waalon ki himmat ahl e khashyat ki koshish ahl e ragbat ki talab. ihtiyaat karne waalon ki iba maanind  aur ilm waalon ka irfaan mangta hun taake mai tujhse daru. ai Allah! mai tujh se aisa khauf mangta hun jo mujhe teri nafarmani se bachaye taake mai teri farmabardari ka aisa kaam karu jo mujhe teri raza ka mustahiq bana de. aur tujh se darte hue sirf tere liye tauba karu tujh se haya karte hue sirf teri khair khwahi karu. aur tujh se husn e zann rakhte hue tamaam muaamalaat main tujh par bharosa karu tamaam aibon se paak hai noor ko paida farmane waala.

Suwaal: Zawaal ki sunnat namaaz:
Jawaab: Zawaal ki sunnat chaar (4) rak’atein hain. Kam se kam 2 rak’at hai. Is ka waqt zawaal se shuru ho jaata hai.

Suwaal: Mazeed chand namaazein:
Jawaab: hajj o umrah keliye ihraam bandhne se pehle, safar keliye rawaana hote waqt, nikaah se pehle dulhan ke waali aur dulha keliye, ghar se nikalne se pehle, kisi haajat ke husool keliye dua karne se pehle, Tawaaf ke baad, wuzu ke baad, quraan ko hifz karne ke baad,  musaafir apne maqsad main pahunchne ke baad, safar se waapas aane ke baad, ghar ke andar   daakhil   hone ke baad, hamaam se nikalne ke baad, dulha aur dulhan keliye pehli raat main, tauba se pehle, tauba karne ke baad aur masjid main   daakhil hone par do do rak’at padhna sunnat hain.isi tarah pehli martaba kisi ilaqe se guzarte waqt aur aisi jagah se guzarte waqt jahan koi Allah ki iba maanind  karne waala na ho to do rak’at namaaz adaa karna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: BADI RAATON MAIN PADHI jaane WAALI NAMAAZEIN:
Jawaab: Shabe eidain, shabe baraat, shabe qadr, shabe mi’araaj, Ramzaan ki 29vi raat,  shabe aashuraa aur  shabe taasu’aa badi raat kahi jaati hain. in raaton main Allah ta’ala ki iba maanind on ke zariye shab bedaari sunnat hai. isliye in raaton ko salatuttasbeeh, salatul awwabeen, nafl mutlaq, vitr ki namaaz 11 rak’atein padh kar shab bedaari ki jaa sakti hai.hamare ilaqe main badi raaton main namaazon ke mutalliq parcha baanta jaata hai jismain kayi kayi rak’atein padhne ki targheeb di jaati hai, pakistaani panj soorah jaisi chand ilaqaayi kitaabon main in namaazon ki badi badi fazeelatein bayaan ki gayi hain. yaad rahe ke in namaazon ko salatulrraghaaib kaha jaata hai is silsile main riwaayat ayi hai wo mauzoo hai isliye in namaazon ka padhna naajaaiz o gunaah hai.

Suwaal: Janaaze ka bayaan
Jawaab: Marz bhi ek bahut badi ni’amat hai Hazrate jaabir raziyAllahu anhu se riwaayat hai ke rasool ﷺ ummu saaib ke paas tashreef le gaye farmaaya tujhe kya hua hai jo kaanp rahi hai arz ki bukhaar hai khuda us main barkat na kare farmaaya bukhaar ko bura na kaho ke wo aadmi ki khataaon ko is tarah dur karta hai jaise bhatti lohe ke mail ko (muslim shareef) bas sabar karna chahiye,Hazrate anas raziyAllahu anhu se riwaayat hai huzoor ﷺ farmate hai ke Allah azzawajalla famaata hai jab apne bandey ki aankhen le lun phir wo sabar kare to aankhon ke badle use jannat dunga(bukhaari shareef) Insaan har waqt mout ko yaad kare, ye sunnat hai, mout ko yad karte rahne se Allah ka khouf paida hota hai, aur insaan gunaahon se baaz aata hai. Aur khaalis touba kar ke har waqt marne ki tayyaari main rahta hai. Hazrate abu huraira raziyAllahu anhu se riwaayat hai ke hamare aaqa do aalam ke maalik wa mukhtaar ﷺ ne farmaaya ke lazzaton ko tod dene waali mout ko kasrat se yaad kiya karo. Har insaan par farz hai ke jab bhi us se gunaah sar zad ho jaaye to fauran touba kare mareez ka har waqt touba kar ke mout ki tayyari main rahna sunnate muakkadah hai.

Suwaal: Iya maanind  e mareez:
Jawaab: Beemaar ki ziyaarat karna sunnat hai jab ke beemaar faasiq na aur bad mazhab na ho pas faasiq aur badmazhab ki ziyaarat karna makrooh hai. Anas raziyAllahu anhu se riwaayat hai ke huzoor ﷺ ne farmaaya ke jo achchi tarah wuzu kare bagarz e sawaab apne musalmaan bhai ki eya maanind  ko jaaye, jahannam se 60 baras ki raah dur kardiya gaya(abu dawud ) abdullahibnu abbas raziyAllahu anhuma se riwaayat hai ke sayyiduna Muhammad ﷺ ne farmaaya jab koi musalmaan kisi musalmaan ki eya maanind  ko jaaye to 7baar ye dua padhe” أَسْأَلُ اللّٰہَ الْعَظِیْمَ رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْکَرِیْمِ أَنْ یَشْفِیَکَ” agar mout nahi aayi hai to use shifa hojaayegi(abu dawud, turmuzi shareef) ziyaarat karne waale ka mareez ke paas bila zaroorat ziyaada der theherna ma krooh hai. Aur mareez ko khaane aur dawa pene ky liye zabardasti karna makrooh hai.

Suwaal: Sakaratul mout:
Jawaab: Jab kisi shakhs par mout ka asar zahir ho to us ko daen karwat pe lita do is tarah ke badan ke saamne ka hissa qibla rukh ho , phir us ke paas baith kar kalima shareef ki talqeen is tarah Karein ke koi us ke paas buland aawaaz se ek martaba kahe ke” لَاإِلٰہَ إِلَّا اللہُ” phir khaamosh ho jaaye agar wo kalima nahi padhe to thodi der baad dubaara ek martaba talqeen kare lekin us ko padhne ka hukm na dein, jab wo ek dafa padh le to talqeen karne waala chup ho jaaye, ye koshish na kare ke kalima baraabar jaari rahe aur padhte padhte dam nikal jaaye, balke us ke muh se jo aakhiri bat nikle wo kalima hona chahiye, haan agar kalima padh lene ke baad phir koi dunyawi baat kare to dubaara kalima ki talqeen kare, jab wo padh le to chup ho jaaye aur us ke qareeb baith kar jahran surah e yaseen ki tilaawat kare, lekin wo past aawaaz se kare aur us ko ghunt ghunt kar ke paani pilaaye aur qareebul marg shakhs ke paas junbi aur haiza ka rahna makrooh hai. Jab mout waqi ho jaaye to koi ek mayyit ki aankhein “بِسْمِ اللہِ وَ عَلٰی مِلَّۃِ رَسُوْلِ اللہِ ﷺ”padhte huye narmi se band kar de aur kapde ki ek choudi patti le kar mayyit ki thodi ke niche se nikal kar sar par laakr grah lagaa de phir haath paaon seedhey kare aur jodon ko naram dheela kare, badan ke kapde utaar kar mayyit ko patle kapde se chupaaye aur pet par chhoti wazni cheez rakhe aur mayyit ka rukh qibla ki taraf kar de jald az jald dafnaane ki koshish karna sunnat hai. masala:agar koi shakhs paani ke jahaaz ya kashti wagaira main fout ho jaaye aur khushki wahan se is qadr dur ho ke na’ash ke kharaab ho jaane ka andesha ho to us waqt chaahiye ke ghusl kafan aur namaaze janaazah se faarigh ho kar kafan ko us par achchi tarah bandh kar darya main daal dein aur us ke saath koi wazni patthar ya lohe wagairah bhi baandh dein take neeche baith jaaye.

Suwaal: Mout par noha wa maatam karna:
Jawaab: Hazrate Abdulla bin umar رضی اللہ تعالیٰ عنہما se riwaayat hai ke kaha ek daf’a sa’ad bin ubaada رضی اللہ تعالیٰ عنہ mareez huye to rasool ﷺ apne chand sahaaba رضی اللہ تعالیٰ عنہم ke saath un ki iya maanind  keliye aaye, aap ﷺ jab andar tashrif laye to un ko badi sakht haalat main paya, aap ﷺ ne sa’ad bin ubaada ko is haal main dekha ke un ke gird logon ki bheed lagi hue thi, to aap ﷺ ne farmaaya khatam ho chuke? (batour e mayusi ya hazireen se istifsar ke tour par aan ﷺ ne ye bat farmai)to logon ne araz kiya nahi, abhi khatam nahi huye to rasool ﷺ kw un ki ye haalat dikh kar rona aagaya, aur jab logon ne aap ﷺ par giriya ke aasar dekhe to wo bhi rone lage, aap ﷺ ne irshad farmaaya:logo! Achchi tarah sun lo aur samjh lo ke Allah ta’ala aankh ke aansu aur dil ke gam par to saza nahi deta, kyunke us par bandy ka ikhtiyar aur qabu nahi hai.phir zubaan ki taraf isharah kar ke farmaaya lekin is ki galti par yani zubaan se noha wa maatam karne par saza deta hai aur museebat pa “إِنَّا لِلہِ وَإِنَّا إِلَیْہِ رَاجِعُوْنَ”padhne aur dua wa istigfar karne rahmat fermata hai.(saheeh bukhaari sharif muslim sharif)Hazrate ummu salaama رضی اللہ تعالیٰ عنہا  se riwaayat hai ke un ke shohar abu salaama رضی اللہ تعالیٰ عنہ ki wafat ke waqt rasool Allah ﷺ tashreef laye un ki aankhen khuli rah gayi thi, aap ﷺne anhe band kiya aaur farmaaya jab ruh jism se nikal jaati hai to binayi bhi us ke saath chali jaati hai, is liye mout ke baad aankhon ko band hi kar dena chahiye, aap ﷺki ye bat sun kar un ke ghar ke aadmi chilla chilla kar rone lage aur is ranj aur sadmain ki haalat main un ki zubaan se aisi baten niklne lagi jo khud un logon ky haqq main bad dua thi, to aap ﷺ be farmaaya ke logo! Apne haqq main khair aur bhalayi ki dua karo is liye ke tum jo kah rahe ho malaika us par aaameen  kahte hain phir aap ﷺ ne is tarah dua farmayi …………………aye Alla! Abu salaama ki magfirat farma aur apne hidayat yafta bandon main un ka darja buland farma aur us ke bajaaye tu hi nigrani farma un ke pasmandagan ki aur rabbul alaameen  bakhsh de ham ko aur us ko aur us ki qabar ko wasee aur munawwar farma. (saheeh muslim) Mayyit ko bosa dena jaaiz hai aan Hazrat ﷺ ne usman bin mz’un raziyAllahu anhu ka bosa liya, is tarah Hazrate aabu bakar siddeeq raziyAllahu anhu ne nabi ﷺ ki wafat ke baad aap ﷺki peshaani ka bosa liya.

Suwaal: Ghusl e mayyit ka tareeqah:
Jawaab: Mayyit ko nihlane ka haqq sab se pehle to us ke qareeb tareen rishtadaron ko hai, behtar hai ke wo khud nihlaye aur aurat ki mayyit ko qareebi rishtadar aurat nihlaye koi dusra shakhs bhi nihla sakta hai.lekin mard ko mard aur aurat ko aurat ghusl de, jo zaroori masaail se waqif aur deendar ho. Har gair shaheed musalmaan ki mayyit ko kafnaana, dafnana, gusal dena aur us par namaaze janaazah ka padhna farz kifaya hai. Shaheed ki mayyit ko ghusl dilaana aur us par namaaze janaazah padhna haraam hai, jis haalat main shaheed hua ho waise hi khoon ke kapde main dafnaana farz e kifaya hai. haan agar shaheed ke kapde se tamaam badan ko dhanp nahi sakte to us kapde ke saath dusra kapda mila sakte hain.

Suwaal: ghusl e mayyit ke arkaan kitne hai?
Jawaab: ghusl e mayyit ka ek hi rukn hai aur wo tamaam badan par paani ka bahana hai.

Suwaal: mayyit ko ghusl dilate waqt niyyat karne ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: mayyit ghusl dilate waqt niyyat karna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: mayyit ko ghusl dene ka tareeqah bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: ghusl dene keliye aisi jagah tayyar karein jis ke upar chat ho aur Chaaron taraf pardah ho aur us jagah loban jaisi khushbudar cheez jalaye take mayyit ke pet se nikalne waali cheez ki badbu se logon ko takleef na pahunche.mayyit ko litaye jaane waali jagah aisi rah eke mayyit ka sr per se uancha ho, take sar par bahaya hua paani pair se bah kar jaaye. Mayyit ke ghusl khaane main teen aadmi ka hona sunnat hai.(ghusl dete waqt gasil (ghusl dene waala)madad karne waly aur mayyit ke waali ke siwa us jagah aur koi no ho) phir ghar ke andar se mayyit ko ghusl dene kyliye le jaaye. Aur mayyit ko uthaate waqt ـ” بِسْمِ اللّٰہ” kahte hue uthaye aur ghusl khaane tak le jaate waqt tasbeeh “سُبْحَانَ اللّٰہِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ وَلَا إِلٰہَ إِلَّا اللّٰہُ وَاللّٰہُ أَکْبَرُ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَاقُوَّۃَ إِلَّا بِاللّٰہِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِیمِ”padhte rahe aur mayyit ko unche takht par litaya jaaye. Phir mayyit ko ghusl dene waale ke guthne se tek lag kar bithayen aur wo seedha haath mayyit ke garden par rakhe aur us ka angutha sar par rakhe take mayyit ka sar na jhuke aur ulte haath se mayyit ke pet ko daba kar masah kare take pet ke fazlat baahar nikal jaaye.phir mayyit ko peeth ke bal lita kar ulte haath se sharm gah ko dhoye. Us waqt haath main kapda lapeta hua ho kyunke shargah ko nange haath se chhuna haraam hai. Phir haath ka kapda nikal kar phenk de aur haath ko achchi tarah dhoye. Phir baayein haath ki chingli par kapda lepet kar naak saaf kare aur shaha maanind   ki ungli se daant  saaf kare. Nakhun main mail jami hue ho to naram tinke ke zariye  saaf kare phir dubaarah haath par dusra kapda lepet kar badan par koi najaasat lagi ho to use saf kare aur donon haathon main kapda lepet kar namaaz sa mukammal wuzu karaye( yani donon haathon ko gatton tak dhoye, kulli karaye aur naak main paani chadhaye) wuzu main niyyat waajib hai kulli karate aur naak main paani chadhate waqt mayyit ke muh ko ek side ghuma de take paani andar na chala jaaye phir ghusl ki niyyat karte hue ghusl dena shuru kare yani ghusl dene waala ye niyyat kare ke is mayyit par namaaze janaazah jaaiz hone keliye ghusl karata hum. Pehle sar ko beri ke patte ya saban wagairah se dhoye phir dadhi aur sar ke baalon main itni narmi se knghi kare ke bal na tute( aur agar bal toot jaaye to use bhi jama kare take kafnaate waqt use kafan main dal sake) mayyit ke daaein side ke saamne ke hisse par garden se le kar per tak saban lagaaye phir baaein side ke saamne ke hisse par saban lagaaye phir baaein karwat pa lita kar daaein side ke pichle hisse par saban lagaaye aur daaein karwat pa lita kar baaein side ke pichle hisse par saban lagaaye phir isi tarah pehle daaein side ke saamne ke hisse ko paani se dhoye phir baaein side ke saamne ke hisse ko phir baaein karwat par lita kar daaein side ke pichle hisse ko aur daaein karwat pa lita kar baaein side ke pichle hisse ko paani se dhoye isi tarah aur 2 martaba marne se 3 martaba saban lagane ki sunnat haasil ho jaati hai phir paani main itni miqdaar main kafoor dale jis se paani main ziyaada taggayyur paida no ho jaaye aur sar se le kar  pawu tak 3 martaba paani bahaye is paani ko fuqaha ne maye qirah kahte hain. Pehli martaba paani bahane se farz adaa ho jaayega dusri aur teesri martaba paani bahana sunnat hai. Phir naram kapde se mayyit ke badan ko narmi se ponche (sunnat hai ke nihlane keliye thanda aur nakeen paani ka istimaal kare, garam paani se nihlane se mayyit jald sad jaane ka khadsha rahta hai) Ghusl aur wuzu karane ke baad yun dua kare: أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّا إِلٰہَ  إِلَّا اللہُ وَحْدَہٗ لَا شَرِیْکَ لَہٗ  وَأَشْہَدُ أَنَّ  مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُہٗ وَرَسُوْلُہُ اَللّٰہُمَّ اجْعَلْنِیْ وَإِیّاہُ(ہَا) مِنَ التَّوَابِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ وَإِیّاہُ(ہَا) مِنَ الْمُتَطَہِّرِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ وَإِیّاہُ(ہَا)مِنْ عِبَادِکَ الصَّالِحِیْنَ سُبْحَانَکَ اللّٰہُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِکَ أَشْہَدُ أَن لَّا إِلٰہَ  إِلاَّ أَنْتَ أَسْتَغْفِرُکَ وَأَتُوْبُ إِلَیْکَ وَصَلَّی اللہُ عَلَی سَیِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ وَّعَلَی اٰلِہٖ وَصَحْبِہٖ وَسَلَّمَ

Suwaal: ghusl dene ke baad mayyit ko kya kare?
Jawaab: mayyit ghusl de chuke to fauran kafnaye sufed kapde se kafnaana afzal hai sunnat hai ke mayyit par jo qarz hai us ko adaa karne ke baad jo maal bacha ho us se 3 lifafe khareed kar kafnaye jin se pure badan dhank jaaye kam az kam ek lifafe se kafnaana waajib hai is se kam karne ka haqq kisi ko nahi. Mayyit agar shadi shuda aurat ki ho to us ki tajheez wa takfeen ka kharch us ke shohar karega agarcha aurat ne maal choda ho. Mayyit mard ya gair shadi shuda aurat ho to us ki tajheez wa takfeen ka kharch us ke tarike se kiya jaayega aur mayyit ne maal bilkul nahi choda to us ki tajheez wa takfeen ka kharch us shakhs ke zimma hai jis par mayyit ki zindagi main us ka kharch (nafaqa) waajib tha agar mayyit ne maal nahi choda aur aisa bhi koi shakhs zinda nahi jis par us ka nafaqa waajib ho to islami hukumat ka farz hai ke wo tajheez wa takfen ka kharch baitul maal se (sarkari khazaane) se kare. Agar hukumat bhi ye fareeza adaa nahi karti to jin jin gaaon ke musalmaan maaldaar ko us mayyit ki ittila ho un sab par farz e kifaya ke tour par lazim hai ke ye kharch bardasht kare.

Suwaal: kafnaane ka tareeqah bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: mayyit mard ho to pehle ek chaadar bichaaye aur us par khushbu aur kafoor chhidkein phir us par dusri aur teesri chaadar bichhaa kar har ek chaadar par kafoor chhidkein us ke baad mayyit ko us par litaa dein aur har ek chaadar ko pehle mayyit ke baaein taraf se phir daaein taraf se lapetein aur sar ke upar aur pairon ke niche ek ek band(ganth) baandein aur isi tarah kamar ke paas ek baandh (ganth) bandhein aurat ki mayyit ho to use pehle tahband aur qamees pehnayein phir sar ke baalon ko 3 hisse kar ke odhni udhaye us ke baad 2 chaadarein lepet lein aur baandhein khawateen ki mayyit main seene par bhi ek chouda band bandha jaaye jise seena band kaha jaata hai aur ye mukammal kafnaane  ke baad bandha jaayega. Mard aur aurat ko kafnaane se pehle ek kapde main kafoor waala kapaas bichaa kar us kapde se langut bandhein sunnat hai tamaam suraakhon main kafas rakhein isi tarah tamaam sajde ke aaza main kapaas rakhen.

Suwaal: khawateen ko kitne kapdon se kafnaaya jaayega?
Jawaab: khawateen ko 5 kapdon se kafnaaya jaayega aur woh ek izaar ek qamees ek dupatta, 2 lifaafey hain.

Suwaal: mard ko kitne kapdon se kafnaaya jaayega?
Jawaab: mard ko sirf 3 kapdon se kafnaaya jaayega aur wo 3 lifaafey hain.

Suwaal: mard ko kafnaane main qamees aur emaama pehnaaya jaata hai kya ye jaaiz hai?
Jawaab: agar kisi aaqil wa baaligh ke maal se, us ki ijaazat ke saath emaama aur qamees ka izaafa karna chahe to emaama aur qamees ka izaafa kiya jaa sakta hai, is liye ke Hazrate ibn umar raziyallahu anhuma ne apne bête ko kafnaate waqt 3 lifaafon ke saath qamees aur emaama bhi pehnaaya hai (baihaqqi) aur jab munaafiq abdullahibn ubayy mara to bete ne, sayyiduna Muhammad ﷺ ke paas aakar arz kiya ke ai rasoolallah sallallahu alaika wa sallam! Aap ka qamees ata farmaayiye taake us se mere waalid ko kafnaa sakun, us waqt huzoor ﷺne apna qamees ata farmaaya(bukhaari, muslim) yani aap ﷺne kafan main qamees pehnaane se mana nahi farmaaya. In baton se maaloom hua ke kafan main qamees aur emaama pehnana jaaiz hai bashart ye ke kisi baaligh ke maal se us ki ijaazat se kafnaaya jaraha ho. Mard ho ya aurat use paanch se ziyaada kapdon se kafnaana makrooh hai baaz ulama ne najaaiz wa haraam kaha hai. Isi tarah baaligh ke maal se us ki ijaazat ke bigair ya naabaaligh ke maal se agarcha us ki ijaazat ho 3 se ziyaada kapdon se kafnaana najaaiz wa haraam hai albatta ek langot aur aurat ki mayyit keliye seena band ka shumaar in kapdon mein nahi hota is liye langut aur seena band ka izafa kiya jasakta hai. (mas’ala)kafnaane keliye waqf kiye hue maal se kafnaate waqt ek lifafe se ziyaada kapdon se kafnaana bhi na jaaiz wa haraam hai.

Suwaal: kafnaane ke baad kya kare ?
Jawaab: kafnaane ke baad mayyit ko masjid le ja kar namaaze janaazah padhein. Note:sunnat hai ke janaazah le jate waqt log Janaaze kea aage aage waqaar w itminaan ke saath zikr e ilahi karte hue chalein no ke Janaaze ke peeche .aaj kal log Janaaze ke peechhe chalte hai ye sunnat ke khilaaf hai.

Suwaal: namaaze Janaaze ke arkaan kitne hain? bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: namaaze Janaaze ke arkaan 7 hain (1) niyyat karna (2)qiyaam (3)chaar  takbeerein (4)surah e faatihah ka padhna (5)dusri takbeer ke baad huzoor sallahu alahi wal sallam par durood shareef padhna (6)teesri takbeer ke baad mayyit keliye magfirat ki dua karna (7)chouti takbeer ke baad salaam pherna.

Suwaal: namaaze Janaaze ki shartein bataayein.
Jawaab: namaaze Janaaze ki shartein 6 hain : namaazi ka hadas se paak hona, najaasat se paak hona, satar  chupaana, qibla rukh hona, mayyit ka ghusl aur Janaaze ka namaazi ke saamne hona jaisa emaam muqtadi ke saamne jab ke wo ghaaibaana namaaze janaazah na ho.

Suwaal: dafan ki hue mayyit par namaaze janaazah adaa kar sakte hain?
Jawaab: ji haan! Adaa kar sakte hain lekin jis gaaon main mayyit dafan ki gayi hai usi gaaon main namaaze janaazah padhni ho to us mayyit ki qabar ke paas padhna hoga us waqt qabar namaazi ke saamne ho jaisa ke emaam muqtadi ke saamne aur agar wo mayyit dusre gaaon main ho to ghaaibaana namaaz adaa kar sakte hain.

Suwaal: namaaze janaaza ka mukammal sunnat tareeqah bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: mayyit ko ghusl dilane ke baad kafnaa kar emaam Janaaze ke saamne mard ke sar ke paas aur aurat ki kamar ke paas khada ho, aur muqtadi hazraat emaam ke peche seedhi saff bandhe, safe kam se kam 3 hon, log ziyaada hon aur 3 se ziyaada safein ho rahi hon to unhein taaq adad banaana ki zaroorat nahi takbeere tahreema se pehle namaaze janaaze ki niyyat karein “is mayyit par main chaar  takbeeron ke saath farz kifaya namaaz padhta hoon  muh mera kaba shareef ki taraf Allah ta’ala ke waaste” , muqtadi niyyat main aur itna izaafa kare ke “peeche is emaam ke” ya “ muqtadi ban kar” yun hi emaam emaamat ki niyyat kare, janaazah agar ghaib ho to mayyit ke naam wa gaira se ta’ayyun karein jaise ahmad par main namaaze janaazah padhta hum ya emaam jis mayyit par namaaze janaazah padh raha hai us par main namaaze janaazah padhta hum wagairah. Niyyat karte hue takbeere tahreema ke waqt donon haathon ko kandhon tak uthaayein phir seene aur naaf ke darmiyaan bandh lein phir taauz yani aauzubilla shareef padhein phir bismillah shareef aur surahe faatihah padhein phir dubaara Allahuakbar kahta hua donon haathon ko kandhon tak uathaein phir pehle ke misl seene ke neeche haathon ko bandhein aur huzoor sallallahu alaihi wa sallam par durood bhejein phir Allahuakbar kahta hua donon haathon ko kandhon tak utha kar pehle ke misl seene ke neeche baandhne ke baad mayyit ke haqq main ukhravi dua karein phir Allahuakbar kahta hua donon haathon ko kandhon tak utha kar misle sabiq seene ke neeche haathon ko bandhein phir salaam phere . Surah e faatihah kisi bhi takbeer ke baad padhi ja sakti hai albatta behtar hai ke pehli takbeer ke baad surah e faatihah padhein sunnat hai ke surah e faatihah se pehle a’uzu billah shareef padhein aur surah e faatihah ke baad aameen kahein. Namaaze janaazah main dusri takbeer ke baad durood shareef padhna waajib hai, jis main kam az kam “اَللّٰہُمَّ صَلِّ عَلٰی مُحَمَّدٍ” kahein. Aur behtar hai ke duroode ibraaheem padhein jo namaaz main tahyaat  ke baad padha jaata hai. Mustahab hai ke durood se pehle “اَلْحَمْدُلِلہِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِیْنَ” is tarah Allah ta’ala ki hamd karein, durood ke baad muamineen ke haqq main yun dua karein “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْلِلْمُؤْمِنِیْنَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ”durood ke saath “اَللّٰہُمَّ سَلِّمْ عَلٰی سَیِّدِنَا مُحَمَّدٍ” is tarah huzoor sallallahu alahi wa sallam par salaam padhein. Teesri takbeer ke baad mayyit keliye magfirat ki dua karna waajib hai jis main kam az kam “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہٗ (لَہَا)” kahein aur sunnat hai ke ye dua padhein: اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہٗ(لَہَا) وَارْحَمْہُ(ہَا) وَاعْفُ عَنْہُ(ہَا) وَعَافِہٖ(ہَا) وَأَکْرِمْ نُزُلَہٗ(ہَا) وَوَسِّعْ مَدْخَلَہٗ(ہَا) وَاغْسِلْہُ (ہَا)بِالْمَاءِ وَالثَّلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ وَنَقِّہٖ (ہَا)مِنْ الْخَطَایَا کَمَا یُنَقَّی الثَّوْبُ الْأَبْیَضُ مِنْ الدَّنَسِ وَأَبْدِلْہُ (ہَا) دَارًا خَیْرًا مِّنْ دَارِہٖ (ہَا)وَأَہْلًا خَیْرًا مِّنْ أَہْلِہٖ (ہَا) وَزَوْجًا خَیْرًا مِّنْ زَوْجِہٖ (ہَا)وَأَدْخِلْہُ (ہَا)الْجَنَّۃَ وَأَعِذْہُ (ہَا)مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ وَفِتْنَتِہٖ وَمِنْ عَذَابِ النَّارِ. Note: mayyit khatoon ki ho to mundarija bala aur aane waale duaaon mein qousain (….) main diye huye jumlon ko padhein masalan “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہٗ”ke bajaaye ” اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہَا” ” وَارْحَمْہُ” ke bajaaye ”وَارْحَمْہَا”” وَعَافِہٖ”ke bajaaye” وَعَافِہَا”padhein. Teesri takbeer ke baad mazeed ye dua bhi padhein: اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَیِّنَا وَمَیِّتِنَا وَشَاہِدِنَا وَغَائِبِنَا وَصَغِیْرِنَا  وَکَبِیْرِنَا وَذَکَرِنَا وَأُنْثَانَا.اَللّٰہُمَّ مَنْ أَحْیَیْتَہٗ مِنَّا فَأَحْیِہٖ عَلَی الْإِسْلَامِ وَمَنْ تَوَفَّیْتَہٗ مِنَّا فَتَوَفَّہٗ عَلَی الْإِیْمَانِ. اَللّٰہُمَّ لَا تَحْرِمْنَا أَجْرَہٗ (ہَا)وَلَاتُضِلَّنَا بَعْدَہُ (ہَا) Mas’ala:teesri takbeer ke baad is dua ko ”اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہٗ” waali dua se pehle padhna sunnat hai. Note:yad rakhen! Ke baaz log teesri takbeer ke baad“اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَیِّنَا وَمَیِّتِنَا” sirf ye dua padhte hain aur “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہُ(لَہَا)” jaisi koi dua nahi padhte jis main mayyit ke haqq main ukhrawi dua ho, is tarah karne se namaaze janaazah nahi hoti kyunke teesri takbeer ke baad mayyit ke haqq main khusoosi aur ukhravi dua karna waajib hai aur “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَیِّنَا وَ مَیِّتِنَا”main mayyit ke haq main khusoosi dua nahi. Sunnat hai ke teesri takbeer ke baad “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِحَیِّنَا” waali dua padhne ke baad “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہُ(لَہَا)”waali dua padhne se pehle padhein: اَللّٰهُمَّ هٰذَا عَبْدُكَ وَابْنُ عَبْدَيْكَ (ہٰذِہٖ أَمَتُكَ وَبِنْتُ عَبْدَيْكَ)  خَرَجَ (خَرَجَتْ) مِنْ رَّوْحِ الدُّنْيَا وَسَعَتِهَا وَمَحْبُوْبُهٗ(ہَا) وَأَحِبَّاؤُهٗ (ہَا) فِيْهَا إِلٰى ظُلْمَةِ الْقَبْرِ وَمَا هُوَ لَاقِيْهِ(ہَا) كَانَ يَشْهَدُ(كَانَتْ تَشْهَدُ ) أَنْ لَّا إِلٰهَ إلَّا أَنْتَ وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُكَ وَ رَسُوْلُكَ وَأَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ  اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنَّهٗ نَزَلَ (إِنَّهَا نَزَلَتْ) بِكَ وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ مَنْزُوْلٍ بِهٖ(ہَا)وَأَصْبَحَ فَقِيْرًا (وَأَصْبَحَتْ فَقِيْرَۃً ) إِلٰى رَحْمَتِكَ وَأَنْتَ غَنِيٌّ عَنْ عَذَابِهٖ(ہَا) وَقَدْ جِئْنَاكَ رَاغِبِيْنَ إِلَيْكَ شُفَعَاءً لَّهُ(لَہَا)،اَللّٰهُمَّ إِنْ كَانَ مُحْسِنًا(إِنْ كَانَتْ مُحْسِنَۃً ) فَزِدْ فِي إِحْسَانِهٖ(ہَا) وَإِنْ كَانَ مُسِيْئًا (وَإِنْ كَانَتْ مُسِيْئَۃً)فَاغْفِرْ لَهٗ (ہَا) وَتَجَاوَزْ عَنْهُ(ہَا) وَلَقِّهٖ(ہَا) بِرَحْمَتِكَ رِضَاكَ’ وَقِهٖ(ہَا) فِتْنَةَ الْقَبْرِ وَعَذَابَهٗ وَأَفْسِحْ لَهٗ(ہَا) فِي قَبْرِهٖ (ہَا)وَجَافِ الْأَرْضَ عَنْ جَنْبَيْهِ (ہَا) وَلَقِّهٖ (ہَا) بِرَحْمَتِكَ الْأَمْنَ مِنْ عَذَابِكَ حَتَّى تَبْعَثَهٗ(ہَا) إِلٰى جَنَّتِكَ يَا أَرْحَمَ الرَّاحِمِيْنَ. Is dua ke baad hi “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہٗ وَارْحَمْہُ” waali dua padhi jaayegi. Mayyit naabaaligh ladke ya ladki ki ho to “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہُ” waali dua ke saath ye dua padhna sunnat hai: اَللّٰہُمَّ اجْعَلْہُ(ہَا) فَرَطًا لِّأَبَوَیْہِ(ہَا) وَسَلَفًا وَّذُخْرًا وَّعِظَۃً وَّاعْتِبَارًا وَّشَفِیْعًا(وَشَفِیْعَۃً)وَّثَقِّلْ بِہٖ(بِہَا) مَوَازِیْنَہُمَا وَأَفْرِغِ الصَّبْرَ عَلَی قُلُوْبِہِمَا وَلاَتَفْتِنْہُمَا بَعْدَہٗ(ہَا)وَلاَ تَحْرِمْہُمَا أَجْرَہُ(ہَا). Note:teesri takbeer main naabaaligh bcche par padhi jaane waali namaaze janaazah main bhi “اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْ لَہُ(لَہَا)” jaisi koi dua padhna zaroori hai jis main mayyit ke haqq main ukhravi dua ho sirf “اَللّٰہُمَّ اجْعَلْہٗ (ہَا) فَرَطًا لِأَبَوَیْہٖ(ھا)” waali dua padhna kaafi nahi. Mas’ala:chouthi takbeer ke baad kuch na padhe to koi haraj nahi albatta sunnat hai “اَللّٰہُمَّ لَاتَحْرِمْنَااَجْرَہُ(ہَا) وَلَاتَفْتِنَّا بَعْدَہُ(ہَا) وَاغْفِرْلَنَا وَلَہُ(ہَا)”padhein.

Suwaal: hanafi imam ke peechhe shafiee muqtadi ki namaaze janaazah ka kya hukm hai?
Jawaab: hanfi emaam ke pechhe shafiee muqtdi ki namaaze janaazah durust hoti hai.

Suwaal: jamaa’at ke saath namaaze janaazah padhte waqt muqtdi ko faatihah padhne ka waqt na mile to kya kare?
Jawaab: muqtadi ko faatihah padhne ka waqt na mile to muqtadi emaam ki iqtida main dusri takbeer kahe yani faatihah na padhe. Note: namaaze janaazah padhte waqt aam namaazon ke maanind sajde ki jagah dekhna sunnat hai.

Suwaal: namaaze janaazah padhane ka haqqdaar kon hai?
Jawaab: namaaze janaazah padhane ka sab se pehla haqqdar mayyit ka waalid phir dada phir par dada kitni hi unchi peedhi ho phir mayyit ka beta phir pota phir par pota aakhir peedhi tak phir mayyit ka shaqeeq bhai phir allaati (baap shareek)bhai phir akhyaafi (ma shareek)bhai phir shaqeeq bhateeja phir allaati bhateeja phir shaqeeq chacha phir allaati chacha phir shaqeeq chacha ka beta phir allaati chacha ka beta is ke baad waris ki tarteeb se baaqi ahle asaba phir bittarteeb zavil arhaam phir shohar.

Suwaal: agar ek hi darje waale kayi wariseen jama ho gaye to kis ko muqaddam kiya jaayega?
Jawaab: mayyit ke 2bhaiyon main se jo sunni saheehul aqeeda hai use namaaze janaazah ki emaamat karne ka haqq haasil hoga, bad mazhab ko nahi kyunke bad mazhab ke peche namaaz hi nahi hoti, mayyit sunni ho aur rishtaadar tamaam bad mazhab hon to kisi rishtaadar ko ye haqq nahi ke us mayyit par namaaze janaazah padhaayein balke koi sunni saheehul aqeeda namaaze janaazah padhayega, jo rishtadar panjagana namaaz ka paaband na ho ya faasiq ho use bhi namaaze janaazah main emaamat karne ka haqq nahi agarcha mayyit ki wasiyyat ho.

Suwaal: kya kayi janaaiz par ek hi namaaz padh sakte hain?
Jawaab: ji haan! kayi janaaiz par ek hi namaaz padh sakte hain lekin dua ko jama kar ke padhna chahiye: اَللّٰہُمَّ اغْفِرْلَہُمْ وَارْحَمْہُمْ وَاعْفُ عَنْہُمْ وَعَافِہِمْ وَأَکْرِمْ نُزُلَہُمْ وَوَسِّعْ مَدْخَلَہُمْ وَاغْسِلْہُمْ بِالْمَائِ وَالثَّلْجِ وَالْبَرَدِ وَنَقِّہِمْ مِّنَ الْخَطَایَا کَمَا یُنَقَّی الثَّوْبُ الْأَبْیَضُ مِنْ الدَّنَسِ وَأَبْدِلْہُمْ دَارًا خَیْرًا مِّنْ دَارِہِمْ وَأَہْلًا خَیْرًا مِّنْ أَہْلِہِمْ وَزَوْجًا خَیْرًا مِّنْ زَوْجِہِمْ وَأَدْخِلْہُمْ الْجَنَّۃَ وَأَعِذْہُمْ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ وَفِتْنَتِہٖ وَمِنْ عَذَابِ النَّارِ Namaaze janaazah padhne ki wasiyat:

Suwaal: mayyit ne agar kisi be namaazi ko namaaze janaazah padhaane ki wasiyat ki to wo wasiyat naafiz kijaayegi?
Jawaab: bilkul nahi ! naafiz nahi kijaayegi is liye ke benamaazi ki iaqtida main namaaz padhna makrooh hai balke kisi namaaze janaazah ka emaam be namaazi ho to us ki iqtida main namaaze janaazah nahi padhijaayegi. Isi tarah kisi Wahhabi ya dewbandi ya rafizi ko namaaze janaazah padhne ki wasiyyat ho tab bhi wasiyyat naafiz nahi kijaayegi is liye ke bad mazhabon ki iqtida main bhi namaaz padhna sakht mana hai agarcha namaaze janaazah ho. Note:mayyit ke wo rishtadaar jo namaaze janaaza padhane ka ziyaada haqqdaar ho us ki ijaazat ke bigair wasiyat kardah agarcha wo nek aur sunni ho namaaze janaazah padhne ka haqq nahi rakhta. Albtta wasiyyat nafiz karte hue wasiyat kardah ko ijaazat dena behtar hai. Mas’ala:ye zaroori nahi ke mayyit ka beta wagairah rishtadar hi namaaze janaazah padhaaye. Adab yahi hai ke hazireen main se nek aur ba-amal shakhs ko namaaze janaazah padhane ki ijaazat de di jaaye. Na tamaam (kacche) bachche keahkam:

Suwaal: mayyit agar kacche bachche ki ho to kya kiya jaaye?
Jawaab: agar chaar  mahinon se ziyaada muddat ka hamal gir jaaye to paida hone ke baad hile ya aawaaz kare to ghusl dena, kafnaana, us par namaaze janaazah adaa karna aur dafnaana waajib hai. Aur agar paida hone ke baad na hile na hi aawaaz nikaale lekin wo chaar ya chaar se ziyaada mehnon ki muddat ka hamal hai to namaaze Janaaze ke siwa tamaam baatein waajib hain aur namaaze janaazah waajib nahi. chaar   mehnon se kam muddat ka hamal agar gir jaaye to us ko kapde se chupaana aur dafnaana sunnat hai, khoon aur gosht ka lothda ho to sirf dafnaana sunnat hai. kapde se  chupaana sunnat nahi. Dafnaane ke masaail:

Suwaal: qabar kitni lambi, choudi aur gahri honi chahiye?
Jawaab: qabar kam az kam itni chahiye ke bu ko chupaaye aur darindon se mayyit ko bachaaye aur qabar  ki chhatt mayyit se na mile aur sunnat hai ke qabar sadhe chaar haath gehri ho aur itni kushaadah (lambi choudi)ho jis main mayyit aur dafnaane waale utar sakein.

Suwaal: mayyit ko dafnaane ka mukammal tareeqah kya hai?
Jawaab: dafnaane keliye mayyit ke sar ke jaanib waale chaarpaayi ke hisse ko qabar ke pair ki taraf rakhe take mayyit ko us se nikaal kar qabar main aasani se rakh sake phir mayyit ke sar ko pehle chaarpaayi se nikal kar qabar main   daakhil   kare mayyit ko qabar main utarne waale taaq adad hona chahiye. Qabar main utarte waqt sabhi utaarne waale padhein“بِسْمِ اللّٰہِ  وَ عَلٰی مِلَّۃِ رَسُوْلِ اللّٰہِ ﷺ” qabar  main mayyit ko dahini karwat par litaayein. Kafan par baandhe hue tamaam bandh ko kholein yahan tak ke khawateen ke seene par baandhe hue seena band ko bhi kholein. waajib hai ke mayyit ke chehra aur seene ko qibla rukh kare. Mayyit ke chehre se kapda hata kar ek int se tek lagaaye (tab mayyit ko ruku karne waale ki shakl main paayengi) takhta ya patthar se band kare is tour par ke takhta ya patthar mayyit ko na lage. Takhta ya patthar se qabar ko dhaankne ke baad qabar ke Chaaron taraf ke log apne donon haathon se 3 martaba mitti dalein, pehli martaba mitti dalte waqt “مِنْہَا خَلَقْنَاکُمْ”dusri martaba dalte waqt “وَفِیہَا نُعِیدُکُم” aur teesri martaba dalte waqt“وَمِنْہَا نُخْرِجُکُمْ تَارَۃً اُخْرَی” padhein aur agar logon ki kami ki wajh se na bhare to kudal se matti dale. Qabar ko matti daal kar zameen se ek balisht ki qadr uncha kare phir us par paani chhidke aur tazi tahni lagaaye phir sar aur pair ke muqabil main patthar rakhe. Tadfeen mukammal hone ke baad mayyit ko talqeen kare. (talqeen ke kalimat aage aarahe hai) talqeen karne waala mayyit ke chehre ki taraf mutawajjih ho kar is tarah baithe ke talqeen parhne waale ki peeth qible ki taraf ho aur douran e talqeen hazireen qabr ke gird khade hon. Dafan ke baad qabar par surahe baqara ka awwal wa aakhir padhe sarhaane “آلٓمٓ”se “مُفْلِحُوْن” tal aur paenti“اٰمن الرسول” se khatam e surah tak padhe. Aur sunnat hai ke dafan ke baad qabar ke paas itni der tak thahre jitni der unt zabah kar ke gosht taqseem ki jasake.

Suwaal: mayyit ko qabar main koun utaare?
Jawaab: mayyit ko qabar main wahi utaare jo namaaze janaazah padhane ka ziyaada haqqdaar hai lekin aurat ko qabar main utarne keliye us ka shohar dusron se ziyaada haqdaar hai. Isi tarah koi  aurat na rahe to ghusl bhi shohar hi de. shohar ke baad aurat ko qabar main utaarne  uar ghusl dene ka haqq dar mahram hai aur agar mahram bhi na ho to ghusl na dilaaye balke tayammum kara ke dafnaaye.

Suwaal: agar koi watan ke baahar margaya to kya us ki wasiyat ke bina par use watan le aasakte hain?
Jawaab: ji nahi! Jahan margaya ho wahan se dusre gaaon le jana haraam hai. haan agar makka e mukarrama ya madeena e munawwara  ya baitul muqaddas ke qareeb mar jaaye to use in muqaddas jagahon ki taraf le ja sakte hain.

Suwaal: kitni cheezon keliye mayyit ko qabar se nikaalna waajib hai?bayaan kijiye.
Jawaab: chaar cheezon keliye mayyit ko qabar se nikaalna waajib hai.
